1059  license_window->setMinimumHeight(351);
1060  license_window->resize(settings.value("licenseWindow/size", QSize(562,351)).toSize());
1061  license_window->move(settings.value("licenseWindow/position", QPoint(200, 200)).toPoint());
1062 
1063  connect( webpage, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(openWebpage()) );
1064  connect( license, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(openLicense()) );
1065 
1066  QHBoxLayout* layout0 = new QHBoxLayout;
1067  layout0->addLayout(layout1);
1068  layout0->addWidget(onglets1);
1069 
1070  about_window->setLayout(layout0);
1071 
1072  nameFilters << "*.bmp"
1073  //<< "*.dcm"
1074  << "*.gif"
1075  << "*.jpg" << "*.jpeg" << "*.mng"
1076  << "*.pbm" << "*.png" << "*.pgm"
1077  << "*.ppm" << "*.svg" << "*.svgz"
1078  << "*.tiff" << "*.tif" << "*.xbm" << "*.xpm";
1079 
1080  nameFilters.removeDuplicates();
1081 
1082  language_window = new QDialog(this);
1083  language_window->setWindowTitle(tr("Language"));
1084 
1085  listWidget = new QListWidget();
1086 
1087  listWidget->addItem(tr("System (")+locale+")");
1088  listWidget->addItem(tr("English"));
1089  listWidget->addItem(tr("French"));
1090  listWidget->setCurrentRow(settings.value("language",0).toInt());
1091 
1092  language_button = new QDialogButtonBox(language_window);
1093  language_button->addButton(QDialogButtonBox::Ok);
1094  language_button->setCenterButtons(true);
1095  connect( language_button, SIGNAL(accepted()), language_window, SLOT(accept()) );
1096 
1097  QLabel* restart_label = new QLabel(this);
1098  restart_label->setAlignment(Qt::AlignJustify);
1099  restart_label->setWordWrap(true);
1100  restart_label->setText(tr("The change will take effect after restarting the application."));
1101 
1102  QVBoxLayout* language_layout = new QVBoxLayout;
1103  language_layout->addWidget(listWidget);
1104  language_layout->addWidget(restart_label);
1105  language_layout->addWidget(language_button);
1106 
1107 
1108  language_window->setLayout(language_layout);
1109 
1110  statusBar()->clearMessage();
1111 }
1112 
1113 void ImageViewer::openWebpage()
1114 {
1115  bool result = QDesktopServices::openUrl(QUrl("http://www.code.google.com/p/ofeli/", QUrl::TolerantMode));
1116 }
1117 
1118 void ImageViewer::openLicense()
1119 {
1120  license_window->show();
1121 }
1122 
1123 void ImageViewer::openFileName()
1124 {
1125  fileName = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this,
1126  tr("Open File"),
1127  last_directory_used,
1128  tr("Image Files (%1)").arg(nameFilters.join(" ")));
1129 
1130 
1131  open();
1132 }
1133 
1134 // Fonction appelée lorsqu'on ouvre une image
1135 void ImageViewer::open()
1136 {
1137  if( !fileName.isEmpty() )
1138  {
1139  QFileInfo fi(fileName);
1140 
1141  // if you want a partial support of DICOM image, without support of JPEG-2000 encapsulated image
1142  // install DCMTK library to the project (there is the folder "external_libraries")
1143  // and uncomment below
1144 
1145  /*if( fi.completeSuffix() == "dcm" || fi.completeSuffix() == "DCM" )
1146  {
1147  DicomImage* dcm_img = new DicomImage( fileName.toStdString().c_str() );
1148 
1149  if( dcm_img != NULL)
1150  {
1151  if( dcm_img->getStatus() == EIS_Normal )
1152  {
1153  int width = dcm_img->getWidth();
1154  int height = dcm_img->getHeight();
1155  unsigned char* pixelData = (unsigned char*)( dcm_img->getOutputData(8) );
1156 
1157  if( pixelData != NULL )
1158  {
1159  img = QImage(width,height,QImage::Format_Indexed8);
1160 
1161  int size = width*height;
1162  int x, y;
1163  for( int offset = 0; offset < size; offset++ )
1164  {
1165  y = offset/width;
1166  x = offset-y*width;
1167 
1168  *( img.scanLine(y)+x ) = pixelData[offset];
1169  }
1170  }
1171  }
1172  else
1173  {
1174  std::cerr << "Error: cannot load DICOM image (" << DicomImage::getString(dcm_img->getStatus()) << ")" << std::endl;
1175  }
1176  }
1177  delete dcm_img;
1178  }*/
1179  //else
1180  //{
1181  img = QImage(fileName);
1182  if( img.isNull() )
1183  {
1184  QMessageBox::information(this, tr("Opening error - Ofeli"),
1185  tr("Cannot load %1.").arg(fileName));
1186  return;
1187  }
1188  //}
1189 
1190  image_format = img.format();
1191 
1192  if( image_format == 3 ) // si l'image est en niveau de gris
1193  {
1194  QVector<QRgb> table(256);
1195  for( int I = 0; I < 256; I++ )
1196  {
1197  table[I] = qRgb(I,I,I);
1198  }
1199  img.setColorTable(table);
1200  }
1201 
1202  imageLabel->set_qimage0(img);
1203  QApplication::processEvents();
1204  statusBar()->showMessage(tr("Push the left mouse button or click on the right mouse button in the window."));
1205 
1206  imageLabel_settings->set_qimage0(img);
1207 
1208  iteration1 = -1;
1209 
1210  QString name = fi.fileName();
1211  last_directory_used = fi.absolutePath();
1212  setCurrentFile(fileName);
1213 
1214  img_width = img.width();
1215  img_height = img.height();
1216  img_size = img_width*img_height;
1217 
1218  positionX = img_width/2;
1219  positionY = img_height/2;
1220 
1221  phi_text->setText("ϕ(x,y,t) ∈ { -3, -1, 1, 3 }");
1222  text->setToolTip(tr("must be strictly less than iteration_max = 5 × max(img_width,img_height) = ")+QString::number(5*std::max(img_width,img_height)));
1223 
1224  if( ac != NULL )
1225  {
1226  delete ac;
1227  ac = NULL;
1228  }
1229 
1230  image_disp = 1;
1231  hasResultDisp = false;
1232 
1233  QString string_lists_text;
1234  if( image_format == 3 )
1235  {
1236  string_lists_text = QString::number(img_width)+"×"+QString::number(img_height)+"×1";
1237  }
1238  else
1239  {
1240  string_lists_text = QString::number(img_width)+"×"+QString::number(img_height)+"×3";
1241  }
1242 
1243  if( operating_system == 2 )
1244  {
1245  setWindowTitle(name+" - "+string_lists_text);
1246  }
1247  if( operating_system == 1 || operating_system == 3 )
1248  {
1249  setWindowTitle(name+" - "+string_lists_text+" - Ofeli");
1250  }
1251 
1252 
1253  // Paramètres d'entrée du contour actif
1254 
1255  // Création de img1
1256  if( img1 != NULL )
1257  {
1258  delete[] img1;
1259  img1 = NULL;
1260  }
1261 
1262  int x, y; // current position of the pixel
1263 
1264  if( image_format == 3 ) // si l'image est en niveau de gris
1265  {
1266  isRgb1 = false;
1267 
1268  img1 = new unsigned char[img_size];
1269 
1270  for( int offset = 0; offset < img_size; offset++ )
1271  {
1272  // offset = x+y*img_width <==>
1273  y = offset/img_width;
1274  x = offset-y*img_width;
1275 
1276  img1[offset] = *( img.scanLine(y)+x );
1277  }
1278  }
1279  else // si l'image est en couleur
1280  {
1281  if( img.isGrayscale() ) // si les 3 composantes sont identiques
1282  {
1283  isRgb1 = false;
1284 
1285  img1 = new unsigned char[img_size];
1286 
1287  QRgb pix;
1288 
1289  for( int offset = 0; offset < img_size; offset++ )
1290  {
1291  // offset = x+y*img_width <==>
1292  y = offset/img_width;
1293  x = offset-y*img_width;
1294 
1295  pix = img.pixel(x,y);
1296 
1297  img1[offset] = (unsigned char)(qRed(pix));
1298  }
1299  }
1300  else
1301  {
1302  isRgb1 = true;
1303 
1304  img1 = new unsigned char[3*img_size];
1305 
1306  QRgb pix;
1307 
1308  for( int offset = 0; offset < img_size; offset++ )
1309  {
1310  // offset = x+y*img_width <==>
1311  y = offset/img_width;
1312  x = offset-y*img_width;
1313 
1314  pix = img.pixel(x,y);
1315 
1316  img1[3*offset] = (unsigned char)(qRed(pix));
1317  img1[3*offset+1] = (unsigned char)(qGreen(pix));
1318  img1[3*offset+2] = (unsigned char)(qBlue(pix));
1319  }
1320  }
1321  }
1322 
1323  // création de l'image qui va être affichée et modifiée
1324  if( image_uchar != NULL )
1325  {
1326  delete[] image_uchar;
1327  image_uchar = NULL;
1328  }
1329  if( image_uchar == NULL )
1330  {
1331  image_uchar = new unsigned char[3*img_size];
1332  }
1333  image = QImage(image_uchar, img_width, img_height, 3*img_width, QImage::Format_RGB888);
1334 
1335  if( isRgb1 )
1336  {
1337  std::memcpy(image_uchar,img1,3*img_size);
1338  }
1339  else
1340  {
1341  unsigned char I;
1342 
1343  for( int i = 0; i < img_size; i++ )
1344  {
1345  I = img1[i];
1346 
1347  image_uchar[3*i] = I;
1348  image_uchar[3*i+1] = I;
1349  image_uchar[3*i+2] = I;
1350  }
1351  }
1352 
1353  if( shape != NULL )
1354  {
1355  delete[] shape;
1356  shape = NULL;
1357  }
1358  if( shape == NULL )
1359  {
1360  shape = new char[img_size];
1361  }
1362 
1363  if( shape_points != NULL )
1364  {
1365  delete[] shape_points;
1366  shape_points = NULL;
1367  }
1368  if( shape_points == NULL )
1369  {
1370  shape_points = new int[2*img_size+1];
1371  shape_points[0] = list_end;
1372  }
1373 
1374  if( Lout_shape1 != NULL )
1375  {
1376  delete[] Lout_shape1;
1377  Lout_shape1 = NULL;
1378  }
1379  if( Lout_shape1 == NULL )
1380  {
1381  Lout_shape1 = new int[img_size+1];
1382  Lout_shape1[0] = list_end;
1383  }
1384 
1385  if( Lin_shape1 != NULL )
1386  {
1387  delete[] Lin_shape1;
1388  Lin_shape1 = NULL;
1389  }
1390  if( Lin_shape1 == NULL )
1391  {
1392  Lin_shape1 = new int[img_size+1];
1393  Lin_shape1[0] = list_end;
1394  }
1395 
1396  if( Lout_2 != NULL )
1397  {
1398  delete[] Lout_2;
1399  Lout_2 = NULL;
1400  }
1401  if( Lout_2 == NULL )
1402  {
1403  Lout_2 = new int[img_size+1];
1404  Lout_2[0] = list_end;
1405  }
1406 
1407  if( Lin_2 != NULL )
1408  {
1409  delete[] Lin_2;
1410  Lin_2 = NULL;
1411  }
1412  if( Lin_2 == NULL )
1413  {
1414  Lin_2 = new int[img_size+1];
1415  Lin_2[0] = list_end;
1416  }
1417 
1418  if( phi_init2 != NULL )
1419  {
1420  delete[] phi_init2;
1421  phi_init2 = NULL;
1422  }
1423  if( phi_init2 == NULL )
1424  {
1425  phi_init2 = new char[img_size];
1426  }
1427 
1428  if( phi_init1_clean != NULL )
1429  {
1430  delete[] phi_init1_clean;
1431  phi_init1_clean = NULL;
1432  }
1433  if( phi_init1_clean == NULL )
1434  {
1435  phi_init1_clean = new char[img_size];
1436  }
1437 
1438  if( phi_init2_clean != NULL )
1439  {
1440  delete[] phi_init2_clean;
1441  phi_init2_clean = NULL;
1442  }
1443  if( phi_init2_clean == NULL )
1444  {
1445  phi_init2_clean = new char[img_size];
1446  }
1447 
1448  if( phi_init1 != NULL )
1449  {
1450  delete[] phi_init1;
1451  phi_init1 = NULL;
1452  }
1453  if( phi_init1 == NULL )
1454  {
1455  phi_init1 = new char[img_size];
1456  }
1457 
1458  if( image_result_uchar != NULL )
1459  {
1460  delete[] image_result_uchar;
1461  image_result_uchar = NULL;
1462  }
1463  if( image_result_uchar == NULL )
1464  {
1465  image_result_uchar = new unsigned char[3*img_size];
1466  }
1467  image_result = QImage(image_result_uchar, img_width, img_height, 3*img_width,QImage::Format_RGB888);
1468 
1469  if( image_filter_uchar != NULL )
1470  {
1471  delete[] image_filter_uchar;
1472  image_filter_uchar = NULL;
1473  }
1474  if( image_filter_uchar == NULL )
1475  {
1476  image_filter_uchar = new unsigned char[3*img_size];
1477  }
1478  image_filter = QImage(image_filter_uchar, img_width, img_height, 3*img_width, QImage::Format_RGB888);
1479 
1480  if( image_phi_uchar != NULL )
1481  {
1482  delete[] image_phi_uchar;
1483  image_phi_uchar = NULL;
1484  }
1485  if( image_phi_uchar == NULL )
1486  {
1487  image_phi_uchar = new unsigned char[3*img_size];
1488  }
1489  image_phi = QImage(image_phi_uchar, img_width, img_height, 3*img_width, QImage::Format_RGB888);
1490 
1491  if( image_shape_uchar != NULL )
1492  {
1493  delete[] image_shape_uchar;
1494  image_shape_uchar = NULL;
1495  }
1496  if( image_shape_uchar == NULL )
1497  {
1498  image_shape_uchar = new unsigned char[3*img_size];
1499  }
1500  image_shape = QImage(image_shape_uchar, img_width, img_height, 3*img_width, QImage::Format_RGB888);
1501 
1502  if( isRgb1 )
1503  {
1504  image_save_preprocess = QImage(img_width, img_height, QImage::Format_RGB888);
1505  }
1506  else
1507  {
1508  image_save_preprocess = QImage(img_width,img_height, QImage::Format_Indexed8);
1509  }
1510 
1511  QImage img_phi0 = QImage(100,100, QImage::Format_Indexed8);
1512 
1513  for( int offset = 0; offset < 10000; offset++ )
1514  {
1515  // offset = x+y*img_width <==>
1516  y = offset/100;
1517  x = offset-y*100;
1518 
1519  if( x < 95 && x > 5 && y < 95 && y > 5 )
1520  {
1521  *( img_phi0.scanLine(y)+x ) = 255;
1522  }
1523  else
1524  {
1525  *( img_phi0.scanLine(y)+x ) = 0;
1526  }
1527  }
1528 
1529  QSettings settings("Bessy","Ofeli");
1530 
1531  if( img_phi.isNull() )
1532  {
1533  img_phi = settings.value("Settings/Initialization/img_phi",img_phi0).value<QImage>();
1534  }
1535 
1536  if( img_phi.isNull() )
1537  {
1538  img_phi = img_phi0.scaled(img_width, img_height, Qt::IgnoreAspectRatio, Qt::FastTransformation);
1539  }
1540  else
1541  {
1542  img_phi = img_phi.scaled(img_width, img_height, Qt::IgnoreAspectRatio, Qt::SmoothTransformation);
1543  }
1544 
1545  imgPhi2phiInit();
1546 
1547  int n_out = 0;
1548  int n_in = 0;
1549  for( int offset = 0; offset < img_size; offset++ )
1550  {
1551  if( phi_init1_clean[offset] == 1 )
1552  {
1553  Lout_2[n_out++] = offset;
1554  }
1555  if( phi_init1_clean[offset] == -1 )
1556  {
1557  Lin_2[n_in++] = offset;
1558  }
1559  }
1560  Lout_2[n_out] = list_end;
1561  Lin_2[n_in] = list_end;
1562 
1563 
1564  tab_visu(onglets->currentIndex());
1565 
1566 
1567  if( isRgb1 && model == 1 )
1568  {
1569  Cout_text->setText("Cout = (<font color=red>R<font color=black>,<font color=green>G<font color=black>,<font color=blue>B<font color=black>)");
1570  Cin_text->setText("Cin = (<font color=red>R<font color=black>,<font color=green>G<font color=black>,<font color=blue>B<font color=black>)");
1571 
1572  Cout_text->setToolTip(tr("outside average of the image in the (R,G,B) color space"));
1573  Cin_text->setToolTip(tr("inside average of the image in (R,G,B) color space"));
1574  }
1575  if( !isRgb1 && model == 1 )
1576  {
1577  Cout_text->setText("Cout =");
1578  Cin_text->setText("Cin =");
1579 
1580  Cout_text->setToolTip(tr("outside average of the image"));
1581  Cin_text->setToolTip(tr("inside average of the image"));
1582  }
1583 
1584  if( isRgb1 )
1585  {
1586  yuv_groupbox->setHidden(false);
1587  pixel_text->setText(tr("img(x,y) = (<font color=red>R<font color=black>,<font color=green>G<font color=black>,<font color=blue>B<font color=black>)"));
1588  pixel_text->setToolTip(tr("pixel value at the position (x,y) in the (R,G,B) color space"));
1589  }
1590  else
1591  {
1592  yuv_groupbox->setHidden(true);
1593  pixel_text->setText(tr("img(x,y) = I"));
1594  pixel_text->setToolTip(tr("pixel value at the position (x,y)"));
1595  }
1596 
1597  lists_text->setText("Lin(t) & Lout(t)");
1598 
1599  if( filters2 != NULL )
1600  {
1601  delete filters2;
1602  filters2 = NULL;
1603  }
1604 
1605  if( filters2 == NULL )
1606  {
1607  if( isRgb1 )
1608  {
1609  filters2 = new ofeli::Filters(img1, img_width, img_height, 3);
1610  }
1611  else
1612  {
1613  filters2 = new ofeli::Filters(img1, img_width, img_height, 1);
1614  }
1615  }
1616 
1617  disconnect(scale_spin,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),this,SLOT(do_scale(int)));
1618  disconnect(scale_spin0,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),this,SLOT(do_scale0(int)));
1619 
1620  scale_spin->setMaximum(1000000/img_height);
1621  scale_spin->setSingleStep(80000/(7*img_height));
1622  scale_spin0->setMaximum(1000000/img_height);
1623  scale_spin0->setSingleStep(80000/(7*img_height));
1624 
1625  scale_slider->setMaximum(160000/img_height);
1626  scale_slider->setTickInterval(160000/(7*img_height));
1627  scale_slider0->setMaximum(160000/img_height);
1628  scale_slider0->setTickInterval(160000/(7*img_height));
1629 
1630  scale_spin0->setValue(int(100.0*double(imageLabel->getPixWidth())/double(img_width)));
1631 
1632  connect(scale_spin,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),this,SLOT(do_scale(int)));
1633  connect(scale_spin0,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),this,SLOT(do_scale0(int)));
1634 
1635  if( img1 != NULL )
1636  {
1637  hasAlgoBreaking = false;
1638  hasStepByStep = false;
1639  hasClickStopping = false;
1640  printAct->setEnabled(true);
1641  zoomInAct->setEnabled(true);
1642  zoomOutAct->setEnabled(true);
1643  normalSizeAct->setEnabled(true);
1644  startAct->setEnabled(true);
1645  open_phi_button->setEnabled(true);
1646  save_phi_button->setEnabled(true);
1647  saveAct->setEnabled(true);
1648  }
1649  }
1650 }
1651 
1652 void ImageViewer::print()
1654 {
1655  Q_ASSERT(imageLabel->pixmap());
1656 #ifndef QT_NO_PRINTER
1657 
1658  QPrintDialog dialog(&printer, this);
1660  if (dialog.exec()) {
1661  QPainter painter(&printer);
1662  QRect rect = painter.viewport();
1663  QSize size = imageLabel->pixmap()->size();
1664  size.scale(rect.size(), Qt::KeepAspectRatio);
1665  painter.setViewport(rect.x(), rect.y(), size.width(), size.height());
1666  painter.setWindow(imageLabel->pixmap()->rect());
1667  painter.drawPixmap(0, 0, *imageLabel->pixmap());
1668  }
1669 #endif
1670 }
1671 
1672 void ImageViewer::zoomIn()
1673 {
1674  //scaleImage(1.25);
1675  scale_spin0->setValue( int(100.0f*imageLabel->get_zoomFactor()*1.25f) );
1676 }
1677 
1678 void ImageViewer::zoomOut()
1679 {
1680  //scaleImage(0.8);
1681  scale_spin0->setValue( int(100.0f*imageLabel->get_zoomFactor()*0.8f) );
1682 }
1683 
1684 void ImageViewer::normalSize()
1685 {
1686  //imageLabel->adjustSize();
1687  //scaleFactor = 1.0;
1688  scale_spin0->setValue(100);
1689 }
1690 
1691 // Fonction appelée pour effectuer la segmentation
1692 void ImageViewer::start()
1693 {
1694  startAct->setEnabled(false);
1695  openAct->setEnabled(false);
1696  stopAct->setEnabled(true);
1697 
1698  if( img1 != NULL )
1699  {
1700  if( filters1 != NULL )
1701  {
1702  delete filters1;
1703  filters1 = NULL;
1704  }
1705 
1706  if( filters1 == NULL )
1707  {
1708  if( isRgb1 )
1709  {
1710  filters1 = new ofeli::Filters(img1, img_width, img_height, 3);
1711  }
1712  else
1713  {
1714  filters1 = new ofeli::Filters(img1, img_width, img_height, 1);
1715  }
1716  }
1717 
1718  if( hasPreprocess )
1719  {
1720  if( hasGaussianNoise )
1721  {
1722  filters1->gaussian_white_noise(std_noise);
1723  }
1724  if( hasSaltNoise )
1725  {
1726  filters1->salt_pepper_noise(proba_noise);
1727  }
1728  if( hasSpeckleNoise )
1729  {
1730  filters1->speckle(std_speckle_noise);
1731  }
1732 
1733  if( hasMeanFilt )
1734  {
1735  filters1->mean_filtering(kernel_mean_length1);
1736  }
1737  if( hasGaussianFilt )
1738  {
1739  filters1->gaussian_filtering(kernel_gaussian_length1, sigma);
1740  }
1741 
1742  if( hasMedianFilt )
1743  {
1744  if( hasO1algo1 )
1745  {
1746  filters1->median_filtering_o1(kernel_median_length1);
1747  }
1748  else
1749  {
1750  filters1->median_filtering_oNlogN(kernel_median_length1);
1751  }
1752  }
1753  if( hasAnisoDiff )
1754  {
1755  filters1->anisotropic_diffusion(max_itera1, lambda1, kappa1, aniso_option1);
1756  }
1757  if( hasOpenFilt )
1758  {
1759  if( hasO1morpho1 )
1760  {
1761  filters1->opening_o1(kernel_open_length1);
1762  }
1763  else
1764  {
1765  filters1->opening(kernel_open_length1);
1766  }
1767  }
1768  if( hasCloseFilt )
1769  {
1770  if( hasO1morpho1 )
1771  {
1772  filters1->closing_o1(kernel_close_length1);
1773  }
1774  else
1775  {
1776  filters1->closing(kernel_close_length1);
1777  }
1778  }
1779  if( hasTophatFilt )
1780  {
1781  if( isWhiteTophat )
1782  {
1783  if( hasO1morpho1 )
1784  {
1785  filters1->white_top_hat_o1(kernel_tophat_length1);
1786  }
1787  else
1788  {
1789  filters1->white_top_hat(kernel_tophat_length1);
1790  }
1791  }
1792  else
1793  {
1794  if( hasO1morpho1 )
1795  {
1796  filters1->black_top_hat_o1(kernel_tophat_length1);
1797  }
1798  else
1799  {
1800  filters1->black_top_hat(kernel_tophat_length1);
1801  }
1802  }
1803  }
1804  }
1805 
1806  const unsigned char* img1_filtered = NULL;
1807 
1808  if( model == 1 )
1809  {
1810  img1_filtered = filters1->get_filtered();
1811  }
1812  if( model == 2 )
1813  {
1814  if( isRgb1 )
1815  {
1816  filters1->morphological_gradient_yuv(kernel_gradient_length1,alpha1,beta1,gamma1);
1817  img1_filtered = filters1->get_gradient();
1818  }
1819  else
1820  {
1821  filters1->morphological_gradient(kernel_gradient_length1);
1822  img1_filtered = filters1->get_filtered();
1823  }
1824  }
1825 
1826  /*if( show_original )
1827  {
1828  img1_filtered = img1;
1829  }*/
1830 
1831 
1832  int offset;
1833 
1834  unsigned char I;
1835 
1836  // if not a new image is loaded
1837  if( ac != NULL )
1838  {
1839  // efface les contours de la QImage
1840  if( !isRgb1 || model == 2 )
1841  {
1842  if( model == 2 && hasHistoNormaliz )
1843  {
1844  int min, max;
1845 
1846  if( outside_combo != 9 )
1847  {
1848  for( ofeli::list<int>::const_iterator it = Lout1->begin(); !it.end(); ++it )
1849  {
1850  offset = *it;
1851 
1852  I = (unsigned char)(255.0*double(img1_filtered[offset]-min)/double(max-min));
1853 
1854  image_result_uchar[3*offset] = I;
1855  image_result_uchar[3*offset+1] = I;
1856  image_result_uchar[3*offset+2] = I;
1857  }
1858  }
1859 
1860  if( inside_combo != 9 )
1861  {
1862  for( ofeli::list<int>::const_iterator it = Lin1->begin(); !it.end(); ++it )
1863  {
1864  offset = *it;
1865 
1866  I = (unsigned char)(255.0*double(img1_filtered[offset]-min)/double(max-min));
1867 
1868  image_result_uchar[3*offset] = I;
1869  image_result_uchar[3*offset+1] = I;
1870  image_result_uchar[3*offset+2] = I;
1871  }
1872  }
1873  }
1874 
1875  else
1876  {
1877  if( outside_combo != 9 )
1878  {
1879  for( ofeli::list<int>::const_iterator it = Lout1->begin(); !it.end(); ++it )
1880  {
1881  offset = *it;
1882 
1883  I = img1_filtered[offset];
1884 
1885  image_result_uchar[3*offset] = I;
1886  image_result_uchar[3*offset+1] = I;
1887  image_result_uchar[3*offset+2] = I;
1888  }
1889  }
1890 
1891  if( inside_combo != 9 )
1892  {
1893  for( ofeli::list<int>::const_iterator it = Lin1->begin(); !it.end(); ++it )
1894  {
1895  offset = *it;
1896 
1897  I = img1_filtered[offset];
1898 
1899  image_result_uchar[3*offset] = I;
1900  image_result_uchar[3*offset+1] = I;
1901  image_result_uchar[3*offset+2] = I;
1902  }
1903  }
1904  }
1905  }
1906  else
1907  {
1908  if( outside_combo != 9 )
1909  {
1910  for( ofeli::list<int>::const_iterator it = Lout1->begin(); !it.end(); ++it )
1911  {
1912  offset = *it*3;
1913 
1914  image_result_uchar[offset] = img1_filtered[offset];
1915  image_result_uchar[offset+1] = img1_filtered[offset+1];
1916  image_result_uchar[offset+2] = img1_filtered[offset+2];
1917  }
1918  }
1919 
1920  if( inside_combo != 9 )
1921  {
1922  for( ofeli::list<int>::const_iterator it = Lin1->begin(); !it.end(); ++it )
1923  {
1924  offset = *it*3;
1925 
1926  image_result_uchar[offset] = img1_filtered[offset];
1927  image_result_uchar[offset+1] = img1_filtered[offset+1];
1928  image_result_uchar[offset+2] = img1_filtered[offset+2];
1929  }
1930  }
1931  }
1932  }
1933 
1934  // Création d'un objet contour actif
1935 
1936  // objets crees en dynamique et appel du 2eme constructeur
1937  if( ac != NULL )
1938  {
1939  delete ac;
1940  ac = NULL;
1941  }
1942 
1943  if( model == 1 )
1944  {
1945  if( isRgb1 )
1946  {
1947  ac = new ofeli::ACwithoutEdgesYUV(img1_filtered, img_width, img_height, phi_init1_clean, hasSmoothingCycle1, kernel_curve1, std_curve1, Na1, Ns1, lambda_out1, lambda_in1, alpha1, beta1, gamma1);
1948  }
1949  else
1950  {
1951  ac = new ofeli::ACwithoutEdges(img1_filtered, img_width, img_height, phi_init1_clean, hasSmoothingCycle1, kernel_curve1, std_curve1, Na1, Ns1, lambda_out1, lambda_in1);
1952  }
1953  }
1954 
1955  if( model == 2 )
1956  {
1957  ac = new ofeli::GeodesicAC(img1_filtered, img_width, img_height, phi_init1_clean, hasSmoothingCycle1, kernel_curve1, std_curve1, Na1, Ns1);
1958  }
1959 
1960  show_phi_list_value();
1961 
1962  // Conditions de la boucle do-while
1963 
1964  iteration1 = ac->get_iteration();
1965 
1966  if( hasAlgoBreaking )
1967  {
1968  hasAlgoBreaking = false;
1969  startAct->setEnabled(true);
1970  openAct->setEnabled(true);
1971  stopAct->setEnabled(false);
1972  return;
1973  }
1974 
1975  if( outside_combo == 8 )
1976  {
1977  Rout1 = Rout_selected1;
1978  Gout1 = Gout_selected1;
1979  Bout1 = Bout_selected1;
1980  }
1981  else
1982  {
1983  get_color(outside_combo,Rout1,Gout1,Bout1);
1984  }
1985 
1986  if( inside_combo == 8 )
1987  {
1988  Rin1 = Rin_selected1;
1989  Gin1 = Gin_selected1;
1990  Bin1 = Bin_selected1;
1991  }
1992  else
1993  {
1994  get_color(inside_combo,Rin1,Gin1,Bin1);
1995  }
1996 
1997  Lout1 = &ac->get_Lout();
1998  Lin1 = &ac->get_Lin();
1999 
2000  time_text->setText(tr("time ="));
2001 
2002  if( model == 1 )
2003  {
2004  stackedWidget->setCurrentIndex(0);
2005  }
2006 
2007  if( model == 2 )
2008  {
2009  stackedWidget->setCurrentIndex(1);
2010  }
2011 
2013  // affiche une fois le contour actif avec l'image filtrée en dessous
2015 
2016  unsigned char max, min;
2017 
2018  if( !isRgb1 || model == 2 )
2019  {
2020  if( model == 2 && hasHistoNormaliz )
2021  {
2022  max = 0;
2023  min = 255;
2024 
2025  for( offset = 0; offset < img_size; offset++ )
2026  {
2027  if( img1_filtered[offset] > max )
2028  {
2029  max = img1_filtered[offset];
2030  }
2031  if( img1_filtered[offset] < min )
2032  {
2033  min = img1_filtered[offset];
2034  }
2035  }
2036 
2037  for( offset = 0; offset < img_size; offset++ )
2038  {
2039  I = (unsigned char)(255.0*double(img1_filtered[offset]-min)/double(max-min));
2040 
2041  image_result_uchar[3*offset] = I;
2042  image_result_uchar[3*offset+1] = I;
2043  image_result_uchar[3*offset+2] = I;
2044  }
2045  }
2046 
2047  else
2048  {
2049  for( offset = 0; offset < img_size; offset++ )
2050  {
2051  I = img1_filtered[offset];
2052 
2053  image_result_uchar[3*offset] = I;
2054  image_result_uchar[3*offset+1] = I;
2055  image_result_uchar[3*offset+2] = I;
2056  }
2057  }
2058  }
2059  else
2060  {
2061  std::memcpy(image_result_uchar,img1_filtered,3*img_size);
2062  }
2063 
2064  if( hasGaussianNoise || hasSaltNoise || hasSpeckleNoise || hasMeanFilt || hasGaussianFilt || hasMedianFilt || hasAnisoDiff || hasOpenFilt || hasCloseFilt || hasTophatFilt || model == 2 )
2065  {
2066  if( isRgb1 )
2067  {
2068  image_save_preprocess = image_result.copy(0,0,img_width,img_height);
2069  }
2070  else
2071  {
2072  QVector<QRgb> table(256);
2073  for( int I = 0; I < 256; I++ )
2074  {
2075  table[I] = qRgb(I,I,I);
2076  }
2077  image_save_preprocess.setColorTable(table);
2078 
2079  int x, y; // position
2080 
2081  for( int offset = 0; offset < img_size; offset++ )
2082  {
2083  // offset = x+y*img_width <==>
2084  y = offset/img_width;
2085  x = offset-y*img_width;
2086 
2087  *( image_save_preprocess.scanLine(y)+x ) = img1_filtered[offset];
2088  }
2089  }
2090  }
2091 
2092  // marque les contours
2093  if( outside_combo != 9 )
2094  {
2095  for( ofeli::list<int>::const_iterator it = Lout1->begin(); !it.end(); ++it )
2096  {
2097  offset = *it*3;
2098 
2099  image_result_uchar[offset] = Rout1;
2100  image_result_uchar[offset+1] = Gout1;
2101  image_result_uchar[offset+2] = Bout1;
2102  }
2103  }
2104 
2105  if( inside_combo != 9 )
2106  {
2107  for( ofeli::list<int>::const_iterator it = Lin1->begin(); !it.end(); ++it )
2108  {
2109  offset = *it*3;
2110 
2111  image_result_uchar[offset] = Rin1;
2112  image_result_uchar[offset+1] = Gin1;
2113  image_result_uchar[offset+2] = Bin1;
2114  }
2115  }
2116 
2117  image_disp = 2;
2118 
2119  QApplication::processEvents();
2120  // Affichage
2121  imageLabel->set_qimage(image_result);
2122 
2123  if( hasStepByStep )
2124  {
2125  hasClickStopping = true;
2126  }
2127  infinite_loop();
2128 
2129  // efface les contours de la QImage
2130  if( !isRgb1 || model == 2 )
2131  {
2132  if( model == 2 && hasHistoNormaliz )
2133  {
2134  if( outside_combo != 9 )
2135  {
2136  for( ofeli::list<int>::const_iterator it = Lout1->begin(); !it.end(); ++it )
2137  {
2138  offset = *it;
2139 
2140  I = (unsigned char)(255.0*double(img1_filtered[offset]-min)/double(max-min));
2141 
2142  image_result_uchar[3*offset] = I;
2143  image_result_uchar[3*offset+1] = I;
2144  image_result_uchar[3*offset+2] = I;
2145  }
2146  }
2147 
2148  if( inside_combo != 9 )
2149  {
2150  for( ofeli::list<int>::const_iterator it = Lin1->begin(); !it.end(); ++it )
2151  {
2152  offset = *it;
2153 
2154  I = (unsigned char)(255.0*double(img1_filtered[offset]-min)/double(max-min));
2155 
2156  image_result_uchar[3*offset] = I;
2157  image_result_uchar[3*offset+1] = I;
2158  image_result_uchar[3*offset+2] = I;
2159  }
2160  }
2161  }
2162 
2163  else
2164  {
2165  if( outside_combo != 9 )
2166  {
2167  for( ofeli::list<int>::const_iterator it = Lout1->begin(); !it.end(); ++it )
2168  {
2169  offset = *it;
2170 
2171  I = img1_filtered[offset];
2172 
2173  image_result_uchar[3*offset] = I;
2174  image_result_uchar[3*offset+1] = I;
2175  image_result_uchar[3*offset+2] = I;
2176  }
2177  }
2178 
2179  if( inside_combo != 9 )
2180  {
2181  for( ofeli::list<int>::const_iterator it = Lin1->begin(); !it.end(); ++it )
2182  {
2183  offset = *it;
2184 
2185  I = img1_filtered[offset];
2186 
2187  image_result_uchar[3*offset] = I;
2188  image_result_uchar[3*offset+1] = I;
2189  image_result_uchar[3*offset+2] = I;
2190  }
2191  }
2192  }
2193  }
2194  else
2195  {
2196  if( outside_combo != 9 )
2197  {
2198  for( ofeli::list<int>::const_iterator it = Lout1->begin(); !it.end(); ++it )
2199  {
2200  offset = *it*3;
2201 
2202  image_result_uchar[offset] = img1_filtered[offset];
2203  image_result_uchar[offset+1] = img1_filtered[offset+1];
2204  image_result_uchar[offset+2] = img1_filtered[offset+2];
2205  }
2206  }
2207 
2208  if( inside_combo != 9 )
2209  {
2210  for( ofeli::list<int>::const_iterator it = Lin1->begin(); !it.end(); ++it )
2211  {
2212  offset = *it*3;
2213 
2214  image_result_uchar[offset] = img1_filtered[offset];
2215  image_result_uchar[offset+1] = img1_filtered[offset+1];
2216  image_result_uchar[offset+2] = img1_filtered[offset+2];
2217  }
2218  }
2219  }
2220 
2222  // fin de
2224 
2225  imageLabel->setMouseTracking(false);
2226 
2227  double elapsedTime;
2228  std::clock_t startTime, stopTime;
2229 
2230  statusBar()->showMessage(tr("Active contour evolving."));
2231  time_text->setText("<font color=green>"+tr("time = _._____ s"));
2232 
2233  if( hasDisplayEach )
2234  {
2235  // Pour calculer le temps d'exécution
2236  startTime = std::clock();
2237 
2239  // Boucle do-while, évolution de l'algorithme
2241  while( !ac->get_isStopped() )
2242  {
2243  if( hasAlgoBreaking )
2244  {
2245  hasAlgoBreaking = false;
2246  startAct->setEnabled(true);
2247  openAct->setEnabled(true);
2248  stopAct->setEnabled(false);
2249  return;
2250  }
2251 
2252  if( hasStepByStep )
2253  {
2254  hasClickStopping = true;
2255  }
2256 
2257  // efface les contours de la QImage
2258  if( !isRgb1 || model == 2 )
2259  {
2260  if( model == 2 && hasHistoNormaliz )
2261  {
2262  if( outside_combo != 9 )
2263  {
2264  for( ofeli::list<int>::const_iterator it = Lout1->begin(); !it.end(); ++it )
2265  {
2266  offset = *it;
2267 
2268  I = (unsigned char)(255.0*double(img1_filtered[offset]-min)/double(max-min));
2269 
2270  image_result_uchar[3*offset] = I;
2271  image_result_uchar[3*offset+1] = I;
2272  image_result_uchar[3*offset+2] = I;
2273  }
2274  }
2275 
2276  if( inside_combo != 9 )
2277  {
2278  for( ofeli::list<int>::const_iterator it = Lin1->begin(); !it.end(); ++it )
2279  {
2280  offset = *it;
2281 
2282  I = (unsigned char)(255.0*double(img1_filtered[offset]-min)/double(max-min));
2283 
2284  image_result_uchar[3*offset] = I;
2285  image_result_uchar[3*offset+1] = I;
2286  image_result_uchar[3*offset+2] = I;
2287  }
2288  }
2289 
2290  }
2291 
2292  else
2293  {
2294  if( outside_combo != 9 )
2295  {
2296  for( ofeli::list<int>::const_iterator it = Lout1->begin(); !it.end(); ++it )
2297  {
2298  offset = *it;
2299 
2300  I = img1_filtered[offset];
2301 
2302  image_result_uchar[3*offset] = I;
2303  image_result_uchar[3*offset+1] = I;
2304  image_result_uchar[3*offset+2] = I;
2305  }
2306  }
2307 
2308  if( inside_combo != 9 )
2309  {
2310  for( ofeli::list<int>::const_iterator it = Lin1->begin(); !it.end(); ++it )
2311  {
2312  offset = *it;
2313 
2314  I = img1_filtered[offset];
2315 
2316  image_result_uchar[3*offset] = I;
2317  image_result_uchar[3*offset+1] = I;
2318  image_result_uchar[3*offset+2] = I;
2319  }
2320  }
2321  }
2322  }
2323 
2324  else
2325  {
2326  if( outside_combo != 9 )
2327  {
2328  for( ofeli::list<int>::const_iterator it = Lout1->begin(); !it.end(); ++it )
2329  {
2330  offset = *it*3;
2331 
2332  image_result_uchar[offset] = img1_filtered[offset];
2333  image_result_uchar[offset+1] = img1_filtered[offset+1];
2334  image_result_uchar[offset+2] = img1_filtered[offset+2];
2335  }
2336  }
2337 
2338  if( inside_combo != 9 )
2339  {
2340  for( ofeli::list<int>::const_iterator it = Lin1->begin(); !it.end(); ++it )
2341  {
2342  offset = *it*3;
2343 
2344  image_result_uchar[offset] = img1_filtered[offset];
2345  image_result_uchar[offset+1] = img1_filtered[offset+1];
2346  image_result_uchar[offset+2] = img1_filtered[offset+2];
2347  }
2348  }
2349  }
2350 
2351  ++(*ac);
2352  Lout1 = &ac->get_Lout();
2353  Lin1 = &ac->get_Lin();
2354 
2355  // marque les contours dans la QImage
2356  if( outside_combo != 9 )
2357  {
2358  for( ofeli::list<int>::const_iterator it = Lout1->begin(); !it.end(); ++it )
2359  {
2360  offset = *it*3;
2361 
2362  image_result_uchar[offset] = Rout1;
2363  image_result_uchar[offset+1] = Gout1;
2364  image_result_uchar[offset+2] = Bout1;
2365  }
2366  }
2367 
2368  if( inside_combo != 9 )
2369  {
2370  for( ofeli::list<int>::const_iterator it = Lin1->begin(); !it.end(); ++it )
2371  {
2372  offset = *it*3;
2373 
2374  image_result_uchar[offset] = Rin1;
2375  image_result_uchar[offset+1] = Gin1;
2376  image_result_uchar[offset+2] = Bin1;
2377  }
2378  }
2379 
2380  // Pour afficher plusieurs fois dans une boucle
2381  QApplication::processEvents();
2382  // Affichage
2383  imageLabel->update();
2384 
2385  if( hasClickStopping )
2386  {
2387  show_phi_list_value();
2388  }
2389  infinite_loop();
2390  }
2391 
2392  // Temps d'exécution de la boucle do-while
2393  stopTime = std::clock();
2394  elapsedTime = (stopTime - startTime) / double(CLOCKS_PER_SEC);
2395  }
2396  // on affiche rien du tout pour evaluer le temps de calcul
2397  // if( !hasDisplayEach )
2398  else
2399  {
2400  startTime = std::clock();
2401 
2402  ac->evolve();
2403  Lout1 = &ac->get_Lout();
2404  Lin1 = &ac->get_Lin();
2405 
2406  // Temps d'exécution
2407  stopTime = std::clock();
2408  elapsedTime = (stopTime - startTime) / double(CLOCKS_PER_SEC);
2409 
2410  // marque les contours dans la QImage
2411  if( outside_combo != 9 )
2412  {
2413  for( ofeli::list<int>::const_iterator it = Lout1->begin(); !it.end(); ++it )
2414  {
2415  offset = *it*3;
2416 
2417  image_result_uchar[offset] = Rout1;
2418  image_result_uchar[offset+1] = Gout1;
2419  image_result_uchar[offset+2] = Bout1;
2420  }
2421  }
2422  if( inside_combo != 9 )
2423  {
2424  for( ofeli::list<int>::const_iterator it = Lin1->begin(); !it.end(); ++it )
2425  {
2426  offset = *it*3;
2427 
2428  image_result_uchar[offset] = Rin1;
2429  image_result_uchar[offset+1] = Gin1;
2430  image_result_uchar[offset+2] = Bin1;
2431  }
2432  }
2433 
2434  // Pour afficher plusieurs fois dans une boucle
2435  QApplication::processEvents();
2436  // Affichage
2437  imageLabel->update();
2438 
2439  if( hasClickStopping )
2440  {
2441  show_phi_list_value();
2442  }
2443  infinite_loop();
2444  }
2445 
2446  time_text->setText("<font color=red>"+tr("time = ")+QString::number(elapsedTime)+" s");
2447  show_phi_list_value();
2448  statusBar()->clearMessage();
2449 
2450  imageLabel->setMouseTracking(true);
2451 
2452  hasResultDisp = true;
2453 
2454  openAct->setEnabled(true);
2455 
2456  statusBar()->showMessage(tr("Push the left mouse button or click on the right mouse button in the window."));
2457  }
2458 
2459  hasStepByStep = false;
2460  startAct->setEnabled(true);
2461  stopAct->setEnabled(false);
2462 
2463 }
2464 
2465 void ImageViewer::wait(double seconds)
2466 {
2467  QApplication::processEvents();
2468 
2469  std::clock_t endwait;
2470  endwait = std::clock()+seconds *CLOCKS_PER_SEC ;
2471  while( std::clock() < endwait )
2472  {
2473  }
2474 }
2475 
2476 // Quand on clique dans le menu sur l'entrée About, la fenêtre about_window s'affiche
2477 void ImageViewer::about()
2478 {
2479  about_window->show();
2480 }
2481 
2482 // Creation des actions de la barre de menu
2483 void ImageViewer::createActions()
2484 {
2485  openAct = new QAction(tr("&Open..."), this);
2486  openAct->setShortcut(tr("Ctrl+O"));
2487  openAct->setStatusTip(tr("Open an image file (*.png, *.bmp, *.jpg, *.jpeg, *.tiff, *.tif, *.gif, *.pbm, *.pgm, *.ppm, *.svg, *.svgz, *.mng, *.xbm, *.xpm)."));
2488  connect(openAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(openFileName()));
2489 
2490  for( int i = 0; i < MaxRecentFiles; ++i )
2491  {
2492  recentFileActs[i] = new QAction(this);
2493  recentFileActs[i]->setVisible(false);
2494  connect(recentFileActs[i], SIGNAL(triggered()),
2495  this, SLOT(openRecentFile()));
2496  }
2497 
2498  deleteAct = new QAction(tr("× Delete list"), this);
2499  deleteAct->setStatusTip(tr("Clean the recent files list."));
2500  connect(deleteAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(deleteList()));
2501 
2502  saveAct = new QAction(tr("S&ave..."), this);
2503  saveAct->setShortcut(tr("Ctrl+A"));
2504  saveAct->setEnabled(false);
2505  saveAct->setStatusTip(tr("Save the displayed and preprocessed images."));
2506  connect(saveAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(saveImage()));
2507 
2508  printAct = new QAction(tr("&Print..."), this);
2509  printAct->setShortcut(tr("Ctrl+P"));
2510  printAct->setEnabled(false);
2511  connect(printAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(print()));
2512 
2513  exitAct = new QAction(tr("E&xit"), this);
2514  exitAct->setShortcut(tr("Ctrl+X"));
2515  connect(exitAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(close()));
2516 
2517  zoomInAct = new QAction(tr("Zoom &In (25%)"), this);
2518  zoomInAct->setShortcut(tr("Ctrl++"));
2519  zoomInAct->setEnabled(false);
2520  connect(zoomInAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(zoomIn()));
2521 
2522  zoomOutAct = new QAction(tr("Zoom &Out (25%)"), this);
2523  zoomOutAct->setShortcut(tr("Ctrl+-"));
2524  zoomOutAct->setEnabled(false);
2525  connect(zoomOutAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(zoomOut()));
2526 
2527  normalSizeAct = new QAction(tr("&Normal Size"), this);
2528  normalSizeAct->setShortcut(tr("Ctrl+N"));
2529  normalSizeAct->setEnabled(false);
2530  connect(normalSizeAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(normalSize()));
2531 
2532  startAct = new QAction(tr("&Start"), this);
2533  startAct->setShortcut(tr("Ctrl+S"));
2534  startAct->setEnabled(false);
2535  startAct->setStatusTip(tr("Start the active contour."));
2536  connect(startAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(start()));
2537 
2538  stopAct = new QAction(tr("S&top"), this);
2539  stopAct->setShortcut(tr("Ctrl+T"));
2540  stopAct->setEnabled(false);
2541  connect(stopAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(stop()));
2542 
2543  evaluateAct = new QAction(tr("E&valuate"), this);
2544  evaluateAct->setStatusTip(tr("Compute the modified Hausdorff distance."));
2545  evaluateAct->setShortcut(tr("Ctrl+V"));
2546  evaluateAct->setEnabled(true);
2547  connect(evaluateAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(evaluation()));
2548 
2549  settingsAct = new QAction(tr("S&ettings"), this);
2550  settingsAct->setStatusTip(tr("Image preprocessing and active contour initialization."));
2551  settingsAct->setShortcut(tr("Ctrl+E"));
2552  settingsAct->setEnabled(true);
2553  connect(settingsAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(settings()));
2554 
2555  menuBar()->addSeparator();
2556 
2557  aboutAct = new QAction(tr("&About"), this);
2558  aboutAct->setStatusTip(tr("Information, license and home page."));
2559  connect(aboutAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(about()));
2560 
2561  languageAct = new QAction(tr("&Language"), this);
2562  languageAct->setStatusTip(tr("Choose the application language."));
2563  connect(languageAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(language()));
2564 
2565  docAct = new QAction(tr("&Documentation"), this);
2566  docAct->setStatusTip(tr("Online developer's documentation."));
2567  connect(docAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(doc()));
2568 
2569  aboutQtAct = new QAction(tr("About &Qt"), this);
2570  connect(aboutQtAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), qApp, SLOT(aboutQt()));
2571 }
2572 
2573 // Creation du menu de la fenêtre principale
2574 void ImageViewer::createMenus()
2575 {
2576  fileMenu = new QMenu(tr("&File"), this);
2577  fileMenu->addAction(openAct);
2578 
2579  separatorAct = fileMenu->addSeparator();
2580  for( int i = 0; i < MaxRecentFiles; ++i )
2581  {
2582  fileMenu->addAction(recentFileActs[i]);
2583  }
2584 
2585  fileMenu->addAction(deleteAct);
2586 
2587  fileMenu->addSeparator();
2588 
2589  fileMenu->addAction(saveAct);
2590  fileMenu->addAction(printAct);
2591  fileMenu->addSeparator();
2592  fileMenu->addAction(exitAct);
2593 
2594  updateRecentFileActions();
2595 
2596  viewMenu = new QMenu(tr("&View"), this);
2597  viewMenu->addAction(zoomInAct);
2598  viewMenu->addAction(zoomOutAct);
2599  viewMenu->addAction(normalSizeAct);
2600 
2601  segmentationMenu = new QMenu(tr("&Segmentation"), this);
2602  segmentationMenu->addAction(startAct);
2603  segmentationMenu->addAction(stopAct);
2604  segmentationMenu->addAction(evaluateAct);
2605  segmentationMenu->addAction(settingsAct);
2606 
2607  helpMenu = new QMenu(tr("&Help"), this);
2608  helpMenu->addAction(aboutAct);
2609  helpMenu->addAction(languageAct);
2610  helpMenu->addAction(docAct);
2611  //helpMenu->addAction(aboutQtAct);
2612 
2613  menuBar()->addMenu(fileMenu);
2614  menuBar()->addMenu(viewMenu);
2615  menuBar()->addMenu(segmentationMenu);
2616  menuBar()->addMenu(helpMenu);
2617 }
2618 
2619 // Fonction d'origine, modifiée pour le changement d'echelle de l'image
2620 void ImageViewer::scaleImage(double factor)
2621 {
2622  Q_ASSERT(imageLabel->pixmap());
2623  scaleFactor *= factor;
2624  imageLabel->resize(scaleFactor * imageLabel->pixmap()->size());
2625 
2626  // ajout de code, pour récuperer les infos lors d'un zoom pour la segmentation
2628 
2629  adjustScrollBar(scrollArea->horizontalScrollBar(), factor);
2630  adjustScrollBar(scrollArea->verticalScrollBar(), factor);
2631 
2632  zoomInAct->setEnabled(scaleFactor < 3.0);
2633  zoomOutAct->setEnabled(scaleFactor > 0.333);
2634 }
2635 
2636 void ImageViewer::adjustScrollBar(QScrollBar *scrollBar, double factor)
2637 {
2638  scrollBar->setValue(int(factor * scrollBar->value()
2639  + ((factor - 1) * scrollBar->pageStep()/2)));
2640 }
2641 
2642 
2643 
2645 
2646 
2647 
2649 
2650 // Création du layout pour l'onglet algorithm de la fenêtre de configuration
2651 QVBoxLayout *ImageViewer::algorithm()
2652 {
2653  // création de 3 groupbox pour l'onglet algorithm
2654 
2657 
2658  QGroupBox* externalspeed_groupbox = new QGroupBox(tr("Cycle 1 : data dependant evolution"));
2659 
2660  Na_spin = new QSpinBox;
2661  Na_spin->setSingleStep(1);
2662  Na_spin->setMinimum(1);
2663  Na_spin->setMaximum(999);
2664  Na_spin->setSuffix(tr(" iterations"));
2665  Na_spin->setToolTip(tr("iterations in the cycle 1, active contour penetrability"));
2666  QFormLayout *Na_layout = new QFormLayout;
2667  Na_layout->addRow("Na =", Na_spin);
2668  if( operating_system == 2 )
2669  {
2670  Na_layout->setFormAlignment(Qt::AlignLeft);
2671  }
2672 
2673  klength_gradient_spin = new QSpinBox;
2674  klength_gradient_spin->setSingleStep(2);
2675  klength_gradient_spin->setMinimum(1);
2676  klength_gradient_spin->setMaximum(499);
2677 
2678  chanvese_radio = new QRadioButton(tr("Chan-Vese model"));
2679  chanvese_radio->setToolTip(tr("region-based model for bimodal images"));
2680 
2681  lambda_out_spin = new QSpinBox;
2682  lambda_out_spin->setSingleStep(1);
2683  lambda_out_spin->setMinimum(0);
2684  lambda_out_spin->setMaximum(100000);
2685  lambda_out_spin->setToolTip(tr("weight of the outside homogeneity criterion"));
2686 
2687  lambda_in_spin = new QSpinBox;
2688  lambda_in_spin->setSingleStep(1);
2689  lambda_in_spin->setMinimum(0);
2690  lambda_in_spin->setMaximum(100000);
2691  lambda_in_spin->setToolTip(tr("weight of the inside homogeneity criterion"));
2692 
2693  QFormLayout* lambda_layout = new QFormLayout;
2694  QSettings settings("Bessy", "Ofeli");
2695  outside_combo = settings.value("Settings/Display/outside_combo", 2).toInt();
2696  inside_combo = settings.value("Settings/Display/inside_combo", 0).toInt();
2697 
2698  Rout_selected1 = (unsigned char)(settings.value("Settings/Display/Rout_selected", 128).toInt());
2699  Gout_selected1 = (unsigned char)(settings.value("Settings/Display/Gout_selected", 0).toInt());
2700  Bout_selected1 = (unsigned char)(settings.value("Settings/Display/Bout_selected", 255).toInt());
2701  Rin_selected1 = (unsigned char)(settings.value("Settings/Display/Rin_selected", 255).toInt());
2702  Gin_selected1 = (unsigned char)(settings.value("Settings/Display/Gin_selected", 128).toInt());
2703  Bin_selected1 = (unsigned char)(settings.value("Settings/Display/Bin_selected", 0).toInt());
2704 
2705  if( outside_combo == 8 )
2706  {
2707  Rout1 = Rout_selected1;
2708  Gout1 = Gout_selected1;
2709  Bout1 = Bout_selected1;
2710  }
2711  else
2712  {
2713  get_color(outside_combo,Rout1,Gout1,Bout1);
2714  }
2715 
2716  if( inside_combo == 8 )
2717  {
2718  Rin1 = Rin_selected1;
2719  Gin1 = Gin_selected1;
2720  Bin1 = Bin_selected1;
2721  }
2722  else
2723  {
2724  get_color(inside_combo,Rin1,Gin1,Bin1);
2725  }
2726 
2727  QColor RGBout_list(Rout1,Gout1,Bout1);
2728  QColor RGBin_list(Rin1,Gin1,Bin1);
2729  lambda_layout->addRow("<font color="+RGBout_list.name()+">"+"λout"+"<font color=black>"+" =", lambda_out_spin);
2730  lambda_layout->addRow("<font color="+RGBin_list.name()+">"+"λin"+"<font color=black>"+" =", lambda_in_spin);
2731  if( operating_system == 2 )
2732  {
2733  lambda_layout->setFormAlignment(Qt::AlignLeft);
2734  }
2735 
2736  QVBoxLayout* chanvese_layout = new QVBoxLayout;
2737  chanvese_layout->addWidget(chanvese_radio);
2738  chanvese_layout->addLayout(lambda_layout);
2739 
2740  geodesic_radio = new QRadioButton(tr("geodesic model"));
2741  geodesic_radio->setToolTip(tr("edge-based model for smoothed multimodal images"));
2742 
2743  klength_gradient_spin = new QSpinBox;
2744  klength_gradient_spin->setSingleStep(2);
2745  klength_gradient_spin->setMinimum(1);
2746  klength_gradient_spin->setMaximum(499);
2747  klength_gradient_spin->setSuffix("²");
2748  klength_gradient_spin->setToolTip(tr("morphological gradient structuring element size"));
2749  QFormLayout *gradient_layout = new QFormLayout;
2750  gradient_layout->addRow(tr("SE size ="), klength_gradient_spin);
2751  if( operating_system == 2 )
2752  {
2753  gradient_layout->setFormAlignment(Qt::AlignLeft);
2754  }
2755  connect(klength_gradient_spin,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),this,SLOT(filtering_visu()));
2756 
2757  QVBoxLayout* geodesic_layout = new QVBoxLayout;
2758  geodesic_layout->addWidget(geodesic_radio);
2759  geodesic_layout->addLayout(gradient_layout);
2760 
2761  QHBoxLayout* speed_layout = new QHBoxLayout;
2762  speed_layout->addLayout(chanvese_layout);
2763  speed_layout->addLayout(geodesic_layout);
2764 
2765  yuv_groupbox = new QGroupBox(tr("normalized (Y,U,V) color space weighting"));
2766  yuv_groupbox->setFlat(true);
2767 
2768  Yspin = new QSpinBox;
2769  Yspin->setSingleStep(1);
2770  Yspin->setMinimum(0);
2771  Yspin->setMaximum(100000);
2772  Yspin->setToolTip(tr("luminance weight"));
2773 
2774  Uspin = new QSpinBox;
2775  Uspin->setSingleStep(1);
2776  Uspin->setMinimum(0);
2777  Uspin->setMaximum(100000);
2778  Uspin->setToolTip(tr("chrominance weight"));
2779 
2780  Vspin = new QSpinBox;
2781  Vspin->setSingleStep(1);
2782  Vspin->setMinimum(0);
2783  Vspin->setMaximum(100000);
2784  Vspin->setToolTip(tr("chrominance weight"));
2785 
2786  connect(Yspin,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),this,SLOT(filtering_visu()));
2787  connect(Uspin,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),this,SLOT(filtering_visu()));
2788  connect(Vspin,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),this,SLOT(filtering_visu()));
2789 
2790  QFormLayout* yuv_layout = new QFormLayout;
2791  yuv_layout->addRow(tr("Y weight ="), Yspin);
2792  yuv_layout->addRow(tr("U weight ="), Uspin);
2793  yuv_layout->addRow(tr("V weight ="), Vspin);
2794  if( operating_system == 2 )
2795  {
2796  yuv_layout->setFormAlignment(Qt::AlignLeft);
2797  }
2798  yuv_groupbox->setLayout(yuv_layout);
2799 
2800  connect(chanvese_radio,SIGNAL(clicked()),this,SLOT(filtering_visu()));
2801  connect(geodesic_radio,SIGNAL(clicked()),this,SLOT(filtering_visu()));
2802 
2803  QVBoxLayout* externalspeed_layout = new QVBoxLayout;
2804 
2805  externalspeed_layout->addLayout(Na_layout);
2806  externalspeed_layout->addLayout(speed_layout);
2807  externalspeed_layout->addWidget(yuv_groupbox);
2808  externalspeed_groupbox->setLayout(externalspeed_layout);
2809 
2811 
2812  internalspeed_groupbox = new QGroupBox(tr("Cycle 2 - smoothing via gaussian filtring"));
2813  internalspeed_groupbox->setCheckable(true);
2814  internalspeed_groupbox->setChecked(true);
2815 
2816  Ns_spin = new QSpinBox;
2817  Ns_spin->setSingleStep(1);
2818  Ns_spin->setMinimum(1);
2819  Ns_spin->setMaximum(999);
2820  Ns_spin->setSuffix(tr(" iterations"));
2821  Ns_spin->setToolTip(tr("iterations in the cycle 2, active contour regularization"));
2822  QFormLayout* Ns_layout = new QFormLayout;
2823  Ns_layout->addRow("Ns =", Ns_spin);
2824  if( operating_system == 2 )
2825  {
2826  Ns_layout->setFormAlignment(Qt::AlignLeft);
2827  }
2828 
2829  klength_spin = new QSpinBox;
2830  klength_spin->setSingleStep(2);
2831  klength_spin->setMinimum(1);
2832  klength_spin->setMaximum(499);
2833  klength_spin->setToolTip(tr("gaussian kernel size = Ng × Ng "));
2834  std_spin = new QDoubleSpinBox;
2835  std_spin->setSingleStep(0.1);
2836  std_spin->setMinimum(0.0);
2837  std_spin->setMaximum(1000000.0);
2838  std_spin->setToolTip(tr("standard deviation of the gaussian kernel"));
2839 
2840  QFormLayout* internalspeed_layout = new QFormLayout;
2841  internalspeed_layout->addRow("Ns =", Ns_spin);
2842  internalspeed_layout->addRow("Ng =", klength_spin);
2843  internalspeed_layout->addRow("σ =", std_spin);
2844  if( operating_system == 2 )
2845  {
2846  internalspeed_layout->setFormAlignment(Qt::AlignLeft);
2847  }
2848  internalspeed_groupbox->setLayout(internalspeed_layout);
2849 
2852 
2853  QVBoxLayout* algorithm_layout = new QVBoxLayout;
2854  algorithm_layout->addWidget(externalspeed_groupbox);
2855  algorithm_layout->addWidget(internalspeed_groupbox);
2856  algorithm_layout->addStretch(1);
2857 
2858  return algorithm_layout;
2859 }
2860 
2861 // Création du layout pour l'onglet initialization de la fenêtre de configuration
2862 QVBoxLayout* ImageViewer::initialization()
2863 {
2864  open_phi_button = new QPushButton(tr("Open ϕ(t=0)"));
2865  open_phi_button->setToolTip(tr("or drag and drop an image of ϕ(t=0)"));
2866  save_phi_button = new QPushButton(tr("Save ϕ(t=0)"));
2867  connect(open_phi_button,SIGNAL(clicked()),this,SLOT(openFilenamePhi()));
2868  connect(save_phi_button,SIGNAL(clicked()),this,SLOT(save_phi()));
2869  open_phi_button->setEnabled(false);
2870  save_phi_button->setEnabled(false);
2871 
2872 
2873  QHBoxLayout* openSavePhi= new QHBoxLayout;
2874  openSavePhi->addWidget(open_phi_button);
2875  openSavePhi->addWidget(save_phi_button);
2876 
2877  // création des 4 groupbox pour l'onglet initialization
2878 
2881 
2882  QGroupBox* shape_groupbox = new QGroupBox(tr("Shape"));
2883  shape_groupbox->setFlat(true);
2884 
2885  rectangle_radio = new QRadioButton(tr("rectangle"));
2886  rectangle_radio->setToolTip(tr("or click on the middle mouse button when the cursor is in the image"));
2887  ellipse_radio = new QRadioButton(tr("ellipse"));
2888  ellipse_radio->setToolTip(tr("or click on the middle mouse button when the cursor is in the image"));
2889  connect(rectangle_radio,SIGNAL(clicked()),this,SLOT(shape_visu()));
2890  connect(ellipse_radio,SIGNAL(clicked()),this,SLOT(shape_visu()));
2891 
2892  QHBoxLayout* shape_layout = new QHBoxLayout;
2893  shape_layout->addWidget(rectangle_radio);
2894  shape_layout->addWidget(ellipse_radio);
2895  shape_groupbox->setLayout(shape_layout);
2896 
2898 
2899  QGroupBox* size_groupbox = new QGroupBox(tr("Size"));
2900  size_groupbox ->setToolTip(tr("or roll the mouse wheel when the cursor is in the image"));
2901 
2902  width_shape_spin = new QSpinBox;
2903  width_shape_spin->setSingleStep(15);
2904  width_shape_spin->setMinimum(0);
2905  width_shape_spin->setMaximum(1000);
2906  width_shape_spin->setSuffix(tr(" % image width"));
2907 
2908  QFormLayout* width_spin_layout = new QFormLayout;
2909  width_spin_layout->addRow(tr("width ="), width_shape_spin);
2910  if( operating_system == 2 )
2911  {
2912  width_spin_layout->setFormAlignment(Qt::AlignLeft);
2913  }
2914 
2915  width_slider = new QSlider(Qt::Horizontal, this);
2916  width_slider->setTickPosition(QSlider::TicksAbove);
2917  width_slider->setMinimum(0);
2918  width_slider->setMaximum(150);
2919  width_slider->setTickInterval(25);
2920  width_slider->setSingleStep(15);
2921 
2922  connect(width_shape_spin,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),this,SLOT(shape_visu(int)));
2923  connect(width_slider,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),width_shape_spin,SLOT(setValue(int)));
2924  connect(width_shape_spin,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),width_slider,SLOT(setValue(int)));
2925 
2926  height_shape_spin = new QSpinBox;
2927  height_shape_spin->setSingleStep(15);
2928  height_shape_spin->setMinimum(0);
2929  height_shape_spin->setMaximum(1000);
2930  height_shape_spin->setSuffix(tr((" % image height")));
2931 
2932  QFormLayout* height_spin_layout = new QFormLayout;
2933  height_spin_layout->addRow(tr("height ="), height_shape_spin);
2934  if( operating_system == 2 )
2935  {
2936  height_spin_layout->setFormAlignment(Qt::AlignLeft);
2937  }
2938 
2939  height_slider = new QSlider(Qt::Horizontal, this);
2940  height_slider->setTickPosition(QSlider::TicksAbove);
2941  height_slider->setMinimum(0);
2942  height_slider->setMaximum(150);
2943  height_slider->setTickInterval(25);
2944  height_slider->setSingleStep(15);
2945 
2946  connect(height_shape_spin,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),this,SLOT(shape_visu(int)));
2947  connect(height_slider,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),height_shape_spin,SLOT(setValue(int)));
2948  connect(height_shape_spin,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),height_slider,SLOT(setValue(int)));
2949 
2950  QVBoxLayout* size_layout = new QVBoxLayout;
2951  size_layout->addLayout(width_spin_layout);
2952  size_layout->addWidget(width_slider);
2953  size_layout->addLayout(height_spin_layout);
2954  size_layout->addWidget(height_slider);
2955  size_groupbox->setLayout(size_layout);
2956 
2958 
2959  QGroupBox* position_groupbox = new QGroupBox(tr("Position (x,y)"));
2960  position_groupbox->setToolTip(tr("or move the mouse cursor in the image"));
2961 
2962  abscissa_spin = new QSpinBox;
2963  abscissa_spin->setSingleStep(15);
2964  abscissa_spin->setMinimum(-500);
2965  abscissa_spin->setMaximum(500);
2966  abscissa_spin->setSuffix(tr(" % image width"));
2967 
2968  QFormLayout* abscissa_spin_layout = new QFormLayout;
2969  abscissa_spin_layout->addRow("x = Xo +", abscissa_spin);
2970  if( operating_system == 2 )
2971  {
2972  abscissa_spin_layout->setFormAlignment(Qt::AlignLeft);
2973  }
2974 
2975  abscissa_slider = new QSlider(Qt::Horizontal, this);
2976  abscissa_slider->setTickPosition(QSlider::TicksAbove);
2977  abscissa_slider->setMinimum(-75);
2978  abscissa_slider->setMaximum(75);
2979  abscissa_slider->setTickInterval(25);
2980  abscissa_slider->setSingleStep(15);
2981 
2982  connect(abscissa_spin,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),this,SLOT(shape_visu(int)));
2983  connect(abscissa_slider,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),abscissa_spin,SLOT(setValue(int)));
2984  connect(abscissa_spin,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),abscissa_slider,SLOT(setValue(int)));
2985 
2986  ordinate_spin = new QSpinBox;
2987  ordinate_spin->setSingleStep(15);
2988  ordinate_spin->setMinimum(-500);
2989  ordinate_spin->setMaximum(500);
2990  ordinate_spin->setSuffix(tr(" % image height"));
2991 
2992  QFormLayout* ordinate_spin_layout = new QFormLayout;
2993  ordinate_spin_layout->addRow("y = Yo +", ordinate_spin);
2994  if( operating_system == 2 )
2995  {
2996  ordinate_spin_layout->setFormAlignment(Qt::AlignLeft);
2997  }
2998 
2999  ordinate_slider = new QSlider(Qt::Horizontal, this);
3000  ordinate_slider->setTickPosition(QSlider::TicksAbove);
3001  ordinate_slider->setMinimum(-75);
3002  ordinate_slider->setMaximum(75);
3003  ordinate_slider->setTickInterval(25);
3004  ordinate_slider->setSingleStep(15);
3005 
3006  connect(ordinate_spin,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),this,SLOT(shape_visu(int)));
3007  connect(ordinate_slider,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),ordinate_spin,SLOT(setValue(int)));
3008  connect(ordinate_spin,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),ordinate_slider,SLOT(setValue(int)));
3009 
3010  QVBoxLayout* position_layout = new QVBoxLayout;
3011  position_layout->addLayout(abscissa_spin_layout);
3012  position_layout->addWidget(abscissa_slider);
3013  position_layout->addLayout(ordinate_spin_layout);
3014  position_layout->addWidget(ordinate_slider);
3015  position_groupbox->setLayout(position_layout);
3016 
3018 
3019  QGroupBox* modify_groupbox = new QGroupBox(tr("Active contour modification"));
3020  modify_groupbox->setFlat(true);
3021 
3022  add_button = new QPushButton(tr("Add"));
3023  add_button->setToolTip(tr("or click on the left mouse button when the cursor is in the image"));
3024  connect(add_button,SIGNAL(clicked()),this,SLOT(add_visu()));
3025 
3026  subtract_button = new QPushButton(tr("Subtract"));
3027  subtract_button->setToolTip(tr("or click on the right mouse button when the cursor is in the image"));
3028  connect(subtract_button,SIGNAL(clicked()),this,SLOT(subtract_visu()));
3029 
3030  clean_button = new QPushButton(tr("Clean"));
3031  connect(clean_button,SIGNAL(clicked()),this,SLOT(clean_phi_visu()));
3032 
3033  QHBoxLayout* modify_layout = new QHBoxLayout;
3034  modify_layout->addWidget(clean_button);
3035  modify_layout->addWidget(subtract_button);
3036  modify_layout->addWidget(add_button);
3037  modify_groupbox->setLayout(modify_layout);
3038 
3041 
3042  QVBoxLayout* initialization_layout = new QVBoxLayout;
3043  initialization_layout->addLayout(openSavePhi);
3044  initialization_layout->addWidget(shape_groupbox);
3045  initialization_layout->addWidget(size_groupbox);
3046  initialization_layout->addWidget(position_groupbox);
3047  initialization_layout->addWidget(modify_groupbox);
3048  initialization_layout->addStretch(1);
3049 
3050  return initialization_layout;
3051 
3052 }
3053 
3054 // Création du layout pour l'onglet preprocessing de la fenêtre de configuration
3055 QGroupBox* ImageViewer::preprocessing()
3056 {
3057  // création de groupbox pour l'onglet noise generators
3058 
3059  gaussian_noise_groupbox = new QGroupBox(tr("Gaussian white noise"));
3060  gaussian_noise_groupbox->setCheckable(true);
3061  gaussian_noise_groupbox->setChecked(false);
3062 
3063  std_noise_spin = new QDoubleSpinBox;
3064  std_noise_spin->setSingleStep(5.0);
3065  std_noise_spin->setMinimum(0.0);
3066  std_noise_spin->setMaximum(10000.0);
3067  std_noise_spin->setToolTip(tr("standard deviation"));
3068 
3069  QFormLayout* gaussian_noise_layout = new QFormLayout;
3070  gaussian_noise_layout->addRow("σ =", std_noise_spin);
3071 
3072  salt_noise_groupbox = new QGroupBox(tr("Impulsional noise (salt and pepper)"));
3073  salt_noise_groupbox->setCheckable(true);
3074  salt_noise_groupbox->setChecked(false);
3075 
3076  proba_noise_spin = new QDoubleSpinBox;
3077  proba_noise_spin->setSingleStep(1.0);
3078  proba_noise_spin->setMinimum(0.0);
3079  proba_noise_spin->setMaximum(100.0);
3080  proba_noise_spin->setSuffix(" %");
3081  proba_noise_spin->setToolTip(tr("impulsional noise probability for each pixel"));
3082 
3083  QFormLayout* salt_noise_layout = new QFormLayout;
3084  salt_noise_layout->addRow(tr("d ="), proba_noise_spin);
3085 
3086  speckle_noise_groupbox = new QGroupBox(tr("Speckle noise"));
3087  speckle_noise_groupbox->setCheckable(true);
3088  speckle_noise_groupbox->setChecked(false);
3089 
3090  std_speckle_noise_spin = new QDoubleSpinBox;
3091  std_speckle_noise_spin->setSingleStep(0.02);
3092  std_speckle_noise_spin->setMinimum(0.0);
3093  std_speckle_noise_spin->setMaximum(1000.0);
3094  std_speckle_noise_spin->setToolTip(tr("standard deviation"));
3095 
3096  QFormLayout* speckle_noise_layout = new QFormLayout;
3097  speckle_noise_layout->addRow("σ =", std_speckle_noise_spin);
3098 
3099  if( operating_system == 2 )
3100  {
3101  gaussian_noise_layout->setFormAlignment(Qt::AlignLeft);
3102  salt_noise_layout->setFormAlignment(Qt::AlignLeft);
3103  speckle_noise_layout->setFormAlignment(Qt::AlignLeft);
3104  }
3105 
3106  gaussian_noise_groupbox->setLayout(gaussian_noise_layout);
3107  salt_noise_groupbox->setLayout(salt_noise_layout);
3108  speckle_noise_groupbox->setLayout(speckle_noise_layout);
3109 
3110  connect(gaussian_noise_groupbox,SIGNAL(clicked()),this,SLOT(filtering_visu()));
3111  connect(salt_noise_groupbox,SIGNAL(clicked()),this,SLOT(filtering_visu()));
3112  connect(speckle_noise_groupbox,SIGNAL(clicked()),this,SLOT(filtering_visu()));
3113 
3114  connect(std_noise_spin,SIGNAL(valueChanged(double)),this,SLOT(filtering_visu()));
3115  connect(proba_noise_spin,SIGNAL(valueChanged(double)),this,SLOT(filtering_visu()));
3116  connect(std_speckle_noise_spin,SIGNAL(valueChanged(double)),this,SLOT(filtering_visu()));
3117 
3118 
3119  QVBoxLayout* noise_layout = new QVBoxLayout;
3120  noise_layout->addWidget(gaussian_noise_groupbox);
3121  noise_layout->addWidget(salt_noise_groupbox);
3122  noise_layout->addWidget(speckle_noise_groupbox);
3123  noise_layout->addStretch(1);
3124 
3125  // création de groupbox pour l'onglet filters
3126 
3127  mean_groupbox = new QGroupBox(tr("Mean filter"));
3128  mean_groupbox->setCheckable(true);
3129  mean_groupbox->setChecked(false);
3130 
3131  klength_mean_spin = new QSpinBox;
3132  klength_mean_spin->setSingleStep(2);
3133  klength_mean_spin->setMinimum(1);
3134  klength_mean_spin->setMaximum(499);
3135  klength_mean_spin->setSuffix("²");
3136 
3137  gaussian_groupbox = new QGroupBox(tr("Gaussian filter"));
3138  gaussian_groupbox->setCheckable(true);
3139  gaussian_groupbox->setChecked(false);
3140 
3141  klength_gaussian_spin = new QSpinBox;
3142  klength_gaussian_spin->setSingleStep(2);
3143  klength_gaussian_spin->setMinimum(1);
3144  klength_gaussian_spin->setMaximum(499);
3145  klength_gaussian_spin->setSuffix("²");
3146  std_filter_spin = new QDoubleSpinBox;
3147  std_filter_spin->setSingleStep(0.1);
3148  std_filter_spin->setMinimum(0.0);
3149  std_filter_spin->setMaximum(1000000.0);
3150  std_filter_spin->setToolTip(tr("standard deviation"));
3151 
3152 
3153  median_groupbox = new QGroupBox(tr("Median filter"));
3154  median_groupbox->setCheckable(true);
3155  median_groupbox->setChecked(false);
3156 
3157  klength_median_spin = new QSpinBox;
3158  klength_median_spin->setSingleStep(2);
3159  klength_median_spin->setMinimum(1);
3160  klength_median_spin->setMaximum(499);
3161  klength_median_spin->setSuffix("²");
3162 
3163  complex_radio1= new QRadioButton("O(r log r)×O(n)");
3164  complex_radio2= new QRadioButton("O(1)×O(n)");
3165 
3166  connect(complex_radio1,SIGNAL(clicked()),this,SLOT(filtering_visu()));
3167  connect(complex_radio2,SIGNAL(clicked()),this,SLOT(filtering_visu()));
3168 
3169  aniso_groupbox = new QGroupBox(tr("Perona-Malik anisotropic diffusion"));
3170  aniso_groupbox->setCheckable(true);
3171  aniso_groupbox->setChecked(false);
3172 
3173  aniso1_radio = new QRadioButton("g(∇I) = exp(-(|∇I|/κ)²)");
3174  aniso2_radio = new QRadioButton("g(∇I) = 1/(1+(1+(|∇I|/κ)²)");
3175 
3176  iteration_filter_spin = new QSpinBox;
3177  iteration_filter_spin->setSingleStep(1);
3178  iteration_filter_spin->setMinimum(0);
3179  iteration_filter_spin->setMaximum(5000);
3180 
3181  lambda_spin = new QDoubleSpinBox;
3182  lambda_spin->setSingleStep(0.01);
3183  lambda_spin->setMinimum(0.0);
3184  lambda_spin->setMaximum(1.0/4.0);
3185 
3186 
3187  kappa_spin = new QDoubleSpinBox;
3188  kappa_spin->setSingleStep(1.0);
3189  kappa_spin->setMinimum(0.0);
3190  kappa_spin->setMaximum(10000.0);
3191 
3192 
3193  open_groupbox = new QGroupBox(tr("Opening"));
3194  open_groupbox->setCheckable(true);
3195  open_groupbox->setChecked(false);
3196 
3197  klength_open_spin = new QSpinBox;
3198  klength_open_spin->setSingleStep(2);
3199  klength_open_spin->setMinimum(1);
3200  klength_open_spin->setMaximum(499);
3201  klength_open_spin->setSuffix("²");
3202  klength_open_spin->setToolTip(tr("the structuring element shape is a square and its origin is the center of the square"));
3203 
3204 
3205  close_groupbox = new QGroupBox(tr("Closing"));
3206  close_groupbox->setCheckable(true);
3207  close_groupbox->setChecked(false);
3208 
3209  klength_close_spin = new QSpinBox;
3210  klength_close_spin->setSingleStep(2);
3211  klength_close_spin->setMinimum(1);
3212  klength_close_spin->setMaximum(499);
3213  klength_close_spin->setSuffix("²");
3214  klength_close_spin->setToolTip(tr("the structuring element shape is a square and its origin is the center of the square"));
3215 
3216  tophat_groupbox = new QGroupBox(tr("Top-hat transform"));
3217  tophat_groupbox->setCheckable(true);
3218  tophat_groupbox->setChecked(false);
3219 
3220  whitetophat_radio = new QRadioButton(tr("white top-hat"));
3221  whitetophat_radio->setToolTip(tr("difference between the input image the opened"));
3222  blacktophat_radio = new QRadioButton(tr("black top-hat"));
3223  blacktophat_radio->setToolTip(tr("difference between the closed and the input image"));
3224  klength_tophat_spin = new QSpinBox;
3225  klength_tophat_spin->setSingleStep(2);
3226  klength_tophat_spin->setMinimum(1);
3227  klength_tophat_spin->setMaximum(499);
3228  klength_tophat_spin->setSuffix("²");
3229  klength_tophat_spin->setToolTip(tr("the structuring element shape is a square and its origin is the center of the square"));
3230 
3231  algo_groupbox = new QGroupBox(tr("Algorithm"));
3232  complex1_morpho_radio = new QRadioButton(tr("naïve algorithm in O(r)×O(n)"));
3233  complex2_morpho_radio = new QRadioButton(tr("Perreault's algorithm in O(1)×O(n)"));
3234  QVBoxLayout* algo_layout = new QVBoxLayout();
3235  algo_layout->addWidget(complex1_morpho_radio);
3236  algo_layout->addWidget(complex2_morpho_radio);
3237

3239  connect(complex2_morpho_radio,SIGNAL(clicked()),this,SLOT(filtering_visu()));
3240 
3241  connect(median_groupbox,SIGNAL(clicked()),this,SLOT(filtering_visu()));
3242  connect(klength_median_spin,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),this,SLOT(filtering_visu()));
3243 
3244  connect(mean_groupbox,SIGNAL(clicked()),this,SLOT(filtering_visu()));
3245  connect(klength_mean_spin,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),this,SLOT(filtering_visu()));
3246 
3247  connect(gaussian_groupbox,SIGNAL(clicked()),this,SLOT(filtering_visu()));
3248  connect(klength_gaussian_spin,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),this,SLOT(filtering_visu()));
3249  connect(std_filter_spin,SIGNAL(valueChanged(double)),this,SLOT(filtering_visu()));
3250 
3251  connect(aniso_groupbox,SIGNAL(clicked()),this,SLOT(filtering_visu()));
3252  connect(aniso1_radio,SIGNAL(clicked()),this,SLOT(filtering_visu()));
3253  connect(aniso2_radio,SIGNAL(clicked()),this,SLOT(filtering_visu()));
3254  connect(iteration_filter_spin,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),this,SLOT(filtering_visu()));
3255  connect(lambda_spin,SIGNAL(valueChanged(double)),this,SLOT(filtering_visu()));
3256  connect(kappa_spin,SIGNAL(valueChanged(double)),this,SLOT(filtering_visu()));

3260 
3261  connect(close_groupbox,SIGNAL(clicked()),this,SLOT(filtering_visu()));
3262  connect(klength_close_spin,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),this,SLOT(filtering_visu()));
3263

3265  connect(whitetophat_radio,SIGNAL(clicked()),this,SLOT(filtering_visu()));
3266  connect(blacktophat_radio,SIGNAL(clicked()),this,SLOT(filtering_visu()));
3267  connect(klength_tophat_spin,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),this,SLOT(filtering_visu()));

3270  mean_layout->addRow(tr("kernel size ="), klength_mean_spin);
3271

3274  gaussian_layout->addRow("σ =", std_filter_spin);
3275

3278  median_layout->addRow(tr("quick sort algorithm"), complex_radio1);
3279  median_layout->addRow(tr("Perreault's algorithm"), complex_radio2);
3280

3282  aniso_layout->addRow(tr("iterations ="), iteration_filter_spin);
3283  aniso_layout->addRow("λ =", lambda_spin);
3284  aniso_layout->addRow("κ =", kappa_spin);
3285  aniso_layout->addRow(tr("function 1 :"), aniso1_radio);
3286  aniso_layout->addRow(tr("function 2 :"), aniso2_radio);
3287

3296  tophat_layout->addRow(" ", blacktophat_radio);

3302  mean_layout->setFormAlignment(Qt::AlignLeft);

3304  aniso_layout->setFormAlignment(Qt::AlignLeft);
3305  open_layout->setFormAlignment(Qt::AlignLeft);
3306  close_layout->setFormAlignment(Qt::AlignLeft);
3307  tophat_layout->setFormAlignment(Qt::AlignLeft);
3308  }
3309

3311  gaussian_groupbox->setLayout(gaussian_layout);

3338  page3 = new QTabWidget(settings_window);

3341  QWidget* page_noise = new QWidget;

3360  tab_filter->addTab(page_filter_ansio, tr("Edge preserving"));
3361  tab_filter->addTab(page_filter_morpho, tr("Math morpho"));

3364  page3->addTab(page_noise, tr("Noise generators"));
3365  page3->addTab(tab_filter, tr("Filters"));
3366

3370  preprocessing_groupbox->setCheckable(true);
3371  preprocessing_groupbox->setChecked(false);
3372

3376  time_filt->setText(tr("time = "));

3381  time_filt_groupbox->setLayout(elapsed_filt_layout);

3386  vbox->addWidget(time_filt_groupbox);

3388  preprocessing_groupbox->setLayout(vbox);
3389 
3390  return preprocessing_groupbox;
3391 
3392 }
3393 
3394 // Création du layout pour l'onglet display de la fenêtre de configuration
3395 QVBoxLayout* ImageViewer::display()
3396 {
3397  // création de 3 groupbox pour l'onglet display
3398 
3401 
3402  QGroupBox* size_groupbox = new QGroupBox(tr("Image"));
3403 
3404  scale_spin = new QSpinBox;
3405  scale_spin->setSingleStep(25);
3406  scale_spin->setMinimum(1);
3407  scale_spin->setMaximum(5000);
3408  scale_spin->setSuffix(" %");
3409  scale_spin->setValue(100);
3410 
3411  scale_slider = new QSlider(Qt::Horizontal, this);
3412  scale_slider->setTickPosition(QSlider::TicksAbove);
3413  scale_slider->setMinimum(1);
3414  scale_slider->setMaximum(1000);
3415  scale_slider->setTickInterval(100);
3416  scale_slider->setSingleStep(25);
3417  scale_slider->setValue(100);
3418 
3419  connect(scale_spin,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),this,SLOT(do_scale(int)));
3420  connect(scale_slider,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),scale_spin,SLOT(setValue(int)));
3421  connect(scale_spin,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),scale_slider,SLOT(setValue(int)));
3422  connect(scale_spin0,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),scale_spin,SLOT(setValue(int)));
3423 
3424  scale_spin->installEventFilter(this);
3425  scale_slider->installEventFilter(this);
3426  scale_spin->setMouseTracking(true);
3427  scale_slider->setMouseTracking(true);
3428 
3429  histo_checkbox = new QCheckBox(tr("histogram normalization for the gradient"));
3430  connect(histo_checkbox,SIGNAL(clicked()),this,SLOT(filtering_visu()));
3431 
3432  QFormLayout* size_layout = new QFormLayout;
3433  size_layout->addRow(tr("scale ="), scale_spin);
3434  size_layout->addRow(scale_slider);
3435  size_layout->addRow(" ",histo_checkbox);
3436  if( operating_system == 2 )
3437  {
3438  size_layout->setFormAlignment(Qt::AlignLeft);
3439  }
3440 
3441  size_groupbox->setLayout(size_layout);
3442 
3444 
3445  step_checkbox = new QCheckBox(tr("display"));
3446  step_checkbox->setToolTip(tr("to see the calculation time if not checked"));
3447 
3448  QGroupBox* active_contour_groupbox = new QGroupBox(tr("Active contour"));
3449 
3450  outsidecolor_combobox = new QComboBox();
3451  insidecolor_combobox = new QComboBox();
3452 
3453  // QPixmap pm : petite image affichant la couleur devant le nom de la couleur dans le combobox
3454  QPixmap pm(12,12);
3455  pm.fill(Qt::red);
3456  outsidecolor_combobox->addItem (pm, tr("Red"));
3457  insidecolor_combobox->addItem (pm, tr("Red"));
3458  pm.fill(Qt::green);
3459  outsidecolor_combobox->addItem (pm, tr("Green"));
3460  insidecolor_combobox->addItem (pm, tr("Green"));
3461  pm.fill(Qt::blue);
3462  outsidecolor_combobox->addItem (pm, tr("Blue"));
3463  insidecolor_combobox->addItem (pm, tr("Blue"));
3464  pm.fill(Qt::cyan);
3465  outsidecolor_combobox->addItem (pm, tr("Cyan"));
3466  insidecolor_combobox->addItem (pm, tr("Cyan"));
3467  pm.fill(Qt::magenta);
3468  outsidecolor_combobox->addItem (pm, tr("Magenta"));
3469  insidecolor_combobox->addItem (pm, tr("Magenta"));
3470  pm.fill(Qt::yellow);
3471  outsidecolor_combobox->addItem (pm, tr("Yellow"));
3472  insidecolor_combobox->addItem (pm, tr("Yellow"));
3473  pm.fill(Qt::black);
3474  outsidecolor_combobox->addItem (pm, tr("Black"));
3475  insidecolor_combobox->addItem (pm, tr("Black"));
3476  pm.fill(Qt::white);
3477  outsidecolor_combobox->addItem (pm, tr("White"));
3478  insidecolor_combobox->addItem (pm, tr("White"));
3479  pm.fill(Qt::transparent);
3480  outsidecolor_combobox->addItem (pm,tr("Selected"));
3481  insidecolor_combobox->addItem (pm,tr("Selected"));
3482  outsidecolor_combobox->addItem (pm, tr("No"));
3483  insidecolor_combobox->addItem (pm, tr("No"));
3484 
3485 
3486  connect(outsidecolor_combobox,SIGNAL(activated(int)),this,SLOT(phi_visu(int)));
3487  connect(insidecolor_combobox,SIGNAL(activated(int)),this,SLOT(phi_visu(int)));
3488 
3489  QPushButton* outsidecolor_select = new QPushButton(tr("Select"));
3490  connect(outsidecolor_select,SIGNAL(clicked()),this,SLOT(color_out()));
3491 
3492  QPushButton* insidecolor_select = new QPushButton(tr("Select"));
3493  connect(insidecolor_select,SIGNAL(clicked()),this,SLOT(color_in()));
3494 
3495  init_time_spin = new QDoubleSpinBox;
3496  init_time_spin->setSingleStep(0.5);
3497  init_time_spin->setMinimum(0.0);
3498  init_time_spin->setMaximum(1000.0);
3499  init_time_spin->setSuffix(tr(" second(s)"));
3500  init_time_spin->setToolTip(tr("time to see the active contour initialization"));
3501 
3502  QFormLayout* active_contour_form = new QFormLayout;
3503  active_contour_form->addRow(tr("after each iteration :"), step_checkbox);
3504  active_contour_form->addRow(tr("time before to evolve ="), init_time_spin);
3505  if( operating_system == 2 )
3506  {
3507  active_contour_form->setFormAlignment(Qt::AlignLeft);
3508  }
3509 
3510  QFormLayout* Loutcolor_form = new QFormLayout;
3511  Loutcolor_form->addRow(tr("Lout :"), outsidecolor_combobox);
3512  if( operating_system == 2 )
3513  {
3514  Loutcolor_form->setFormAlignment(Qt::AlignLeft);
3515  }
3516 
3517  QFormLayout* Lincolor_form = new QFormLayout;
3518  Lincolor_form->addRow(tr(" Lin :"), insidecolor_combobox);
3519  if( operating_system == 2 )
3520  {
3521  Lincolor_form->setFormAlignment(Qt::AlignLeft);
3522  }
3523 
3524  QHBoxLayout* Loutcolor_hlay = new QHBoxLayout;
3525  Loutcolor_hlay->addLayout(Loutcolor_form);
3526  Loutcolor_hlay->addWidget(outsidecolor_select);
3527 
3528  QHBoxLayout* Lincolor_hlay = new QHBoxLayout;
3529  Lincolor_hlay->addLayout(Lincolor_form);
3530  Lincolor_hlay->addWidget(insidecolor_select);
3531 
3532  QVBoxLayout* color_layout = new QVBoxLayout;
3533  color_layout->addLayout(Loutcolor_hlay);
3534  color_layout->addLayout(Lincolor_hlay);
3535 
3536  QGroupBox* color_groupbox = new QGroupBox(tr("Boundaries colors"));
3537  color_groupbox->setFlat(true);
3538  color_groupbox->setLayout(color_layout);
3539 
3540  QVBoxLayout* active_contour_layout = new QVBoxLayout;
3541  active_contour_layout->addLayout(active_contour_form);
3542  active_contour_layout->addWidget(color_groupbox);
3543 
3544  active_contour_groupbox->setLayout(active_contour_layout);
3545 
3548 
3549  QVBoxLayout* display_layout = new QVBoxLayout;
3550  display_layout->addWidget(size_groupbox);
3551  display_layout->addWidget(active_contour_groupbox);
3552  display_layout->addStretch(1);
3553 
3554  return display_layout;
3555 }
3556 
3558 
3559 
3560 // Fonction appelée lors de l'ouverture de la fenêtre de configuration et valider ou refuser les changements
3561 void ImageViewer::settings()
3562 {
3563  if( onglets->currentIndex() == 1 )
3564  {
3565  filtering_visu();
3566  phi_visu(true);
3567  shape_visu();
3568  }
3569  else
3570  {
3571  filtering_visu();
3572  phi_visu(false);
3573  }
3574 
3575  // on s'assure que la fenêtre de configuration n'est pas déja affichée
3576  if( settings_window->isVisible() )
3577  {
3578  QMessageBox::critical(this, tr("Error"), tr("Close settings window before."));
3579  }
3580  else
3581  {
3582  // booléen permettant de savoir si l'utilisateur accepte ou rejette les réglages de la fenêtre de configuration
3583  int result_settings_window;
3584 
3585  // la méthode exec() permet d'afficher la fenêtre de configuration settings_window de maniere modale,
3586  // de plus cette méthode retourne un booléen en fonction de l'acceptation ou du rejet des réglages
3587  result_settings_window = settings_window->exec();
3588 
3589  // la méthode show() permet d'afficher la fenêtre de configuration mais de maniere non modale,
3590  // ne renvoie pas de booléen
3591  //settings_window->show();
3592 
3593  if( result_settings_window )
3594  {
3595  // Ok = les variables vont prendre leur valeur en fonction de l'état des widgets de la fenêtre de configuration
3596  apply_settings();
3597 
3598  }
3599  else
3600  {
3601  // Annuler = les widgets vont reprendre leur état en fonction des valeurs des variables
3602  cancel_settings();
3603  }
3604  }
3605 }
3606 
3607 // si on clique sur le boutton Ok de settings_window
3608 // les paramètres prennent leurs valeurs en fonction de l'état des widgets
3609 void ImageViewer::apply_settings()
3610 {
3611  // affection des variables en fonction des états des widgets
3612 
3614  // Algorithm //
3616 
3617  Na1 = Na_spin->value();
3618 
3619  if( chanvese_radio->isChecked() )
3620  {
3621  model = 1;
3622  }
3623  if( geodesic_radio->isChecked() )
3624  {
3625  model = 2;
3626  }
3627 
3628  lambda_out1 = lambda_out_spin->value();
3629  lambda_in1 = lambda_in_spin->value();
3630 
3631  kernel_gradient_length1 = klength_gradient_spin->value();
3632 
3633  alpha1 = Yspin->value();
3634  beta1 = Uspin->value();
3635  gamma1 = Vspin->value();
3636 
3637  if( internalspeed_groupbox->isChecked() )
3638  {
3639  hasSmoothingCycle1 = true;
3640  }
3641  else
3642  {
3643  hasSmoothingCycle1 = false;
3644  }
3645 
3646  Ns1 = Ns_spin->value();
3647 
3648  kernel_curve1 = klength_spin->value();
3649  std_curve1 = std_spin->value();
3650 
3651 
3653  // Initialization //
3655 
3656  if( rectangle_radio->isChecked() )
3657  {
3658  hasEllipse1 = false;
3659  }
3660  if( ellipse_radio->isChecked() )
3661  {
3662  hasEllipse1 = true;
3663  }
3664 
3665  init_width1 = double(width_shape_spin->value())/100.0;
3666  init_height1 = double(height_shape_spin->value())/100.0;
3667 
3668  center_x1 = double(abscissa_spin->value())/100.0;
3669  center_y1 = double(ordinate_spin->value())/100.0;
3670 
3672  // Preprocessing //
3674 
3675  if( preprocessing_groupbox->isChecked() )
3676  {
3677  hasPreprocess = true;
3678  }
3679  else
3680  {
3681  hasPreprocess = false;
3682  }
3683 
3684  if( gaussian_noise_groupbox->isChecked() )
3685  {
3686  hasGaussianNoise = true;
3687  }
3688  else
3689  {
3690  hasGaussianNoise = false;
3691  }
3692  std_noise = std_noise_spin->value();
3693 
3694  if( salt_noise_groupbox->isChecked() )
3695  {
3696  hasSaltNoise = true;
3697  }
3698  else
3699  {
3700  hasSaltNoise = false;
3701  }
3702  proba_noise = proba_noise_spin->value()/100.0;
3703
