3704  if( speckle_noise_groupbox->isChecked() )
3705  {
3706  hasSpeckleNoise = true;
3707  }
3708  else
3709  {
3710  hasSpeckleNoise = false;
3711  }
3712  std_speckle_noise = std_speckle_noise_spin->value();
3713 
3714  if( median_groupbox->isChecked() )
3715  {
3716  hasMedianFilt = true;
3717  }
3718  else
3719  {
3720  hasMedianFilt = false;
3721  }
3722  kernel_median_length1 = klength_median_spin->value();
3723  if( complex_radio2->isChecked() )
3724  {
3725  hasO1algo1 = true;
3726  }
3727  else
3728  {
3729  hasO1algo1 = false;
3730  }
3731 
3732  if( mean_groupbox->isChecked() )
3733  {
3734  hasMeanFilt = true;
3735  }
3736  else
3737  {
3738  hasMeanFilt = false;
3739  }
3740  kernel_mean_length1 = klength_mean_spin->value();
3741 
3742  if( gaussian_groupbox->isChecked() )
3743  {
3744  hasGaussianFilt = true;
3745  }
3746  else
3747  {
3748  hasGaussianFilt = false;
3749  }
3750  kernel_gaussian_length1 = klength_gaussian_spin->value();
3751  sigma = std_filter_spin->value();
3752 
3753  if( aniso_groupbox->isChecked() )
3754  {
3755  hasAnisoDiff = true;
3756  }
3757  else
3758  {
3759  hasAnisoDiff = false;
3760  }
3761 
3762  max_itera1 = iteration_filter_spin->value();
3763  lambda1 = lambda_spin->value();
3764  kappa1 = kappa_spin->value();
3765  if( aniso1_radio->isChecked() )
3766  {
3767  aniso_option1 = 1;
3768  }
3769  if( aniso2_radio->isChecked() )
3770  {
3771  aniso_option1 = 2;
3772  }
3773 
3774  if( open_groupbox->isChecked() )
3775  {
3776  hasOpenFilt = true;
3777  }
3778  else
3779  {
3780  hasOpenFilt = false;
3781  }
3782  kernel_open_length1 = klength_open_spin->value();
3783 
3784  if( close_groupbox->isChecked() )
3785  {
3786  hasCloseFilt = true;
3787  }
3788  else
3789  {
3790  hasCloseFilt = false;
3791  }
3792  kernel_close_length1 = klength_close_spin->value();
3793 
3794  if( tophat_groupbox->isChecked() )
3795  {
3796  hasTophatFilt = true;
3797  }
3798  else
3799  {
3800  hasTophatFilt = false;
3801  }
3802  if( whitetophat_radio->isChecked() )
3803  {
3804  isWhiteTophat = true;
3805  }
3806  else
3807  {
3808  isWhiteTophat = false;
3809  }
3810  kernel_tophat_length1 = klength_tophat_spin->value();
3811 
3812  if( complex2_morpho_radio->isChecked() )
3813  {
3814  hasO1morpho1 = true;
3815  }
3816  else
3817  {
3818  hasO1morpho1 = false;
3819  }
3820 
3822  // Display //
3824 
3825  scale_spin0->setValue(scale_spin->value());
3826 
3827  if( histo_checkbox->isChecked() )
3828  {
3829  hasHistoNormaliz = true;
3830  }
3831  else
3832  {
3833  hasHistoNormaliz = false;
3834  }
3835 
3836 
3837 
3838  if( step_checkbox->isChecked() )
3839  {
3840  hasDisplayEach = true;
3841  }
3842  else
3843  {
3844  hasDisplayEach = false;
3845  }
3846 
3847  seconds_wait = init_time_spin->value();
3848 
3849 
3850  inside_combo = insidecolor_combobox->currentIndex();
3851  outside_combo = outsidecolor_combobox->currentIndex();
3852 
3853  Rin_selected1 = Rin_selected2;
3854  Gin_selected1 = Gin_selected2;
3855  Bin_selected1 = Bin_selected2;
3856 
3857  Rout_selected1 = Rout_selected2;
3858  Gout_selected1 = Gout_selected2;
3859  Bout_selected1 = Bout_selected2;
3860 
3861 
3862 
3864 
3865  if( (phi_init1 != NULL) && (phi_init2 != NULL) )
3866  {
3867  std::memcpy(phi_init1,phi_init2,img_size);
3868  }
3869  clean_boundaries(phi_init2,phi_init2_clean);
3870  if( (phi_init1_clean != NULL) && (phi_init2_clean != NULL) )
3871  {
3872  std::memcpy(phi_init1_clean,phi_init2_clean,img_size);
3873  }
3874  phiInit2imgPhi();
3875 
3876  QSettings settings("Bessy", "Ofeli");
3877 
3878  settings.setValue("Settings/Algorithm/Na", Na1);
3879  settings.setValue("Settings/Algorithm/Ns", Ns1);
3880  settings.setValue("Settings/Algorithm/model", model);
3881  settings.setValue("Settings/Algorithm/isRgb", isRgb1);
3882  settings.setValue("Settings/Algorithm/lambda_out", lambda_out1);
3883  settings.setValue("Settings/Algorithm/lambda_in", lambda_in1);
3884  settings.setValue("Settings/Algorithm/kernel_gradient_length", kernel_gradient_length1);
3885  settings.setValue("Settings/Algorithm/alpha", alpha1);
3886  settings.setValue("Settings/Algorithm/beta", beta1);
3887  settings.setValue("Settings/Algorithm/gamma", gamma1);
3888  settings.setValue("Settings/Algorithm/hasSmoothingCycle", hasSmoothingCycle1);
3889  settings.setValue("Settings/Algorithm/kernel_curve", kernel_curve1);
3890  settings.setValue("Settings/Algorithm/std_curve", std_curve1);
3891 
3892  //settings.setValue("Settings/Initialization/img_phi", img_phi);
3893  settings.setValue("Settings/Initialization/hasEllipse", hasEllipse1);
3894  settings.setValue("Settings/Initialization/init_width", init_width1);
3895  settings.setValue("Settings/Initialization/init_height", init_height1);
3896  settings.setValue("Settings/Initialization/center_x", center_x1);
3897  settings.setValue("Settings/Initialization/center_y", center_y1);
3898 
3899  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/hasPreprocess", hasPreprocess);
3900  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/hasGaussianNoise", hasGaussianNoise);
3901  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/std_noise", std_noise);
3902  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/hasSaltNoise", hasSaltNoise);
3903  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/proba_noise", proba_noise);
3904  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/hasSpeckleNoise", hasSpeckleNoise);
3905  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/std_speckle_noise", std_speckle_noise);
3906 
3907  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/hasMedianFilt", hasMedianFilt);
3908  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/kernel_median_length", kernel_median_length1);
3909  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/hasO1algo", hasO1algo1);
3910  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/hasMeanFilt", hasMeanFilt);
3911  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/kernel_mean_length", kernel_mean_length1);
3912  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/hasGaussianFilt", hasGaussianFilt);
3913  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/kernel_gaussian_length", kernel_gaussian_length1);
3914  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/sigma", sigma);
3915 
3916  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/hasAnisoDiff", hasAnisoDiff);
3917  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/aniso_option", aniso_option1);
3918  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/max_itera", max_itera1);
3919  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/lambda", lambda1);
3920  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/kappa", kappa1);
3921 
3922  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/hasOpenFilt", hasOpenFilt);
3923  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/kernel_open_length", kernel_open_length1);
3924 
3925  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/hasCloseFilt", hasCloseFilt);
3926  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/kernel_close_length", kernel_close_length1);
3927 
3928  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/hasTophatFilt", hasTophatFilt);
3929  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/isWhiteTophat", isWhiteTophat);
3930  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/kernel_tophat_length", kernel_tophat_length1);
3931 
3932  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/hasO1morpho", hasO1morpho1);
3933 
3934 
3935  settings.setValue("Settings/Display/hasHistoNormaliz", hasHistoNormaliz);
3936 
3937  settings.setValue("Settings/Display/hasDisplayEach", hasDisplayEach);
3938 
3939  settings.setValue("Settings/Display/inside_combo", inside_combo);
3940  settings.setValue("Settings/Display/outside_combo", outside_combo);
3941 
3942  settings.setValue("Settings/Display/Rout_selected", int(Rout_selected1));
3943  settings.setValue("Settings/Display/Gout_selected", int(Gout_selected1));
3944  settings.setValue("Settings/Display/Bout_selected", int(Bout_selected1));
3945  settings.setValue("Settings/Display/Rin_selected", int(Rin_selected1));
3946  settings.setValue("Settings/Display/Gin_selected", int(Gin_selected1));
3947  settings.setValue("Settings/Display/Bin_selected", int(Bin_selected1));
3948 
3949  settings.setValue("Settings/Display/seconds_wait", seconds_wait);
3950 }
3951 
3952 // si on clique sur le boutton Cancel de settings_window
3953 // les widgets reprennent leur état, correspondant aux valeurs des paramètres
3954 void ImageViewer::cancel_settings()
3955 {
3957  // Algorithm //
3959 
3960  Na_spin->setValue(Na1);
3961 
3962  if( model == 1 )
3963  {
3964  chanvese_radio->setChecked(true);
3965  }
3966  if( model == 2 )
3967  {
3968  geodesic_radio->setChecked(true);
3969  }
3970 
3971  lambda_out_spin->setValue(lambda_out1);
3972  lambda_in_spin->setValue(lambda_in1);
3973 
3974  klength_gradient_spin->setValue(kernel_gradient_length1);
3975 
3976  Yspin->setValue(alpha1);
3977  Uspin->setValue(beta1);
3978  Vspin->setValue(gamma1);
3979 
3980  Ns_spin->setValue(Ns1);
3981 
3982  if( hasSmoothingCycle1 )
3983  {
3984  internalspeed_groupbox->setChecked(true);
3985  }
3986  else
3987  {
3988  internalspeed_groupbox->setChecked(false);
3989  }
3990 
3991  klength_spin->setValue(kernel_curve1);
3992  std_spin->setValue(std_curve1);
3993 
3995  // Initialization //
3997 
3998  if( !hasEllipse1 )
3999  {
4000  rectangle_radio->setChecked(true);
4001  }
4002  else
4003  {
4004  ellipse_radio->setChecked(true);
4005  }
4006 
4007  width_shape_spin->setValue(int(init_width1*100.0));
4008  height_shape_spin->setValue(int(init_height1*100.0));
4009 
4010  abscissa_spin->setValue(int(center_x1*100.0));
4011  ordinate_spin->setValue(int(center_y1*100.0));
4012 
4014  // Preprocessing //
4016 
4017  if( hasPreprocess )
4018  {
4019  preprocessing_groupbox->setChecked(true);
4020  }
4021  else
4022  {
4023  preprocessing_groupbox->setChecked(false);
4024  }
4025 
4026  if( hasGaussianNoise )
4027  {
4028  gaussian_noise_groupbox->setChecked(true);
4029  }
4030  else
4031  {
4032  gaussian_noise_groupbox->setChecked(false);
4033  }
4034 
4035 
4036  std_noise_spin->setValue(std_noise);
4037 
4038  if( hasSaltNoise )
4039  {
4040  salt_noise_groupbox->setChecked(true);
4041  }
4042  else
4043  {
4044  salt_noise_groupbox->setChecked(false);
4045  }
4046 
4047  proba_noise_spin->setValue(100.0*proba_noise);
4048 
4049  if( hasSpeckleNoise )
4050  {
4051  speckle_noise_groupbox->setChecked(true);
4052  }
4053  else
4054  {
4055  speckle_noise_groupbox->setChecked(false);
4056  }
4057 
4058  std_speckle_noise_spin->setValue(std_speckle_noise);
4059 
4060  if( hasMedianFilt )
4061  {
4062  median_groupbox->setChecked(true);
4063  }
4064  else
4065  {
4066  median_groupbox->setChecked(false);
4067  }
4068 
4069  klength_median_spin->setValue(kernel_median_length1);
4070 
4071  if( hasO1algo1 )
4072  {
4073  complex_radio2->setChecked(true);
4074  }
4075  else
4076  {
4077  complex_radio1->setChecked(true);
4078  }
4079 
4080  if( hasMeanFilt )
4081  {
4082  mean_groupbox->setChecked(true);
4083  }
4084  else
4085  {
4086  mean_groupbox->setChecked(false);
4087  }
4088  klength_mean_spin->setValue(kernel_mean_length1);
4089 
4090  if( hasGaussianFilt )
4091  {
4092  gaussian_groupbox->setChecked(true);
4093  }
4094  else
4095  {
4096  gaussian_groupbox->setChecked(false);
4097  }
4098  klength_gaussian_spin->setValue(kernel_gaussian_length1);
4099  std_filter_spin->setValue(sigma);
4100 
4101  if( hasAnisoDiff )
4102  {
4103  aniso_groupbox->setChecked(true);
4104  }
4105  else
4106  {
4107  aniso_groupbox->setChecked(false);
4108  }
4109 
4110  iteration_filter_spin->setValue(max_itera1);
4111  lambda_spin->setValue(lambda1);
4112  kappa_spin->setValue(kappa1);
4113  if( aniso_option1 == 1 )
4114  {
4115  aniso1_radio->setChecked(true);
4116  }
4117  if( aniso_option1 == 2 )
4118  {
4119  aniso2_radio->setChecked(true);
4120  }
4121 
4122  if( hasOpenFilt )
4123  {
4124  open_groupbox->setChecked(true);
4125  }
4126  else
4127  {
4128  open_groupbox->setChecked(false);
4129  }
4130  klength_open_spin->setValue(kernel_open_length1);
4131 
4132  if( hasCloseFilt )
4133  {
4134  close_groupbox->setChecked(true);
4135  }
4136  else
4137  {
4138  close_groupbox->setChecked(false);
4139  }
4140  klength_close_spin->setValue(kernel_close_length1);
4141 
4142  if( hasTophatFilt )
4143  {
4144  tophat_groupbox->setChecked(true);
4145  }
4146  else
4147  {
4148  tophat_groupbox->setChecked(false);
4149  }
4150  if( isWhiteTophat )
4151  {
4152  whitetophat_radio->setChecked(true);
4153  }
4154  else
4155  {
4156  blacktophat_radio->setChecked(true);
4157  }
4158  klength_tophat_spin->setValue(kernel_tophat_length1);
4159 
4160  if( hasO1morpho1 )
4161  {
4162  complex2_morpho_radio->setChecked(true);
4163  }
4164  else
4165  {
4166  complex1_morpho_radio->setChecked(true);
4167  }
4168 
4170  // Display //
4172 
4173  scale_spin->setValue(scale_spin0->value());
4174 
4175  if( hasHistoNormaliz )
4176  {
4177  histo_checkbox->setChecked(true);
4178  }
4179  else
4180  {
4181  histo_checkbox->setChecked(false);
4182  }
4183 
4184  if( hasDisplayEach )
4185  {
4186  step_checkbox->setChecked(true);
4187  }
4188  else
4189  {
4190  step_checkbox->setChecked(false);
4191  }
4192 
4193  init_time_spin->setValue(seconds_wait);
4194 
4195 
4196  insidecolor_combobox->setCurrentIndex(inside_combo);
4197  outsidecolor_combobox->setCurrentIndex(outside_combo);
4198 
4199  Rin_selected2 = Rin_selected1;
4200  Gin_selected2 = Gin_selected1;
4201  Bin_selected2 = Bin_selected1;
4202 
4203  Rout_selected2 = Rout_selected1;
4204  Gout_selected2 = Gout_selected1;
4205  Bout_selected2 = Bout_selected1;
4206 
4207  unsigned char R, G, B;
4208 
4209  if( inside_combo == 8 )
4210  {
4211  R = Rin_selected2;
4212  G = Gin_selected2;
4213  B = Bin_selected2;
4214  }
4215  else
4216  {
4217  get_color(inside_combo,R,G,B);
4218  }
4219  QPixmap pm1(12,12);
4220  pm1.fill(QColor(R,G,B));
4221  insidecolor_combobox->setItemIcon(8,pm1);
4222 
4223  if( outside_combo == 8 )
4224  {
4225  R = Rout_selected2;
4226  G = Gout_selected2;
4227  B = Bout_selected2;
4228  }
4229  else
4230  {
4231  get_color(outside_combo,R,G,B);
4232  }
4233  QPixmap pm2(12,12);
4234  pm2.fill(QColor(R,G,B));
4235  outsidecolor_combobox->setItemIcon(8,pm2);
4236 
4238 
4239  if( (phi_init1 != NULL) && (phi_init2 != NULL) )
4240  {
4241  std::memcpy(phi_init2,phi_init1,img_size);
4242  }
4243  clean_boundaries(phi_init1,phi_init1_clean);
4244  if( (phi_init1_clean != NULL) && (phi_init2_clean != NULL) )
4245  {
4246  std::memcpy(phi_init2_clean,phi_init1_clean,img_size);
4247  }
4248 
4249  phi_visu(true);
4250  shape_visu();
4251 
4252  phiInit2imgPhi();
4253 
4254  QSettings settings("Bessy", "Ofeli");
4255 
4256  settings.setValue("Settings/Algorithm/Na", Na1);
4257  settings.setValue("Settings/Algorithm/Ns", Ns1);
4258  settings.setValue("Settings/Algorithm/model", model);
4259  settings.setValue("Settings/Algorithm/isRgb", isRgb1);
4260  settings.setValue("Settings/Algorithm/lambda_out", lambda_out1);
4261  settings.setValue("Settings/Algorithm/lambda_in", lambda_in1);
4262  settings.setValue("Settings/Algorithm/kernel_gradient_length", kernel_gradient_length1);
4263  settings.setValue("Settings/Algorithm/alpha", alpha1);
4264  settings.setValue("Settings/Algorithm/beta", beta1);
4265  settings.setValue("Settings/Algorithm/gamma", gamma1);
4266  settings.setValue("Settings/Algorithm/hasSmoothingCycle", hasSmoothingCycle1);
4267  settings.setValue("Settings/Algorithm/kernel_curve", kernel_curve1);
4268  settings.setValue("Settings/Algorithm/std_curve", std_curve1);
4269 
4270  //settings.setValue("Settings/Initialization/img_phi", img_phi);
4271  settings.setValue("Settings/Initialization/hasEllipse", hasEllipse1);
4272  settings.setValue("Settings/Initialization/init_width", init_width1);
4273  settings.setValue("Settings/Initialization/init_height", init_height1);
4274  settings.setValue("Settings/Initialization/center_x", center_x1);
4275  settings.setValue("Settings/Initialization/center_y", center_y1);
4276 
4277  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/hasPreprocess", hasPreprocess);
4278  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/hasGaussianNoise", hasGaussianNoise);
4279  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/std_noise", std_noise);
4280  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/hasSaltNoise", hasSaltNoise);
4281  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/proba_noise", proba_noise);
4282  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/hasSpeckleNoise", hasSpeckleNoise);
4283  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/std_speckle_noise", std_speckle_noise);
4284 
4285  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/hasMedianFilt", hasMedianFilt);
4286  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/kernel_median_length", kernel_median_length1);
4287  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/hasO1algo", hasO1algo1);
4288  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/hasMeanFilt", hasMeanFilt);
4289  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/kernel_mean_length", kernel_mean_length1);
4290  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/hasGaussianFilt", hasGaussianFilt);
4291  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/kernel_gaussian_length", kernel_gaussian_length1);
4292  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/sigma", sigma);
4293 
4294  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/hasAnisoDiff", hasAnisoDiff);
4295  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/aniso_option", aniso_option1);
4296  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/max_itera", max_itera1);
4297  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/lambda", lambda1);
4298  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/kappa", kappa1);
4299 
4300  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/hasOpenFilt", hasOpenFilt);
4301  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/kernel_open_length", kernel_open_length1);
4302 
4303  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/hasCloseFilt", hasCloseFilt);
4304  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/kernel_close_length", kernel_close_length1);
4305 
4306  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/hasTophatFilt", hasTophatFilt);
4307  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/isWhiteTophat", isWhiteTophat);
4308  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/kernel_tophat_length", kernel_tophat_length1);
4309 
4310  settings.setValue("Settings/Preprocessing/hasO1morpho", hasO1morpho1);
4311 
4312 
4313  settings.setValue("Settings/Display/hasHistoNormaliz", hasHistoNormaliz);
4314 
4315  settings.setValue("Settings/Display/hasDisplayEach", hasDisplayEach);
4316 
4317  settings.setValue("Settings/Display/inside_combo", inside_combo);
4318  settings.setValue("Settings/Display/outside_combo", outside_combo);
4319 
4320  settings.setValue("Settings/Display/Rout_selected", int(Rout_selected1));
4321  settings.setValue("Settings/Display/Gout_selected", int(Gout_selected1));
4322  settings.setValue("Settings/Display/Bout_selected", int(Bout_selected1));
4323  settings.setValue("Settings/Display/Rin_selected", int(Rin_selected1));
4324  settings.setValue("Settings/Display/Gin_selected", int(Gin_selected1));
4325  settings.setValue("Settings/Display/Bin_selected", int(Bin_selected1));
4326 
4327  settings.setValue("Settings/Display/seconds_wait", seconds_wait);
4328 }
4329 
4330 void ImageViewer::default_settings()
4331 {
4333 
4334  // paramètres par défaut de l'onglet Algorithm
4335 
4337 
4338  Na1 = 30;
4339  Ns1 = 3;
4340  model = 1;
4341  lambda_out1 = 1;
4342  lambda_in1 = 1;
4343  kernel_gradient_length1 = 5;
4344  alpha1 = 1;
4345  beta1 = 10;
4346  gamma1 = 10;
4347  hasSmoothingCycle1 = true;
4348  kernel_curve1 = 5;
4349  std_curve1 = 2.0;
4350 
4352 
4354 
4355  // paramètres par défaut de l'onglet Initialisation
4356 
4358 
4359  hasEllipse1 = false;
4360  init_width1 = 0.95;
4361  init_height1 = 0.95;
4362  center_x1 = 0.0;
4363  center_y1 = 0.0;
4364 
4366 
4368 
4369  // paramètres par défaut de l'onglet Preprocessing
4370 
4372 
4373  hasPreprocess = false;
4374  hasGaussianNoise = false;
4375  std_noise = 20.0;
4376  hasSaltNoise = false;
4377  proba_noise = 0.05;
4378  hasSpeckleNoise = false;
4379  std_speckle_noise = 0.16;
4380 
4381  hasMedianFilt = false;
4382  kernel_median_length1 = 5;
4383  hasO1algo1 = true;
4384 
4385  hasMeanFilt = false;
4386  kernel_mean_length1 = 5;
4387 
4388  hasGaussianFilt = false;
4389  kernel_gaussian_length1 = 5;
4390  sigma = 2.0;
4391 
4392  hasAnisoDiff = false;
4393  aniso_option1 = 1;
4394  max_itera1 = 10;
4395  lambda1 = 1.0/7.0;
4396  kappa1 = 30.0;
4397 
4398  hasOpenFilt = false;
4399  kernel_open_length1 = 5;
4400 
4401  hasCloseFilt = false;
4402  kernel_close_length1 = 5;
4403 
4404  hasTophatFilt = false;
4405  isWhiteTophat = true;
4406  kernel_tophat_length1 = 5;
4407 
4408  hasO1morpho1 = true;
4409 
4411 
4412  // paramètres par défaut de l'onglet Display
4413 
4415 
4416  hasHistoNormaliz = true;
4417 
4418  hasDisplayEach = true;
4419  inside_combo = 0;
4420  outside_combo = 2;
4421 
4422  Rout_selected1 = 128;
4423  Gout_selected1 = 0;
4424  Bout_selected1 = 255;
4425 
4426  Rin_selected1 = 255;
4427  Gin_selected1 = 128;
4428  Bin_selected1 = 0;
4429 
4430  seconds_wait = 0.0;
4431 
4432  hasEllipse1 = true;
4433  init_width1 = 0.65;
4434  init_height1 = 0.65;
4435  center_x1 = 0.0;
4436  center_y1 = 0.0;
4437  cancel_settings();
4438 
4439  scale_spin->setValue(100);
4440 
4441  QImage img_phi0 = QImage(100,100, QImage::Format_Indexed8);
4442 
4443  int x, y; // position
4444 
4445  for( int offset = 0; offset < 10000; offset++ )
4446  {
4447  // offset = x+y*img_width <==>
4448  y = offset/100;
4449  x = offset-y*100;
4450 
4451  if( x < 95 && x > 5 && y < 95 && y > 5 )
4452  {
4453  *( img_phi0.scanLine(y)+x ) = 255;
4454  }
4455  else
4456  {
4457  *( img_phi0.scanLine(y)+x ) = 0;
4458  }
4459  }
4460 
4461  img_phi = img_phi0.scaled( img_width, img_height, Qt::IgnoreAspectRatio, Qt::FastTransformation);
4462 
4463  imgPhi2phiInit();
4464 
4465  // pour afficher l'image dans la fenetre settings
4466  int n_out = 0;
4467  int n_in = 0;
4468  for( int offset = 0; offset < img_size; offset++ )
4469  {
4470  if( phi_init1_clean[offset] == 1 )
4471  {
4472  Lout_2[n_out++] = offset;
4473  }
4474  if( phi_init1_clean[offset] == -1 )
4475  {
4476  Lin_2[n_in++] = offset;
4477  }
4478  }
4479  Lout_2[n_out] = list_end;
4480  Lin_2[n_in] = list_end;
4481 
4482  filtering_visu();
4483  tab_visu(onglets->currentIndex());
4484 }
4485 
4486 // Fonction appelée pour le changement d 'echelle de l'image dans la fenêtre paramètre
4487 void ImageViewer::do_scale(int value)
4488 {
4489  if( img1 != NULL )
4490  {
4491  double scale_factor = value/100.0;
4492  imageLabel_settings->setZoomFactor(scale_factor);
4493 
4494  }
4495 }
4496 
4497 // Nettoyage des frontières
4498 void ImageViewer::clean_boundaries(char* phi, char* phi_clean)
4499 {
4500  if( phi != NULL && phi_clean != NULL )
4501  {
4502  int offset, x, y; // position
4503 
4504  for( offset = 0; offset < img_size; offset++ )
4505  {
4506  if( phi[offset] == 1 )
4507  {
4508  // offset = x+y*img_width <==>
4509  y = offset/img_width;
4510  x = offset-y*img_width;
4511 
4512  // nettoyage si la condition de voisinage aux frontières n'est pas respectée
4513  if( isRedundantPointOfLout(phi,x,y) )
4514  {
4515  phi_clean[offset] = 3;
4516  }
4517  else
4518  {
4519  phi_clean[offset] = 1;
4520  }
4521  }
4522 
4523  if( phi[offset] == -1 )
4524  {
4525  // offset = x+y*img_width <==>
4526  y = offset/img_width;
4527  x = offset-y*img_width;
4528 
4529  if( isRedundantPointOfLin(phi,x,y) )
4530  {
4531  phi_clean[offset] = -3;
4532  }
4533  else
4534  {
4535  phi_clean[offset] = -1;
4536  }
4537  }
4538  }
4539 
4540  // efface l'affichage des listes
4541  for( int n_out = 0; Lout_2[n_out] != list_end; n_out++ )
4542  {
4543  offset = Lout_2[n_out]*3;
4544 
4545  image_phi_uchar[offset] = image_filter_uchar[offset];
4546  image_phi_uchar[offset+1] = image_filter_uchar[offset+1];
4547  image_phi_uchar[offset+2] = image_filter_uchar[offset+2];
4548 
4549  image_shape_uchar[offset] = image_filter_uchar[offset];
4550  image_shape_uchar[offset+1] = image_filter_uchar[offset+1];
4551  image_shape_uchar[offset+2] = image_filter_uchar[offset+2];
4552  }
4553 
4554  for( int n_in = 0; Lin_2[n_in] != list_end; n_in++ )
4555  {
4556  offset = Lin_2[n_in]*3;
4557 
4558  image_phi_uchar[offset] = image_filter_uchar[offset];
4559  image_phi_uchar[offset+1] = image_filter_uchar[offset+1];
4560  image_phi_uchar[offset+2] = image_filter_uchar[offset+2];
4561 
4562  image_shape_uchar[offset] = image_filter_uchar[offset];
4563  image_shape_uchar[offset+1] = image_filter_uchar[offset+1];
4564  image_shape_uchar[offset+2] = image_filter_uchar[offset+2];
4565  }
4566 
4567  int n_out = 0;
4568  int n_in = 0;
4569  for( int offset = 0; offset < img_size; offset++ )
4570  {
4571  if( phi_clean[offset] == 1 )
4572  {
4573  Lout_2[n_out++] = offset;
4574  }
4575  if( phi_clean[offset] == -1 )
4576  {
4577  Lin_2[n_in++] = offset;
4578  }
4579  }
4580  Lout_2[n_out] = list_end;
4581  Lin_2[n_in] = list_end;
4582 
4583  }
4584  return;
4585 }
4586 
4587 bool ImageViewer::isRedundantPointOfLin(char* phi, int x, int y)
4588 {
4589  // if ∃ a neighbor ∈ Lout | ∈ Rout
4590 
4591  if( y-1 >= 0 )
4592  {
4593  if( phi[ x+(y-1)*img_width ] >= 0 )
4594  {
4595  return false; // is not redundant point of Lin
4596  }
4597  }
4598  if( x-1 >= 0 )
4599  {
4600  if( phi[ (x-1)+y*img_width ] >= 0 )
4601  {
4602  return false; // is not redundant point of Lin
4603  }
4604  }
4605  if( x+1 < img_width )
4606  {
4607  if( phi[ (x+1)+y*img_width ] >= 0 )
4608  {
4609  return false; // is not redundant point of Lin
4610  }
4611  }
4612  if( y+1 < img_height )
4613  {
4614  if( phi[ x+(y+1)*img_width ] >= 0 )
4615  {
4616  return false; // is not redundant point of Lin
4617  }
4618  }
4619 
4620  // ==> ∀ neighbors ∈ Lin | ∈ Rin
4621  return true; // is redundant point of Lin
4622 }
4623 
4624 bool ImageViewer::isRedundantPointOfLout(char* phi, int x, int y)
4625 {
4626  // if ∃ a neighbor ∈ Lin | ∈ Rin
4627 
4628  if( y-1 >= 0 )
4629  {
4630  if( phi[ x+(y-1)*img_width ] <= 0 )
4631  {
4632  return false; // is not redundant point of Lout
4633  }
4634  }
4635  if( x-1 >= 0 )
4636  {
4637  if( phi[ (x-1)+y*img_width ] <= 0 )
4638  {
4639  return false; // is not redundant point of Lout
4640  }
4641  }
4642  if( x+1 < img_width )
4643  {
4644  if( phi[ (x+1)+y*img_width ] <= 0 )
4645  {
4646  return false; // is not redundant point of Lout
4647  }
4648  }
4649  if( y+1 < img_height )
4650  {
4651  if( phi[ x+(y+1)*img_width ] <= 0 )
4652  {
4653  return false; // is not redundant point of Lout
4654  }
4655  }
4656 
4657  // ==> ∀ neighbors ∈ Lout | ∈ Rout
4658  return true; // is redundant point of Lout
4659 }
4660 
4661 // Fonction appelée dans l'onglet initalisation pour calculer et afficher l'image+phi(couleur foncé)+forme(couleur clair)
4662 void ImageViewer::shape_visu()
4663 {
4664  if( shape != NULL )
4665  {
4666  init_width2 = double(width_shape_spin->value())/100.0;
4667  init_height2 = double(height_shape_spin->value())/100.0;
4668  center_x2 = double(abscissa_spin->value())/100.0;
4669  center_y2 = double(ordinate_spin->value())/100.0;
4670 
4671  if( rectangle_radio->isChecked() )
4672  {
4673  hasEllipse2 = false;
4674  }
4675  if( ellipse_radio->isChecked() )
4676  {
4677  hasEllipse2 = true;
4678  }
4679 
4680 
4681  int offset, x, y; // position
4682 
4683  // efface les listes de la QImage
4684  for( int n_out = 0; Lout_shape1[n_out] != list_end; n_out++ )
4685  {
4686  offset = Lout_shape1[n_out]*3;
4687 
4688  image_shape_uchar[offset] = image_phi_uchar[offset];
4689  image_shape_uchar[offset+1] = image_phi_uchar[offset+1];
4690  image_shape_uchar[offset+2] = image_phi_uchar[offset+2];
4691  }
4692 
4693  for( int n_in = 0; Lin_shape1[n_in] != list_end; n_in++ )
4694  {
4695  offset = Lin_shape1[n_in]*3;
4696 
4697  image_shape_uchar[offset] = image_phi_uchar[offset];
4698  image_shape_uchar[offset+1] = image_phi_uchar[offset+1];
4699  image_shape_uchar[offset+2] = image_phi_uchar[offset+2];
4700  }
4701 
4702  if( hasEllipse2 )
4703  {
4704  // Thanks to Alois Zingl for his ellipse Bresenham's Algorithm implementation
4705  // http://free.pages.at/easyfilter/bresenham.html
4706 
4707  int n = 0;
4708  int x0 = int((1.0-init_width2)*double(img_width)/2.0 + center_x2*double(img_width));
4709  int y0 = int((1.0-init_height2)*double(img_height)/2.0 + center_y2*double(img_height));
4710  int x1 = int((double(img_width)-(1.0-init_width2)*double(img_width)/2.0) + center_x2*double(img_width));
4711  int y1 = int((double(img_height)-(1.0-init_height2)*double(img_height)/2.0)+ center_y2*double(img_height));
4712 
4713  // values of diameter
4714  double a = abs(x1-x0);
4715  int b = abs(y1-y0);
4716 
4717  double b1 = b&1;
4718  double dx = double(4*(1-a)*b*b);
4719  double dy = double(4*(b1+1)*a*a);
4720  double err = dx+dy+double(b1*a*a); // error increment
4721  double e2; // error of 1.step
4722 
4723  if( x0 > x1 )
4724  {
4725  x0 = x1; // if called with swapped points
4726  x1 += int(a);
4727  }
4728 
4729  if( y0 > y1 )
4730  {
4731  y0 = y1; // .. exchange them
4732  }
4733 
4734  y0 += (b+1)/2;
4735  y1 = y0-int(b1); // starting pixel
4736  a *= 8.0*a;
4737  b1 = 8.0*double(b)*double(b);
4738 
4739  do
4740  {
4741  if( n < 2*img_size-20 )
4742  {
4743  for( int ddy = -2; ddy <= 2; ddy++ )
4744  {
4745  for( int ddx = -2; ddx <= 2; ddx++ )
4746  {
4747  shape_points[n++] = x1+ddx+(y0+ddy)*img_width; // I. Quadrant
4748  shape_points[n++] = x0+ddx+(y0+ddy)*img_width; // II. Quadrant
4749  shape_points[n++] = x0+ddx+(y1+ddy)*img_width; // III. Quadrant
4750  shape_points[n++] = x1+ddx+(y1+ddy)*img_width; // IV. Quadrant
4751  }
4752  }
4753  }
4754 
4755  e2 = 2.0*err;
4756 
4757  // x step
4758  if( e2 >= dx )
4759  {
4760  x0++;
4761  x1--;
4762  dx += b1;
4763  err += dx;
4764  }
4765 
4766  // y step
4767  if( e2 <= dy )
4768  {
4769  y0++;
4770  y1--;
4771  dy += a;
4772  err += dy;
4773  }
4774 
4775  }
4776  while( x0 <= x1 );
4777 
4778  // too early stop of flat ellipses a = 1
4779  // -> finish tip of ellipse
4780  while( y0-y1 < b )
4781  {
4782  if( n < 2*img_size-20 )
4783  {
4784  for( int ddy = -2; ddy <= 2; ddy++ )
4785  {
4786  for( int ddx = -2; ddx <= 2; ddx++ )
4787  {
4788  shape_points[n++] = x0-1+ddx+(y0+ddy)*img_width;
4789  shape_points[n++] = x1+1+ddx+(y0+ddy)*img_width;
4790  shape_points[n++] = x0-1+ddx+(y1+ddy)*img_width;
4791  shape_points[n++] = x1+1+ddx+(y1+ddy)*img_width;
4792  }
4793  }
4794  y0++;
4795  y1--;
4796  }
4797  }
4798 
4799  // to mark the end;
4800  shape_points[n] = list_end;
4801 
4802  int n_out = 0;
4803  int n_in = 0;
4804  for( int n = 0; shape_points[n] != list_end; n++ )
4805  {
4806  offset = shape_points[n];
4807 
4808  y = offset/img_width;
4809  x = offset-y*img_width;
4810 
4811  if( x >= 0 && x < img_width && y >= 0 && y < img_height )
4812  {
4813  if( (double(y)-(1.0+2.0*center_y2)*double(img_height)/2.0)*(double(y)-(1.0+2.0*center_y2)*double(img_height)/2.0)/(init_height2*double(img_height)/2.0*init_height2*double(img_height)/2.0)+(double(x)-(1.0+2.0*center_x2)*double(img_width)/2.0)*(double(x)-(1.0+2.0*center_x2)*double(img_width)/2.0)/(init_width2*double(img_width)/2.0*init_width2*double(img_width)/2.0) > 1.0 )
4814  {
4815  if( (double(y-1)-(1.0+2.0*center_y2)*double(img_height)/2.0)*(double(y-1)-(1.0+2.0*center_y2)*double(img_height)/2.0)/(init_height2*double(img_height)/2.0*init_height2*double(img_height)/2.0)+(double(x)-(1.0+2.0*center_x2)*double(img_width)/2.0)*(double(x)-(1.0+2.0*center_x2)*double(img_width)/2.0)/(init_width2*double(img_width)/2.0*init_width2*double(img_width)/2.0) <= 1.0 )
4816  {
4817  if( Lout_shape1[n_out] != offset )
4818  {
4819  Lout_shape1[n_out++] = offset;
4820  }
4821  }
4822 
4823  if( (double(y)-(1.0+2.0*center_y2)*double(img_height)/2.0)*(double(y)-(1.0+2.0*center_y2)*double(img_height)/2.0)/(init_height2*double(img_height)/2.0*init_height2*double(img_height)/2.0)+(double(x-1)-(1.0+2.0*center_x2)*double(img_width)/2.0)*(double(x-1)-(1.0+2.0*center_x2)*double(img_width)/2.0)/(init_width2*double(img_width)/2.0*init_width2*double(img_width)/2.0) <= 1.0 )
4824  {
4825  if( Lout_shape1[n_out] != offset )
4826  {
4827  Lout_shape1[n_out++] = offset;
4828  }
4829  }
4830 
4831  if( (double(y)-(1.0+2.0*center_y2)*double(img_height)/2.0)*(double(y)-(1.0+2.0*center_y2)*double(img_height)/2.0)/(init_height2*double(img_height)/2.0*init_height2*double(img_height)/2.0)+(double(x+1)-(1.0+2.0*center_x2)*double(img_width)/2.0)*(double(x+1)-(1.0+2.0*center_x2)*double(img_width)/2.0)/(init_width2*double(img_width)/2.0*init_width2*double(img_width)/2.0) <= 1.0 )
4832  {
4833  if( Lout_shape1[n_out] != offset )
4834  {
4835  Lout_shape1[n_out++] = offset;
4836  }
4837  }
4838 
4839  if( (double(y+1)-(1.0+2.0*center_y2)*double(img_height)/2.0)*(double(y+1)-(1.0+2.0*center_y2)*double(img_height)/2.0)/(init_height2*double(img_height)/2.0*init_height2*double(img_height)/2.0)+(double(x)-(1.0+2.0*center_x2)*double(img_width)/2.0)*(double(x)-(1.0+2.0*center_x2)*double(img_width)/2.0)/(init_width2*double(img_width)/2.0*init_width2*double(img_width)/2.0) <= 1.0 )
4840  {
4841  if( Lout_shape1[n_out] != offset )
4842  {
4843  Lout_shape1[n_out++] = offset;
4844  }
4845  }
4846  }
4847  else
4848  {
4849  if( (double(y-1)-(1.0+2.0*center_y2)*double(img_height)/2.0)*(double(y-1)-(1.0+2.0*center_y2)*double(img_height)/2.0)/(init_height2*double(img_height)/2.0*init_height2*double(img_height)/2.0)+(double(x)-(1.0+2.0*center_x2)*double(img_width)/2.0)*(double(x)-(1.0+2.0*center_x2)*double(img_width)/2.0)/(init_width2*double(img_width)/2.0*init_width2*double(img_width)/2.0) > 1.0 )
4850  {
4851  if( Lin_shape1[n_in] != offset )
4852  {
4853  Lin_shape1[n_in++] = offset;
4854  }
4855  }
4856 
4857  if( (double(y)-(1.0+2.0*center_y2)*double(img_height)/2.0)*(double(y)-(1.0+2.0*center_y2)*double(img_height)/2.0)/(init_height2*double(img_height)/2.0*init_height2*double(img_height)/2.0)+(double(x-1)-(1.0+2.0*center_x2)*double(img_width)/2.0)*(double(x-1)-(1.0+2.0*center_x2)*double(img_width)/2.0)/(init_width2*double(img_width)/2.0*init_width2*double(img_width)/2.0) > 1.0 )
4858  {
4859  if( Lin_shape1[n_in] != offset )
4860  {
4861  Lin_shape1[n_in++] = offset;
4862  }
4863  }
4864 
4865  if( (double(y)-(1.0+2.0*center_y2)*double(img_height)/2.0)*(double(y)-(1.0+2.0*center_y2)*double(img_height)/2.0)/(init_height2*double(img_height)/2.0*init_height2*double(img_height)/2.0)+(double(x+1)-(1.0+2.0*center_x2)*double(img_width)/2.0)*(double(x+1)-(1.0+2.0*center_x2)*double(img_width)/2.0)/(init_width2*double(img_width)/2.0*init_width2*double(img_width)/2.0) > 1.0 )
4866  {
4867  if( Lin_shape1[n_in] != offset )
4868  {
4869  Lin_shape1[n_in++] = offset;
4870  }
4871  }
4872 
4873  if( (double(y+1)-(1.0+2.0*center_y2)*double(img_height)/2.0)*(double(y+1)-(1.0+2.0*center_y2)*double(img_height)/2.0)/(init_height2*double(img_height)/2.0*init_height2*double(img_height)/2.0)+(double(x)-(1.0+2.0*center_x2)*double(img_width)/2.0)*(double(x)-(1.0+2.0*center_x2)*double(img_width)/2.0)/(init_width2*double(img_width)/2.0*init_width2*double(img_width)/2.0) > 1.0 )
4874  {
4875  if( Lin_shape1[n_in] != offset )
4876  {
4877  Lin_shape1[n_in++] = offset;
4878  }
4879  }
4880  }
4881  }
4882 
4883  }
4884 
4885  Lout_shape1[n_out] = list_end;
4886  Lin_shape1[n_in] = list_end;
4887  }
4888  else
4889  {
4890  int x1, y1;
4891 
4892  int n = 0;
4893  for( x = int((1.0-init_width2)*double(img_width)/2.0 + center_x2*double(img_width)); x < int((double(img_width)-(1.0-init_width2)*double(img_width)/2.0) + center_x2*double(img_width)); x++ )
4894  {
4895  y = int((1.0-init_height2)*double(img_height)/2.0 + center_y2*double(img_height));
4896  y1 = int((double(img_height)-(1.0-init_height2)*double(img_height)/2.0)+ center_y2*double(img_height));
4897 
4898  if( n < 2*img_size-10 )
4899  {
4900  for( int dy = -2; dy <= 2; dy++ )
4901  {
4902  for( int dx = -2; dx <= 2; dx++ )
4903  {
4904  shape_points[n++] = x+dx+(y+dy)*img_width;
4905  shape_points[n++] = x+dx+(y1+dy)*img_width;
4906  }
4907  }
4908  }
4909  }
4910 
4911  for( y = int((1.0-init_height2)*double(img_height)/2.0 + center_y2*double(img_height)); y < int((double(img_height)-(1.0-init_height2)*double(img_height)/2.0)+ center_y2*double(img_height)); y++ )
4912  {
4913  x = int((1.0-init_width2)*double(img_width)/2.0 + center_x2*double(img_width));
4914 
4915  x1 = int((double(img_width)-(1.0-init_width2)*double(img_width)/2.0) + center_x2*double(img_width));
4916 
4917  if( n < 2*img_size-10 )
4918  {
4919  for( int dy = -2; dy <= 2; dy++ )
4920  {
4921  for( int dx = -2; dx <= 2; dx++ )
4922  {
4923  shape_points[n++] = x+dx+(y+dy)*img_width;
4924  shape_points[n++] = x1+dx+(y+dy)*img_width;
4925  }
4926  }
4927  }
4928  }
4929 
4930  // to mark the end;
4931  shape_points[n] = list_end;
4932 
4933  int n_out = 0;
4934  int n_in = 0;
4935  for( int n = 0; shape_points[n] != list_end; n++ )
4936  {
4937  offset = shape_points[n];
4938 
4939  y = offset/img_width;
4940  x = offset-y*img_width;
4941 
4942  if( x >= 0 && x < img_width && y >= 0 && y < img_height )
4943  {
4944  if( double(y) > ((1.0-init_height2)*double(img_height)/2.0 + center_y2*double(img_height)) && double(y) < ((double(img_height)-(1.0-init_height2)*double(img_height)/2.0) + center_y2*double(img_height)) && double(x) > ((1.0-init_width2)*double(img_width)/2.0 + center_x2*double(img_width)) && double(x) < ((double(img_width)-(1.0-init_width2)*double(img_width)/2.0) + center_x2*double(img_width)) )
4945  {
4946  /*for( int dy = -1; dy <= 1; dy++ )
4947  {
4948  for( int dx = -1; dx <= 1; dx++ )
4949  {
4950  if( !( dx == 0 && dy == 0 ) )
4951  {
4952  if( !( double(y+dy) > ((1.0-init_height2)*double(img_height)/2.0 + center_y2*double(img_height)) && double(y+dy) < ((double(img_height)-(1.0-init_height2)*double(img_height)/2.0) + center_y2*double(img_height)) && double(x+dx) > ((1.0-init_width2)*double(img_width)/2.0 + center_x2*double(img_width)) && double(x+dx) < ((double(img_width)-(1.0-init_width2)*double(img_width)/2.0) + center_x2*double(img_width)) ) )
4953  {
4954  if( Lin_shape1[n_in] != i )
4955  {
4956  Lin_shape1[n_in++] = i;
4957  }
4958  }
4959  }
4960  }
4961  }*/
4962 
4963  if( !( double(y-1) > ((1.0-init_height2)*double(img_height)/2.0 + center_y2*double(img_height)) && double(y-1) < ((double(img_height)-(1.0-init_height2)*double(img_height)/2.0) + center_y2*double(img_height)) && double(x) > ((1.0-init_width2)*double(img_width)/2.0 + center_x2*double(img_width)) && double(x) < ((double(img_width)-(1.0-init_width2)*double(img_width)/2.0) + center_x2*double(img_width)) ) )
4964  {
4965  if( Lin_shape1[n_in] != offset )
4966  {
4967  Lin_shape1[n_in++] = offset;
4968  }
4969  }
4970 
4971  if( !( double(y) > ((1.0-init_height2)*double(img_height)/2.0 + center_y2*double(img_height)) && double(y) < ((double(img_height)-(1.0-init_height2)*double(img_height)/2.0) + center_y2*double(img_height)) && double(x-1) > ((1.0-init_width2)*double(img_width)/2.0 + center_x2*double(img_width)) && double(x-1) < ((double(img_width)-(1.0-init_width2)*double(img_width)/2.0) + center_x2*double(img_width)) ) )
4972  {
4973  if( Lin_shape1[n_in] != offset )
4974  {
4975  Lin_shape1[n_in++] = offset;
4976  }
4977  }
4978 
4979  if( !( double(y) > ((1.0-init_height2)*double(img_height)/2.0 + center_y2*double(img_height)) && double(y) < ((double(img_height)-(1.0-init_height2)*double(img_height)/2.0) + center_y2*double(img_height)) && double(x+1) > ((1.0-init_width2)*double(img_width)/2.0 + center_x2*double(img_width)) && double(x+1) < ((double(img_width)-(1.0-init_width2)*double(img_width)/2.0) + center_x2*double(img_width)) ) )
4980  {
4981  if( Lin_shape1[n_in] != offset )
4982  {
4983  Lin_shape1[n_in++] = offset;
4984  }
4985  }
4986 
4987  if( !( double(y+1) > ((1.0-init_height2)*double(img_height)/2.0 + center_y2*double(img_height)) && double(y+1) < ((double(img_height)-(1.0-init_height2)*double(img_height)/2.0) + center_y2*double(img_height)) && double(x) > ((1.0-init_width2)*double(img_width)/2.0 + center_x2*double(img_width)) && double(x) < ((double(img_width)-(1.0-init_width2)*double(img_width)/2.0) + center_x2*double(img_width)) ) )
4988  {
4989  if( Lin_shape1[n_in] != offset )
4990  {
4991  Lin_shape1[n_in++] = offset;
4992  }
4993  }
4994  }
4995  else
4996  {
4997  /*for( int dy = -1; dy <= 1; dy++ )
4998  {
4999  for( int dx = -1; dx <= 1; dx++ )
5000  {
5001  if( !( dx == 0 && dy == 0 ) )
5002  {
5003  if( double(y+dy) > ((1.0-init_height2)*double(img_height)/2.0 + center_y2*double(img_height)) && double(y+dy) < ((double(img_height)-(1.0-init_height2)*double(img_height)/2.0) + center_y2*double(img_height)) && double(x+dx) > ((1.0-init_width2)*double(img_width)/2.0 + center_x2*double(img_width)) && double(x+dx) < ((double(img_width)-(1.0-init_width2)*double(img_width)/2.0) + center_x2*double(img_width)) )
5004  {
5005  if( Lout_shape1[n_out] != i )
5006  {
5007  Lout_shape1[n_out++] = i;
5008  }
5009  }
5010  }
5011  }
5012  }*/
5013 
5014  if( double(y-1) > ((1.0-init_height2)*double(img_height)/2.0 + center_y2*double(img_height)) && double(y-1) < ((double(img_height)-(1.0-init_height2)*double(img_height)/2.0) + center_y2*double(img_height)) && double(x) > ((1.0-init_width2)*double(img_width)/2.0 + center_x2*double(img_width)) && double(x) < ((double(img_width)-(1.0-init_width2)*double(img_width)/2.0) + center_x2*double(img_width)) )
5015  {
5016  if( Lout_shape1[n_out] != offset )
5017  {
5018  Lout_shape1[n_out++] = offset;
5019  }
5020  }
5021 
5022  if( double(y) > ((1.0-init_height2)*double(img_height)/2.0 + center_y2*double(img_height)) && double(y) < ((double(img_height)-(1.0-init_height2)*double(img_height)/2.0) + center_y2*double(img_height)) && double(x-1) > ((1.0-init_width2)*double(img_width)/2.0 + center_x2*double(img_width)) && double(x-1) < ((double(img_width)-(1.0-init_width2)*double(img_width)/2.0) + center_x2*double(img_width)) )
5023  {
5024  if( Lout_shape1[n_out] != offset )
5025  {
5026  Lout_shape1[n_out++] = offset;
5027  }
5028  }
5029 
5030  if( double(y) > ((1.0-init_height2)*double(img_height)/2.0 + center_y2*double(img_height)) && double(y) < ((double(img_height)-(1.0-init_height2)*double(img_height)/2.0) + center_y2*double(img_height)) && double(x+1) > ((1.0-init_width2)*double(img_width)/2.0 + center_x2*double(img_width)) && double(x+1) < ((double(img_width)-(1.0-init_width2)*double(img_width)/2.0) + center_x2*double(img_width)) )
5031  {
5032  if( Lout_shape1[n_out] != offset )
5033  {
5034  Lout_shape1[n_out++] = offset;
5035  }
5036  }
5037 
5038  if( double(y+1) > ((1.0-init_height2)*double(img_height)/2.0 + center_y2*double(img_height)) && double(y+1) < ((double(img_height)-(1.0-init_height2)*double(img_height)/2.0) + center_y2*double(img_height)) && double(x) > ((1.0-init_width2)*double(img_width)/2.0 + center_x2*double(img_width)) && double(x) < ((double(img_width)-(1.0-init_width2)*double(img_width)/2.0) + center_x2*double(img_width)) )
5039  {
5040  if( Lout_shape1[n_out] != offset )
5041  {
5042  Lout_shape1[n_out++] = offset;
5043  }
5044  }
5045  }
5046  }
5047 
5048  }
5049 
5050  Lout_shape1[n_out] = list_end;
5051  Lin_shape1[n_in] = list_end;
5052  }
5053 
5054  if( outsidecolor_combobox->currentIndex() != 9 )
5055  {
5056  for( int n_out = 0; Lout_shape1[n_out] != list_end; n_out++ )
5057  {
5058  offset = Lout_shape1[n_out]*3;
5059 
5060  image_shape_uchar[offset] = Rout2;
5061  image_shape_uchar[offset+1] = Gout2;
5062  image_shape_uchar[offset+2] = Bout2;
5063  }
5064  }
5065 
5066  if( insidecolor_combobox->currentIndex() != 9 )
5067  {
5068  for( int n_in = 0; Lin_shape1[n_in] != list_end; n_in++ )
5069  {
5070  offset = Lin_shape1[n_in]*3;
5071 
5072  image_shape_uchar[offset] = Rin2;
5073  image_shape_uchar[offset+1] = Gin2;
5074  image_shape_uchar[offset+2] = Bin2;
5075  }
5076  }
5077 
5078  imageLabel_settings->set_qimage(image_shape);
5079  }
5080  return;
5081 }
5082 
5083 // Surcharge pour avoir une signature identique (memes paramètres) entre signaux et slots de Qt
5084 void ImageViewer::shape_visu(int value)
5085 {
5086  shape_visu();
5087 }
5088 
5089 
5090 // Remet phi_init2_clean a zéro, c'est à dire tout correspond à l'extérieur
5091 void ImageViewer::clean_phi_visu()
5092 {
5093  if( phi_init2 != NULL && phi_init2_clean != NULL )
5094  {
5095  clean_boundaries(phi_init2, phi_init2_clean);
5096  for( int offset = 0; offset < img_size; offset++ )
5097  {
5098  phi_init2[offset] = 1;
5099  phi_init2_clean[offset] = 3;
5100  }
5101  clean_boundaries(phi_init2, phi_init2_clean);
5102 
5103  shape_visu();
5104 
5105  }
5106 }
5107 
5108 // Soustrait une forme à phi_init2
5109 void ImageViewer::phi_subtract_shape()
5110 {
5111  if( shape != NULL && phi_init2 != NULL )
5112  {
5113 
5114  int offset, x, y;
5115 
5116  if( hasEllipse2 )
5117  {
5118  for( offset = 0; offset < img_size; offset++ )
5119  {
5120  y = offset/img_width;
5121  x = offset-y*img_width;
5122 
5123  // inéquation de l'ellipse
5124  // grand axe et petit axe proportionnel à la largeur et la hauteur de l'image
5125  // pour une image carrée, l'ellipse est un cercle
5126  // variable init_shape_size par défaut a 0.95 (entre 0 et 1 sinon)
5127  if( (double(y)-(1.0+2.0*center_y2)*double(img_height)/2.0)*(double(y)-(1.0+2.0*center_y2)*double(img_height)/2.0)/(init_height2*double(img_height)/2.0*init_height2*double(img_height)/2.0)+(double(x)-(1.0+2.0*center_x2)*double(img_width)/2.0)*(double(x)-(1.0+2.0*center_x2)*double(img_width)/2.0)/(init_width2*double(img_width)/2.0*init_width2*double(img_width)/2.0) > 1.0 )
5128  {
5129  shape[offset] = 1;
5130  }
5131  else
5132  {
5133  shape[offset] = -1;
5134  }
5135  }
5136 
5137  }
5138 
5139  else
5140  {
5141  for( offset = 0; offset < img_size; offset++ )
5142  {
5143  y = offset/img_width;
5144  x = offset-y*img_width;
5145 
5146  // pour faire un rectangle
5147  // largeur et hauteur du rectangle proportionnel à la largeur et la hauteur de l'image
5148  // pour une image carrée, le rectangle est un carré
5149  if( double(y) > ((1.0-init_height2)*double(img_height)/2.0 + center_y2*double(img_height)) && double(y) < ((double(img_height)-(1.0-init_height2)*double(img_height)/2.0) + center_y2*double(img_height)) && double(x) > ((1.0-init_width2)*double(img_width)/2.0 + center_x2*double(img_width)) && double(x) < ((double(img_width)-(1.0-init_width2)*double(img_width)/2.0) + center_x2*double(img_width)) )
5150  {
5151  shape[offset] = -1;
5152  }
5153  else
5154  {
5155  shape[offset] = 1;
5156  }
5157  }
5158 
5159  }
5160 
5161  bool phi_init2_modif = false;
5162 
5163  for( offset = 0; offset < img_size; offset++ )
5164  {
5165  if( shape[offset] == -1 && phi_init2[offset] == -1 )
5166  {
5167  phi_init2[offset] = 1;
5168  phi_init2_modif = true;
5169  }
5170  }
5171 
5172  clean_boundaries(phi_init2, phi_init2_clean);
5173 
5174  if( !phi_init2_modif )
5175  {
5176  bool hasOne = false;
5177  bool hasMinusOne = false;
5178 
5179  for( offset = 0; offset < img_size; offset++ )
5180  {
5181  if( shape[offset] == 1 )
5182  {
5183  hasOne = true;
5184  }
5185  if( shape[offset] == -1 )
5186  {
5187  hasMinusOne = true;
5188  }
5189  }
5190 
5191  if( hasOne && hasMinusOne )
5192  {
5193  phi_add_shape();
5194  }
5195  }
5196  }
5197 
5198  return;
5199 }
5200 
5201 // Ajoute une forme à phi_init2
5202 void ImageViewer::phi_add_shape()
5203 {
5204  if( shape != NULL && phi_init2 != NULL )
5205  {
5206  int offset, x, y;
5207 
5208  if( hasEllipse2 )
5209  {
5210  for( offset = 0; offset < img_size; offset++ )
5211  {
5212  y = offset/img_width;
5213  x = offset-y*img_width;
5214 
5215  // inéquation de l'ellipse
5216  // grand axe et petit axe proportionnel à la largeur et la hauteur de l'image
5217  // pour une image carrée, l'ellipse est un cercle
5218  // variable init_shape_size par défaut a 0.95 (entre 0 et 1 sinon)
5219  if( (double(y)-(1.0+2.0*center_y2)*double(img_height)/2.0)*(double(y)-(1.0+2.0*center_y2)*double(img_height)/2.0)/(init_height2*double(img_height)/2.0*init_height2*double(img_height)/2.0)+(double(x)-(1.0+2.0*center_x2)*double(img_width)/2.0)*(double(x)-(1.0+2.0*center_x2)*double(img_width)/2.0)/(init_width2*double(img_width)/2.0*init_width2*double(img_width)/2.0) > 1.0 )
5220  {
5221  shape[offset] = 1;
5222  }
5223  else
5224  {
5225  shape[offset] = -1;
5226  }
5227  }
5228  }
5229 
5230  else
5231  {
5232  for( offset = 0; offset < img_size; offset++ )
5233  {
5234  y = offset/img_width;
5235  x = offset-y*img_width;
5236 
5237  // pour faire un rectangle
5238  // largeur et hauteur du rectangle proportionnel à la largeur et la hauteur de l'image
5239  // pour une image carrée, le rectangle est un carré
5240  if( double(y) > ((1.0-init_height2)*double(img_height)/2.0 + center_y2*double(img_height)) && double(y) < ((double(img_height)-(1.0-init_height2)*double(img_height)/2.0) + center_y2*double(img_height)) && double(x) > ((1.0-init_width2)*double(img_width)/2.0 + center_x2*double(img_width)) && double(x) < ((double(img_width)-(1.0-init_width2)*double(img_width)/2.0) + center_x2*double(img_width)) )
5241  {
5242  shape[offset] = -1;
5243  }
5244  else
5245  {
5246  shape[offset] = 1;
5247  }
5248  }
5249  }
5250 
5251  bool phi_init2_modif = false;
5252 
5253  for( offset = 0; offset < img_size; offset++ )
5254  {
5255  if( shape[offset] == -1 && phi_init2[offset] == 1 )
5256  {
5257  phi_init2[offset] = -1;
5258  phi_init2_modif = true;
5259  }
5260  }
5261 
5262  clean_boundaries(phi_init2, phi_init2_clean);
5263 
5264  if( !phi_init2_modif )
5265  {
5266  bool hasOne = false;
5267  bool hasMinusOne = false;
5268 
5269  for( offset = 0; offset < img_size; offset++ )
5270  {
5271  if( shape[offset] == 1 )
5272  {
5273  hasOne = true;
5274  }
5275  if( shape[offset] == -1 )
5276  {
5277  hasMinusOne = true;
5278  }
5279  }
5280 
5281  if( hasOne && hasMinusOne )
5282  {
5283  phi_subtract_shape();
5284  }
5285  }
5286  }
5287 
5288  return;
5289 }
5290 
5291 // affiche l'image+phi en clair dans la fenêtre de configuration
5292 // dans l'onglet initialisation, affiche l'image+phi en foncé (booléen d'entrée a true) lorsque qu'on clique sur l'image
5293 // ou qu'on appuie sur les bouttons add subtract
5294 void ImageViewer::phi_visu(bool dark_color)
5295 {
5296  if( img1 != NULL )
5297  {
5298  if( outsidecolor_combobox->currentIndex() == 8 )
5299  {
5300  Rout2 = Rout_selected2;
5301  Gout2 = Gout_selected2;
5302  Bout2 = Bout_selected2;
5303  }
5304  else
5305  {
5306  get_color(outsidecolor_combobox->currentIndex(),Rout2,Gout2,Bout2);
5307  }
5308 
5309  if( insidecolor_combobox->currentIndex() == 8 )
5310  {
5311  Rin2 = Rin_selected2;
5312  Gin2 = Gin_selected2;
5313  Bin2 = Bin_selected2;
5314  }
5315  else
5316  {
5317  get_color(insidecolor_combobox->currentIndex(),Rin2,Gin2,Bin2);
5318  }
5319 
5320 
5321  int offset;
5322 
5323  if( dark_color )
5324  {
5325  if( outsidecolor_combobox->currentIndex() != 9 )
5326  {
5327  for( int n_out = 0; Lout_2[n_out] != list_end; n_out++ )
5328  {
5329  offset = Lout_2[n_out]*3;
5330 
5331  image_phi_uchar[offset] = Rout2/2;
5332  image_phi_uchar[offset+1] = Gout2/2;
5333  image_phi_uchar[offset+2] = Bout2/2;
5334 
5335  image_shape_uchar[offset] = Rout2/2;
5336  image_shape_uchar[offset+1] = Gout2/2;
5337  image_shape_uchar[offset+2] = Bout2/2;
5338  }
5339  }
5340 
5341  if( insidecolor_combobox->currentIndex() != 9 )
5342  {
5343  for( int n_in = 0; Lin_2[n_in] != list_end; n_in++ )
5344  {
5345  offset = Lin_2[n_in]*3;
5346 
5347  image_phi_uchar[offset] = Rin2/2;
5348  image_phi_uchar[offset+1] = Gin2/2;
5349  image_phi_uchar[offset+2] = Bin2/2;
5350 
5351  image_shape_uchar[offset] = Rin2/2;
5352  image_shape_uchar[offset+1] = Gin2/2;
5353  image_shape_uchar[offset+2] = Bin2/2;
5354  }
5355  }
5356  }
5357 
5358 
5359  else
5360  {
5361  if( outsidecolor_combobox->currentIndex() != 9 )
5362  {
5363  for( int n_out = 0; Lout_2[n_out] != list_end; n_out++ )
5364  {
5365  offset = Lout_2[n_out]*3;
5366 
5367  image_phi_uchar[offset] = Rout2;
5368  image_phi_uchar[offset+1] = Gout2;
5369  image_phi_uchar[offset+2] = Bout2;
5370 
5371  image_shape_uchar[offset] = Rout2/2;
5372  image_shape_uchar[offset+1] = Gout2/2;
5373  image_shape_uchar[offset+2] = Bout2/2;
5374  }
5375  }
5376  else
5377  {
5378  // efface l'affichage des listes
5379  for( int n_out = 0; Lout_2[n_out] != list_end; n_out++ )
5380  {
5381  offset = Lout_2[n_out]*3;
5382 
5383  image_phi_uchar[offset] = image_filter_uchar[offset];
5384  image_phi_uchar[offset+1] = image_filter_uchar[offset+1];
5385  image_phi_uchar[offset+2] = image_filter_uchar[offset+2];
5386 
5387  image_shape_uchar[offset] = image_filter_uchar[offset];
5388  image_shape_uchar[offset+1] = image_filter_uchar[offset+1];
5389  image_shape_uchar[offset+2] = image_filter_uchar[offset+2];
5390  }
5391  }
5392 
5393  if( insidecolor_combobox->currentIndex() != 9 )
5394  {
5395  for( int n_in = 0; Lin_2[n_in] != list_end; n_in++ )
5396  {
5397  offset = Lin_2[n_in]*3;
5398 
5399  image_phi_uchar[offset] = Rin2;
5400  image_phi_uchar[offset+1] = Gin2;
5401  image_phi_uchar[offset+2] = Bin2;
5402 
5403  image_shape_uchar[offset] = Rin2/2;
5404  image_shape_uchar[offset+1] = Gin2/2;
5405  image_shape_uchar[offset+2] = Bin2/2;
5406  }
5407  }
5408  else
5409  {
5410  for( int n_in = 0; Lin_2[n_in] != list_end; n_in++ )
5411  {
5412  offset = Lin_2[n_in]*3;
5413 
5414  image_phi_uchar[offset] = image_filter_uchar[offset];
5415  image_phi_uchar[offset+1] = image_filter_uchar[offset+1];
5416  image_phi_uchar[offset+2] = image_filter_uchar[offset+2];
5417 
5418  image_shape_uchar[offset] = image_filter_uchar[offset];
5419  image_shape_uchar[offset+1] = image_filter_uchar[offset+1];
5420  image_shape_uchar[offset+2] = image_filter_uchar[offset+2];
5421  }
5422  }
5423  }
5424 
5425  if( hasContoursHidden && onglets->currentIndex() == 2 )
5426  {
5427  // affiche l'ellipse ou le rectangle
5428  imageLabel_settings->set_qimage(image_filter);
5429  }
5430  else
5431  {
5432  // affiche l'ellipse ou le rectangle
5433  imageLabel_settings->set_qimage(image_phi);
5434  }
5435 
5436  // efface l'ellipse ou le recangle de la QImage
5437  // efface les listes de la QImage
5438  for( int n_out = 0; Lout_shape1[n_out] != list_end; n_out++ )
5439  {
5440  offset = Lout_shape1[n_out]*3;
5441 
5442  image_shape_uchar[offset] = image_phi_uchar[offset];
5443  image_shape_uchar[offset+1] = image_phi_uchar[offset+1];
5444  image_shape_uchar[offset+2] = image_phi_uchar[offset+2];
5445  }
5446 
5447  for( int n_in = 0; Lin_shape1[n_in] != list_end; n_in++ )
5448  {
5449  offset = Lin_shape1[n_in]*3;
5450 
5451  image_shape_uchar[offset] = image_phi_uchar[offset];
5452  image_shape_uchar[offset+1] = image_phi_uchar[offset+1];
5453  image_shape_uchar[offset+2] = image_phi_uchar[offset+2];
5454  }
5455  }
5456 
5457  return;
5458 }
5459 
5460 void ImageViewer::get_color(int index, unsigned char& R, unsigned char& G, unsigned char& B)
5461 {
5462 
5463  if( index == 0 )
5464  {
5465  R = 255;
5466  G = 0;
5467  B = 0;
5468  }
5469  if( index == 1 )
5470  {
5471  R = 0;
5472  G = 255;
5473  B = 0;
5474  }
5475  if( index == 2 )
5476  {
5477  R = 0;
5478  G = 0;
5479  B = 255;
5480  }
5481  if( index == 3 )
5482  {
5483  R = 0;
5484  G = 255;
5485  B = 255;
5486  }
5487  if( index == 4 )
5488  {
5489  R = 255;
5490  G = 0;
5491  B = 255;
5492  }
5493  if( index == 5 )
5494  {
5495  R = 255;
5496  G = 255;
5497  B = 0;
5498  }
5499  if( index == 6 || index == 9 )
5500  {
5501  R = 0;
5502  G = 0;
5503  B = 0;
5504  }
5505  if( index == 7 )
5506  {
5507  R = 255;
5508  G = 255;
5509  B = 255;
5510  }
5511 
5512  return;
5513 }
5514 
5515 // Surcharge de phi_visu pour que le signal et le slot de Qt aient la même signature (les memes types de paramètres)
5516 // pour les combo box couleurs
5517 void ImageViewer::phi_visu(int value)
5518 {
5519  phi_visu(false);
5520  return;
5521 }
5522 
5523 // Fonction appelée quand on clique sur le boutton add dans l'onglet initialization
5524 // ou par clic gauche
5525 void ImageViewer::add_visu()
5526 {
5527  // ajoute
5528  phi_add_shape();
5529  // visualisation de phi en foncé (booléen true)
5530  phi_visu(true);
5531  return;
5532 }
5533 
5534 // Fonction appelée quand on clique sur le boutton subtract dans l'onglet initialization
5535 // ou par clic droit
5536 void ImageViewer::subtract_visu()
5537 {
5538  // soustrait
5539  phi_subtract_shape();
5540  // visualisation de phi en foncé (booléen true)
5541  phi_visu(true);
5542  return;
5543 }
5544 
5545 // Fonction appelée quand on clique sur save
5546 void ImageViewer::saveImage()
5547 {
5548  QFileInfo fi(fileName);
5549  QString fileName_save;
5550 
5551  // selection du chemin à partir d'une boîte de dialogue
5552  if( iteration1 == -1 )
5553  {
5554  fileName_save = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName(this,
5555  tr("Save the image displayed by the main window"),
5556  last_directory_used + "/" + fi.baseName(),
5557  "BMP (*.bmp);;JPG (*.jpg);;PNG (*.png);;PPM (*.ppm);;TIFF (*.tiff);;XBM (*.xbm);;XPM (*.xpm)");
5558  }
5559  else
5560  {
5561  show_phi_list_value();
5562 
5563  if( image_disp == 1 )
5564  {
5565  fileName_save = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName(this,
5566  tr("Save the image displayed by the main window"),
5567  last_directory_used + "/" + fi.baseName() + tr("_with_phi(t=")+QString::number(iteration1)+")",
5568  "BMP (*.bmp);;JPG (*.jpg);;PNG (*.png);;PPM (*.ppm);;TIFF (*.tiff);;XBM (*.xbm);;XPM (*.xpm)");
5569  }
5570  if( image_disp == 2 )
5571  {
5572 
5573  if( hasGaussianNoise || hasSaltNoise || hasSpeckleNoise || hasMeanFilt || hasGaussianFilt || hasMedianFilt || hasAnisoDiff || hasOpenFilt || hasCloseFilt || hasTophatFilt || model == 2 )
5574  {
5575 
5576  fileName_save = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName(this,
5577  tr("Save the image displayed by the main window"),
5578  last_directory_used + "/" + tr("preprocessed_") + fi.baseName() + tr("_with_phi(t=")+QString::number(iteration1)+")",
5579  "BMP (*.bmp);;JPG (*.jpg);;PNG (*.png);;PPM (*.ppm);;TIFF (*.tiff);;XBM (*.xbm);;XPM (*.xpm)");
5580 
5581  }
5582  else
5583  {
5584  fileName_save = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName(this,
5585  tr("Save the image displayed by the main window"),
5586  last_directory_used + "/" + fi.baseName()+tr("_with_phi(t=") + QString::number(iteration1)+")",
5587  "BMP (*.bmp);;JPG (*.jpg);;PNG (*.png);;PPM (*.ppm);;TIFF (*.tiff);;XBM (*.xbm);;XPM (*.xpm)");
5588  }
5589  }
5590  }
5591 
5592  QImage img_displayed = imageLabel->get_qimage();
5593 
5594  if( !fileName_save.isEmpty() )
5595  {
5596  QFileInfo fi1(fileName_save);
5597  last_directory_used = fi1.absolutePath();
5598 
5599 
5600  img_displayed.save(fileName_save);
5601  }
5602 
5603  if( (hasGaussianNoise || hasSaltNoise || hasSpeckleNoise || hasMeanFilt || hasGaussianFilt || hasMedianFilt || hasAnisoDiff || hasOpenFilt || hasCloseFilt || hasTophatFilt || model == 2) && !image_save_preprocess.isNull() )
5604  {
5605  // sélection du chemin+nom de sauvegarde à partir d'une boîte de dialogue
5606  QString fileName_save2 = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName(this,
5607  tr("Save the preprocessed image"),
5608  last_directory_used + "/" + tr("preprocessed_") + fi.baseName(),
5609  "BMP (*.bmp);;JPG (*.jpg);;PNG (*.png);;PPM (*.ppm);;TIFF (*.tiff);;XBM (*.xbm);;XPM (*.xpm)");
5610 
5611 
5612  if( !fileName_save2.isEmpty() )
5613  {
5614  QFileInfo fi2(fileName_save2);
5615  last_directory_used = fi2.absolutePath();
5616 
5617  image_save_preprocess.save(fileName_save2);
5618  }
5619  }
5620 }
5621 
5622 // Fonction appelée par le boutton selected de boundaries outside
5623 // sélection et affichage d'une couleur particulière
5624 void ImageViewer::color_out()
5625 {
5626  // Sélection d'une QColor a partir d'une boite de dialogue couleur
5627  QColor color_out = QColorDialog::getColor(Qt::white, this, tr("Select Lout color"));
5628  if( color_out.isValid() )
5629  {
5630  Rout_selected2 = (unsigned char)(color_out.red());
5631  Gout_selected2 = (unsigned char)(color_out.green());
5632  Bout_selected2 = (unsigned char)(color_out.blue());
5633 
5634  QPixmap pm(12,12);
5635  pm.fill(color_out);
5636  outsidecolor_combobox->setItemIcon(8,pm);
5637 
5638  outsidecolor_combobox->setCurrentIndex(8);
5639  }
5640  // affichage de l'image avec la nouvelle couleur sélectionnée
5641  phi_visu(false);
5642 
5643 }
5644 
5645 // Fonction appelée par le boutton selected de boundaries inside
5646 // sélection et affichage d'une couleure particulière
5647 void ImageViewer::color_in()
5648 {
5649  // Selection d'une QColor à partir d'une boîte de dialogue couleur
5650  QColor color_in = QColorDialog::getColor(Qt::white, this, tr("Select Lin color"));
5651  if( color_in.isValid() )
5652  {
5653  Rin_selected2 = (unsigned char)(color_in.red());
5654  Gin_selected2 = (unsigned char)(color_in.green());
5655  Bin_selected2 = (unsigned char)(color_in.blue());
5656 
5657  QPixmap pm(12,12);
5658  pm.fill(color_in);
5659  insidecolor_combobox->setItemIcon(8,pm);
5660 
5661  insidecolor_combobox->setCurrentIndex(8);
5662  }
5663  // affichage de l'image avec la nouvelle couleur sélectionnée
5664  phi_visu(false);
5665 }
5666 
5667 // Fonction appelée par tous les widgets de l'onglet Preprocessing
5668 // Calcule et affiche l'image prétraitéé
5669 void ImageViewer::filtering_visu()
5670 {
5671  if( img1 != NULL && filters2 != NULL )
5672  {
5673  // récupération de tous les états des widgets de l'onglet preprocessing
5674 
5675  if( preprocessing_groupbox->isChecked() )
5676  {
5677  hasPreprocess2 = true;
5678  }
5679  else
5680  {
5681  hasPreprocess2 = false;
5682  }
5683 
5684  if( gaussian_noise_groupbox->isChecked() )
5685  {
5686  hasGaussianNoise2 = true;
5687  }
5688  else
5689  {
5690  hasGaussianNoise2 = false;
5691  }
5692  std_noise2 = std_noise_spin->value();
5693 
5694  if( salt_noise_groupbox->isChecked() )
5695  {
5696  hasSaltNoise2 = true;
5697  }
5698  else
5699  {
5700  hasSaltNoise2 = false;
5701  }
5702  proba_noise2 = proba_noise_spin->value()/100.0;
5703 
5704  if( speckle_noise_groupbox->isChecked() )
5705  {
5706  hasSpeckleNoise2 = true;
5707  }
5708  else
5709  {
5710  hasSpeckleNoise2 = false;
5711  }
5712  std_speckle_noise2 = std_speckle_noise_spin->value();
5713 
5714  if( median_groupbox->isChecked() )
5715  {
5716  hasMedianFilt2 = true;
5717  }
5718  else
5719  {
5720  hasMedianFilt2 = false;
5721  }
5722  kernel_median_length2 = klength_median_spin->value();
5723  if( complex_radio2->isChecked() )
5724  {
5725  hasO1algo2 = true;
5726  }
5727  else
5728  {
5729  hasO1algo2 = false;
5730  }
5731 
5732  if( mean_groupbox->isChecked() )
5733  {
5734  hasMeanFilt2 = true;
5735  }
5736  else
5737  {
5738  hasMeanFilt2 = false;
5739  }
5740  kernel_mean_length2 = klength_mean_spin->value();
5741 
5742  if( gaussian_groupbox->isChecked() )
5743  {
5744  hasGaussianFilt2 = true;
5745  }
5746  else
5747  {
5748  hasGaussianFilt2 = false;
5749  }
5750  kernel_gaussian_length2 = klength_gaussian_spin->value();
5751  sigma2 = std_filter_spin->value();
5752 
5753 
5754  if( aniso_groupbox->isChecked() )
5755  {
5756  hasAnisoDiff2 = true;
5757  }
5758  else
5759  {
5760  hasAnisoDiff2 = false;
5761  }
5762 
5763  max_itera2 = iteration_filter_spin->value();
5764  lambda2 = lambda_spin->value();
5765  kappa2 = kappa_spin->value();
5766  if( aniso1_radio->isChecked() )
5767  {
5768  aniso_option2 = 1;
5769  }
5770  if( aniso2_radio->isChecked() )
5771  {
5772  aniso_option2 = 2;
5773  }
5774 
5775  if( open_groupbox->isChecked() )
5776  {
5777  hasOpenFilt2 = true;
5778  }
5779  else
5780  {
5781  hasOpenFilt2 = false;
5782  }
5783  kernel_open_length2 = klength_open_spin->value();
5784 
5785  if( close_groupbox->isChecked() )
5786  {
5787  hasCloseFilt2 = true;
5788  }
5789  else
5790  {
5791  hasCloseFilt2 = false;
5792  }
5793  kernel_close_length2 = klength_close_spin->value();
5794 
5795  if( tophat_groupbox->isChecked() )
5796  {
5797  hasTophatFilt2 = true;
5798  }
5799  else
5800  {
5801  hasTophatFilt2 = false;
5802  }
5803  if( whitetophat_radio->isChecked() )
5804  {
5805  isWhiteTophat2 = true;
5806  }
5807  else
5808  {
5809  isWhiteTophat2 = false;
5810  }
5811  kernel_tophat_length2 = klength_tophat_spin->value();
5812 
5813  if( complex2_morpho_radio->isChecked() )
5814  {
5815  hasO1morpho2 = true;
5816  }
5817  else
5818  {
5819  hasO1morpho2 = false;
5820  }
5821 
5822  if( chanvese_radio->isChecked() )
5823  {
5824  model2 = 1;
5825  }
5826  if( geodesic_radio->isChecked() )
5827  {
5828  model2 = 2;
5829  }
5830  kernel_gradient_length2 = klength_gradient_spin->value();
5831 
5832  alpha2 = Yspin->value();
5833  beta2 = Uspin->value();
5834  gamma2 = Vspin->value();
5835 
5836  if( histo_checkbox->isChecked() )
5837  {
5838  hasHistoNormaliz2 = true;
5839  }
5840  else
5841  {
5842  hasHistoNormaliz2 = false;
5843  }
5844 
5845 
5846  if( hasOpenFilt2 || hasCloseFilt2 || hasTophatFilt2 )
5847  {
5848  algo_groupbox->setEnabled(true);
5849  }
5850  else
5851  {
5852  algo_groupbox->setEnabled(false);
5853  }
5854 
5855 
5856 
5857  // pour refiltrer à partir de l'image de départ
5858  filters2->initialyze_filtered();
5859 
5860  double elapsedTime;
5861  std::clock_t stopTime;
5862  std::clock_t startTime;
5863 
5864  startTime = std::clock();
5865 
5866  if( hasPreprocess2 )
5867  {
5868  if( hasGaussianNoise2 )
5869  {
5870  filters2->gaussian_white_noise(std_noise2);
5871  }
5872  if( hasSaltNoise2 )
5873  {
5874  filters2->salt_pepper_noise(proba_noise2);
5875  }
5876  if( hasSpeckleNoise2 )
5877  {
5878  filters2->speckle(std_speckle_noise2);
5879  }
5880 
5881  if( hasMeanFilt2 )
5882  {
5883  filters2->mean_filtering(kernel_mean_length2);
5884  }
5885  if( hasGaussianFilt2 )
5886  {
5887  filters2->gaussian_filtering(kernel_gaussian_length2, sigma2);
5888  }
5889 
5890  if( hasMedianFilt2 )
5891  {
5892  if( hasO1algo2 )
5893  {
5894  filters2->median_filtering_o1(kernel_median_length2);
5895  }
5896  else
5897  {
5898  filters2->median_filtering_oNlogN(kernel_median_length2);
5899  }
5900  }
5901  if( hasAnisoDiff2 )
5902  {
5903  filters2->anisotropic_diffusion(max_itera2, lambda2, kappa2, aniso_option2);
5904  }
5905 
5906  if( hasOpenFilt2 )
5907  {
5908  if( hasO1morpho2 )
5909  {
5910  filters2->opening_o1(kernel_open_length2);
5911  }
5912  else
5913  {
5914  filters2->opening(kernel_open_length2);
5915  }
5916  }
5917 
5918  if( hasCloseFilt2 )
5919  {
5920  if( hasO1morpho2 )
5921  {
5922  filters2->closing_o1(kernel_close_length2);
5923  }
5924  else
5925  {
5926  filters2->closing(kernel_close_length2);
5927  }
5928  }
5929 
5930  if( hasTophatFilt2 )
5931  {
5932  if( isWhiteTophat2 )
5933  {
5934  if( hasO1morpho2 )
5935  {
5936  filters2->white_top_hat_o1(kernel_tophat_length2);
5937  }
5938  else
5939  {
5940  filters2->white_top_hat(kernel_tophat_length2);
5941  }
5942  }
5943  else
5944  {
5945  if( hasO1morpho2 )
5946  {
5947  filters2->black_top_hat_o1(kernel_tophat_length2);
5948  }
5949  else
5950  {
5951  filters2->black_top_hat(kernel_tophat_length2);
5952  }
5953  }
5954  }
5955 
5956  }
5957 
5958  const unsigned char* img2_filtered;
5959 
5960  if( model2 == 1 )
5961  {
5962  img2_filtered = filters2->get_filtered();
5963  }
5964  if( model2 == 2 )
5965  {
5966  if( isRgb1 )
5967  {
5968  filters2->morphological_gradient_yuv(kernel_gradient_length2,alpha2,beta2,gamma2);
5969  img2_filtered = filters2->get_gradient();
5970  }
5971  else
5972  {
5973  filters2->morphological_gradient(kernel_gradient_length2);
5974  img2_filtered = filters2->get_filtered();
5975  }
5976  }
5977 
5978  stopTime = std::clock();
5979  elapsedTime = (stopTime - startTime) / double(CLOCKS_PER_SEC);
5980  time_filt->setText(tr("time = ")+QString::number(elapsedTime)+" s");
5981 
5982  if( isRgb1 )
5983  {
5984 
5985 
5986  if( model2 == 1 )
5987  {
5988  std::memcpy(image_filter_uchar,img2_filtered,3*img_size);
5989  std::memcpy(image_phi_uchar,img2_filtered,3*img_size);
5990  std::memcpy(image_shape_uchar,img2_filtered,3*img_size);
5991  }
5992  if( model2 == 2 )
5993  {
5994  unsigned char I;
5995 
5996  if( hasHistoNormaliz2 )
5997  {
5998  unsigned char max = 0;
5999  unsigned char min = 255;
6000 
6001  for( int offset = 0; offset < img_size; offset++ )
6002  {
6003  if( img2_filtered[offset] > max )
6004  {
6005  max = img2_filtered[offset];
6006  }
6007  if( img2_filtered[offset] < min )
6008  {
6009  min = img2_filtered[offset];
6010  }
6011  }
6012 
6013  for( int offset = 0; offset < img_size; offset++ )
6014  {
6015  I = (unsigned char)(255.0*double(img2_filtered[offset]-min)/double(max-min));
6016 
6017  image_filter_uchar[3*offset] = I;
6018  image_filter_uchar[3*offset+1] = I;
6019  image_filter_uchar[3*offset+2] = I;
6020 
6021  image_phi_uchar[3*offset] = I;
6022  image_phi_uchar[3*offset+1] = I;
6023  image_phi_uchar[3*offset+2] = I;
6024 
6025  image_shape_uchar[3*offset] = I;
6026  image_shape_uchar[3*offset+1] = I;
6027  image_shape_uchar[3*offset+2] = I;
6028  }
6029  }
6030 
6031  else
6032  {
6033  for( int offset = 0; offset < img_size; offset++ )
6034  {
6035  I = img2_filtered[offset];
6036 
6037  image_filter_uchar[3*offset] = I;
6038  image_filter_uchar[3*offset+1] = I;
6039  image_filter_uchar[3*offset+2] = I;
6040 
6041  image_phi_uchar[3*offset] = I;
6042  image_phi_uchar[3*offset+1] = I;
6043  image_phi_uchar[3*offset+2] = I;
6044 
6045  image_shape_uchar[3*offset] = I;
6046  image_shape_uchar[3*offset+1] = I;
6047  image_shape_uchar[3*offset+2] = I;
6048  }
6049  }
6050  }
6051 
6052 
6053  }
6054  else
6055  {
6056 
6057 
6058  unsigned char I;
6059 
6060  if( model2 == 2 && hasHistoNormaliz2 )
6061  {
6062  unsigned char max = 0;
6063  unsigned char min = 255;
6064 
6065  for( int offset = 0; offset < img_size; offset++ )
6066  {
6067  if( img2_filtered[offset] > max )
6068  {
6069  max = img2_filtered[offset];
6070  }
6071  if( img2_filtered[offset] < min )
6072  {
6073  min = img2_filtered[offset];
6074  }
6075  }
6076 
6077  for( int offset = 0; offset < img_size; offset++ )
6078  {
6079  I = (unsigned char)(255.0*double(img2_filtered[offset]-min)/double(max-min));
6080 
6081  image_filter_uchar[3*offset] = I;
6082  image_filter_uchar[3*offset+1] = I;
6083  image_filter_uchar[3*offset+2] = I;
6084 
6085  image_phi_uchar[3*offset] = I;
6086  image_phi_uchar[3*offset+1] = I;
6087  image_phi_uchar[3*offset+2] = I;
6088 
6089  image_shape_uchar[3*offset] = I;
6090  image_shape_uchar[3*offset+1] = I;
6091  image_shape_uchar[3*offset+2] = I;
6092  }
6093  }
6094 
6095  else
6096  {
6097  for( int offset = 0; offset < img_size; offset++ )
6098  {
6099  I = img2_filtered[offset];
6100 
6101  image_filter_uchar[3*offset] = I;
6102  image_filter_uchar[3*offset+1] = I;
6103  image_filter_uchar[3*offset+2] = I;
6104 
6105  image_phi_uchar[3*offset] = I;
6106  image_phi_uchar[3*offset+1] = I;
6107  image_phi_uchar[3*offset+2] = I;
6108 
6109  image_shape_uchar[3*offset] = I;
6110  image_shape_uchar[3*offset+1] = I;
6111  image_shape_uchar[3*offset+2] = I;
6112  }
6113  }
6114 
6115 
6116  }
6117 
6118  phi_visu(false);
6119  }
6120  return;
6121 }
6122 
6123 // Fonction appelée lorsque on change de taille d'image dans l'onglet Display
6124 void ImageViewer::change_display_size()
6125 {
6126  if( img1 != NULL )
6127  {
6128  phi_visu(false);
6129  }
6130 }
6131 
6132 // Fonction appelée à chaque changement d'onglet
6133 void ImageViewer::tab_visu(int value)
6134 {
6135  if( img1 != NULL )
6136  {
6137  // si onglet initilisation
6138  if( value == 1 )
6139  {
6140  imageLabel_settings->set_doWheelEvent(false);
6141  // visualisation de la forme
6142  phi_visu(true);
6143  shape_visu();
6144  }
6145  else
6146  {
6147  imageLabel_settings->set_doWheelEvent(true);
6148  // visualisation de phi
6149  phi_visu(false);
6150  }
6151  }
6152 }
6153 
6154 // Evénement clic souris dans imageLabel (image de la fenêtre principale) permet de rentrer dans la boucle infinie ou d'en sortir pour bloquer momentanément l'algo et prendre du temps sur une étape du contour actif
6155 void ImageViewer::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
6156 {
6157  // si l'image est chargée
6158  if( img1 != NULL )
6159  {
6160  if( !startAct->isEnabled() )
6161  {
6162  if( event->button() == Qt::LeftButton )
6163  {
6164  statusBar()->showMessage(tr("Release the left mouse button to evolve the active contour."));
6165  hasStepByStep = false;
6166  hasClickStopping = true;
6167  }
6168 
6169  if( event->button() == Qt::RightButton )
6170  {
6171  hasClickStopping = false;
6172  hasStepByStep = true;
6173  }
6174  }
6175  else
6176  {
6177  if( event->button() == Qt::LeftButton )
6178  {
6179  statusBar()->showMessage(tr("Release the left mouse button to evolve the active contour."));
6180  hasStepByStep = false;
6181  hasClickStopping = true;
6182  emit( startAct->trigger() );
6183  }
6184 
6185  if( event->button() == Qt::RightButton )
6186  {
6187  hasStepByStep = true;
6188  emit( startAct->trigger() );
6189  }
6190  }
6191  }
6192 }
6193 
6194 // Evénement clic souris dans imageLabel (image de la fenêtre principale) permet de rentrer dans la boucle infinie ou d'en sortir pour bloquer momentanément l'algo et prendre du temps sur une étape du contour actif
6195 void ImageViewer::mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
6196 {
6197  // si l'image est chargée
6198  if( img1 != NULL )
6199  {
6200  if( event->button() == Qt::LeftButton )
6201  {
6202  statusBar()->showMessage(tr("Active contour evolving."));
6203  if( !startAct->isEnabled() )
6204  {
6205  hasStepByStep = false;
6206  hasClickStopping = false;
6207  }
6208  }
6209  }
6210 }
6211 
6212 // Evénement touche clavier enfoncé dans imageLabel (image de la fenêtre principale) permet de rentrer dans la boucle infinie ou d'en sortir pour bloquer momentanément l'algo et prendre du temps sur une étape du contour actif
6213 void ImageViewer::keyPressEvent(QKeyEvent *event)
6214 {
6215  // si l'image est chargée
6216  if( img1 != NULL )
6217  {
6218  if( !startAct->isEnabled() )
6219  {
6220  if( !event->isAutoRepeat() )
6221  {
6222  if( event->key() == Qt::Key_Space || event->key() == Qt::Key_Right || event->key() == Qt::Key_Pause )
6223  {
6224  hasStepByStep = false;
6225  hasClickStopping = true;
6226  }
6227  }
6228 
6229  if( event->key() == Qt::Key_Return || event->key() == Qt::Key_Up || event->key() == Qt::Key_Down )
6230  {
6231  hasClickStopping = false;
6232  hasStepByStep = true;
6233  }
6234  }
6235  else
6236  {
6237  if( !event->isAutoRepeat() )
6238  {
6239  if( event->key() == Qt::Key_Space || event->key() == Qt::Key_Right || event->key() == Qt::Key_Pause )
6240  {
6241  hasStepByStep = false;
6242  hasClickStopping = true;
6243  emit( startAct->trigger() );
6244  }
6245  }
6246 
6247  if( event->key() == Qt::Key_Return || event->key() == Qt::Key_Up || event->key() == Qt::Key_Down )
6248  {
6249  hasStepByStep = true;
6250  emit( startAct->trigger() );
6251  }
6252  }
6253  }
6254 }
6255 
6256 // Evénement touche clavier relachée dans imageLabel (image de la fenêtre principale) permet de rentrer dans la boucle infinie ou d'en sortir pour bloquer momentanément l'algo et prendre du temps sur une étape du contour actif
6257 void ImageViewer::keyReleaseEvent(QKeyEvent *event)
6258 {
6259  // si l'image est chargée
6260  if( img1 != NULL )
6261  {
6262  if( !event->isAutoRepeat() )
6263  {
6264  if( event->key() == Qt::Key_Space || event->key() == Qt::Key_Right || event->key() == Qt::Key_Pause )
6265  {
6266  if( !startAct->isEnabled() )
6267  {
6268  hasStepByStep = false;
6269  hasClickStopping = false;
6270  }
6271  }
6272  }
6273  }
6274 }
6275 
6276 // Boucle infinie dont on peut rentrer ou sortir par un clic gauche ou droite (sur imageLabel, image de la fenêtre principale) lors de l'execution de l'algorithme et permettant de voir une étape particulière ou chaque étape, au rythme voulue
6277 void ImageViewer::infinite_loop()
6278 {
6279  if( hasClickStopping )
6280  {
6281  bool temp = imageLabel->hasMouseTracking();
6282  imageLabel->setMouseTracking(true);
6283 
6284  if( hasStepByStep )
6285  {
6286  statusBar()->showMessage(tr("Click on the right mouse button to evolve the contour of one iteration."));
6287  }
6288 
6289  while( hasClickStopping )
6290  {
6291  QApplication::processEvents();
6292  }
6293 
6294  imageLabel->setMouseTracking(temp);
6295  }
6296 }
6297 
6298 // Evénement déplacement souris au niveau de imageLabel pour pouvoir donner les infos pixels
6299 void ImageViewer::mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
6300 {
6301  // si l'image est chargée
6302  if( img1 != NULL )
6303  {
6304  positionX = int(double(img_width)*double( ( (event->pos()).x() -imageLabel->get_xoffset() ) /double(imageLabel->getPixWidth())));
6305  positionY = int(double(img_height)*double( ( (event->pos()).y() -imageLabel->get_yoffset() ) /double(imageLabel->getPixHeight())));
6306 
6307  if( positionX >= 0 && positionX < img_width && positionY >= 0 && positionY < img_height )
6308  {
6309  if( image_disp == 1 )
6310  {
6311  if( !isRgb1 )
6312  {
6313  int I = img1[ positionX+positionY*img_width ];
6314  QColor RGB(I,I,I);
6315  pixel_text->setText(tr("img(")+QString::number(positionX)+","+QString::number(positionY)+") = "+"<font color="+RGB.name()+">"+QString::number(I));
6316 
6317  }
6318  else
6319  {
6320  QColor RGB(img1[ 3*(positionX+positionY*img_width) ], img1[ 3*(positionX+positionY*img_width)+1 ], img1[ 3*(positionX+positionY*img_width)+2 ]);
6321  pixel_text->setText(tr("img(")+QString::number(positionX)+","+QString::number(positionY)+") = "+"<font color="+RGB.name()+">"+"("+QString::number(img1[ 3*(positionX+positionY*img_width) ])+","+QString::number(img1[ 3*(positionX+positionY*img_width)+1 ])+","+QString::number(img1[ 3*(positionX+positionY*img_width)+2 ])+")");
6322  }
6323 
6324  }
6325 
6326  if( image_disp == 2 )
6327  {
6328  const unsigned char* img1_filtered;
6329 
6330  QString img_str;
6331  if( hasGaussianNoise || hasSaltNoise || hasSpeckleNoise || hasMeanFilt || hasGaussianFilt || hasMedianFilt || hasAnisoDiff || hasOpenFilt || hasCloseFilt || hasTophatFilt || model == 2 )
6332  {
6333  img_str = tr("img'(");
6334  }
6335  else
6336  {
6337  img_str = tr("img(");
6338  }
6339 
6340  if( !isRgb1 )
6341  {
6342  img1_filtered = filters1->get_filtered();
6343  int I = img1_filtered[positionX+positionY*img_width];
6344  QColor RGB(I,I,I);
6345  pixel_text->setText(img_str+QString::number(positionX)+","+QString::number(positionY)+") = "+"<font color="+RGB.name()+">"+QString::number(I));
6346  }
6347 
6348  else
6349  {
6350  if( model == 1 )
6351  {
6352  img1_filtered = filters1->get_filtered();
6353 
6354  QColor RGB(img1_filtered[3*(positionX+positionY*img_width)],img1_filtered[3*(positionX+positionY*img_width)+1],img1_filtered[3*(positionX+positionY*img_width)+2]);
6355 
6356  pixel_text->setText(img_str+QString::number(positionX)+","+QString::number(positionY)+") = "+"<font color="+RGB.name()+">"+"("+QString::number(img1_filtered[3*(positionX+positionY*img_width)])+","+QString::number(img1_filtered[3*(positionX+positionY*img_width)+1])+","+QString::number(img1_filtered[3*(positionX+positionY*img_width)+2])+")");
6357  }
6358  if( model == 2 )
6359  {
6360  img1_filtered = filters1->get_gradient();
6361 
6362  int I = img1_filtered[ positionX+positionY*img_width ];
6363  QColor RGB(I,I,I);
6364  pixel_text->setText(img_str+QString::number(positionX)+","+QString::number(positionY)+") = "+"<font color="+RGB.name()+">"+QString::number(I));
6365  }
6366 
6367  }
6368  }
6369  show_phi_list_value();
6370  }
6371  }
6372 
6373 }
6374 
6375 void ImageViewer::show_phi_list_value()
6376 {
6377  QColor RGBout, RGBin;
6378  int Cout1, Cin1, CoutR, CoutG, CoutB, CinR, CinG, CinB;
6379  QColor RGBout_list(Rout1,Gout1,Bout1);
6380  QColor RGBin_list(Rin1,Gin1,Bin1);
6381
