6382  QString Cout_str = QString("<font color="+RGBout_list.name()+">"+"Cout"+"<font color=black>"+" = ");
6383  QString Cin_str = QString("<font color="+RGBin_list.name()+">"+"Cin"+"<font color=black>"+" = ");
6384 
6385  unsigned char otsu_threshold1;
6386  int iteration_max1;
6387 
6388  const char* phi = NULL;
6389 
6390  if( ac != NULL )
6391  {
6392  phi = ac->get_phi();
6393 
6394  iteration1 = ac->get_iteration();
6395  iteration_max1 = ac->get_iteration_max();
6396 
6397  if( iteration1 < iteration_max1 )
6398  {
6399  text->setText("<font color=green>"+tr("iteration t = ")+QString::number(iteration1));
6400  }
6401  else
6402  {
6403  text->setText("<font color=red>"+tr("iteration t = ")+QString::number(iteration1));
6404  }
6405 
6406  if( ac->get_hasListsChanges() )
6407  {
6408  changes_text->setText("<font color=green>"+tr("lists changes = true"));
6409  }
6410  else
6411  {
6412  changes_text->setText("<font color=red>"+tr("lists changes = false"));
6413  }
6414 
6415  if( ac->get_hasOscillation() )
6416  {
6417  oscillation_text->setText("<font color=red>"+tr("oscillation = true"));
6418  }
6419  else
6420  {
6421  oscillation_text->setText("<font color=green>"+tr("oscillation = false"));
6422  }
6423 
6424 
6425  if( model == 1 )
6426  {
6427  if( !isRgb1 )
6428  {
6429  // pour l'affichage
6430  if( dynamic_cast<ofeli::ACwithoutEdges*>(ac) != NULL )
6431  {
6432  Cout1 = dynamic_cast<ofeli::ACwithoutEdges*>(ac)->get_Cout();
6433  Cin1 = dynamic_cast<ofeli::ACwithoutEdges*>(ac)->get_Cin();
6434  RGBout = QColor(Cout1,Cout1,Cout1);
6435  RGBin = QColor(Cin1,Cin1,Cin1);
6436  Cout_text->setText(Cout_str+"<font color="+RGBout.name()+">"+QString::number(Cout1));
6437  Cin_text->setText(Cin_str+"<font color="+RGBin.name()+">"+QString::number(Cin1));
6438  }
6439  }
6440  else
6441  {
6442  if( dynamic_cast<ofeli::ACwithoutEdgesYUV*>(ac) != NULL )
6443  {
6444  CoutR = dynamic_cast<ofeli::ACwithoutEdgesYUV*>(ac)->get_CoutR();
6445  CoutG = dynamic_cast<ofeli::ACwithoutEdgesYUV*>(ac)->get_CoutG();
6446  CoutB = dynamic_cast<ofeli::ACwithoutEdgesYUV*>(ac)->get_CoutB();
6447 
6448  CinR = dynamic_cast<ofeli::ACwithoutEdgesYUV*>(ac)->get_CinR();
6449  CinG = dynamic_cast<ofeli::ACwithoutEdgesYUV*>(ac)->get_CinG();
6450  CinB = dynamic_cast<ofeli::ACwithoutEdgesYUV*>(ac)->get_CinB();
6451 
6452  RGBout = QColor(CoutR,CoutG,CoutB);
6453  RGBin = QColor(CinR,CinG,CinB);
6454 
6455  Cout_text->setText(Cout_str+"<font color="+RGBout.name()+">"+"("+QString::number(CoutR)+","+QString::number(CoutG)+","+QString::number(CoutB)+")");
6456  Cin_text->setText(Cin_str+"<font color="+RGBin.name()+">"+"("+QString::number(CinR)+","+QString::number(CinB)+","+QString::number(CinB)+")");
6457  }
6458  }
6459  }
6460 
6461  if( model == 2 )
6462  {
6463  if( dynamic_cast<ofeli::GeodesicAC*>(ac) != NULL )
6464  {
6465  // pour l'affichage
6466  otsu_threshold1 = dynamic_cast<ofeli::GeodesicAC*>(ac)->get_otsu_threshold();
6467  threshold_text->setText(tr("Otsu's threshold of gradient = ")+QString::number(otsu_threshold1));
6468  }
6469  }
6470  }
6471 
6472  if( phi != NULL )
6473  {
6474  QColor RGBout(Rout1,Gout1,Bout1);
6475  QColor RGBin(Rin1,Gin1,Bin1);
6476 
6477  if( phi[ positionX+positionY*img_width ] == 3 )
6478  {
6479  phi_text->setText("ϕ(x,y,t) = <font color="+RGBout.name()+">"+QString::number(phi[positionX+positionY*img_width]));
6480  lists_text->setText("(x,y) ∉ <font color="+RGBout.name()+">"+"Lout"+"<font color=black>"+"(t) & ∉ "+"<font color="+RGBin.name()+">"+"Lin"+"<font color=black>"+"(t)");
6481  }
6482  if( phi[ positionX+positionY*img_width ] == -3 )
6483  {
6484  phi_text->setText("ϕ(x,y,t) = <font color="+RGBin.name()+">"+QString::number(phi[positionX+positionY*img_width]));
6485  lists_text->setText("(x,y) ∉ <font color="+RGBin.name()+">"+"Lin"+"<font color=black>"+"(t) & ∉ "+"<font color="+RGBout.name()+">"+"Lout"+"<font color=black>"+"(t)");
6486  }
6487  if( phi[ positionX+positionY*img_width ] == 1 )
6488  {
6489  phi_text->setText("ϕ(x,y,t) = <font color="+RGBout.name()+">"+QString::number(phi[positionX+positionY*img_width]));
6490  lists_text->setText("(x,y) ∈ <font color="+RGBout.name()+">"+"Lout"+"<font color=black>"+"(t)");
6491  }
6492  if( phi[ positionX+positionY*img_width ] == -1 )
6493  {
6494  phi_text->setText("ϕ(x,y,t) = <font color="+RGBin.name()+">"+QString::number(phi[positionX+positionY*img_width]));
6495  lists_text->setText("(x,y) ∈ <font color="+RGBin.name()+">"+"Lin"+"<font color=black>"+"(t)");
6496  }
6497  }
6498 }
6499 
6500 // Pour arrêter manuellement l'algorithme, s'il y a un problème au niveau des conditions d'arrêts ou du temps de calcul sur les grandes images
6501 void ImageViewer::stop()
6502 {
6503  hasClickStopping = false;
6504  hasAlgoBreaking = true;
6505 }
6506 
6507 // Filtre des événements pour avoir le tracking au niveau du widget image de la fenêtre principale et de la fenêtre de parametres et pour ne pas avoir le tracking/la position au niveau de l'ensemble de chaque fenêtre
6508 bool ImageViewer::eventFilter(QObject *object, QEvent *event)
6509 {
6510  // deplacement uniquement en fonction de imageLabel et pas main_window
6511  if( object == imageLabel && event->type() == QEvent::MouseMove )
6512  {
6513  QMouseEvent* mouseEvent = static_cast<QMouseEvent*>(event);
6514  mouseMoveEvent(mouseEvent);
6515  }
6516 
6517  // molette prise en compte que sur la zone de imageLabel
6518  if( object == imageLabel && event->type() == QEvent::Wheel && img1 != NULL )
6519  {
6520  imageLabel->set_hasText(false);
6521  imageLabel->setBackgroundRole(QPalette::Dark);
6522  disconnect(scale_spin0,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),this,SLOT(do_scale0(int)));
6523  disconnect(scale_slider0,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),scale_spin0,SLOT(setValue(int)));
6524  disconnect(scale_spin0,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),scale_slider0,SLOT(setValue(int)));
6525  //disconnect(scrollArea->verticalScrollBar(),SIGNAL(rangeChanged(int,int)),this,SLOT(adjustVerticalScroll (int,int)));
6526  //disconnect(scrollArea->horizontalScrollBar(),SIGNAL(rangeChanged(int,int)),this,SLOT(adjustHorizontalScroll(int,int)));
6527  disconnect(scale_spin,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),this,SLOT(do_scale(int)));
6528  disconnect(scale_slider,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),scale_spin,SLOT(setValue(int)));
6529  disconnect(scale_spin,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),scale_slider,SLOT(setValue(int)));
6530 
6531  QApplication::processEvents();
6532 
6533  /*scale_spin0->setValue(int(100.0f*imageLabel->get_zoomFactor()));
6534  scale_slider0->setValue(int(100.0f*imageLabel->get_zoomFactor()));
6535  scale_spin->setValue(int(100.0f*imageLabel->get_zoomFactor()));
6536  scale_slider->setValue(int(100.0f*imageLabel->get_zoomFactor()));*/
6537 
6538  scale_spin0->setValue(100.0f*imageLabel->get_zoomFactor()/img_width);
6539  scale_slider0->setValue(100.0f*imageLabel->get_zoomFactor()/img_width);
6540  scale_spin->setValue(100.0f*imageLabel->get_zoomFactor()/img_width);
6541  scale_slider->setValue(100.0f*imageLabel->get_zoomFactor()/img_width);
6542 
6543  connect(scale_spin0,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),this,SLOT(do_scale0(int)));
6544  connect(scale_slider0,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),scale_spin0,SLOT(setValue(int)));
6545  connect(scale_spin0,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),scale_slider0,SLOT(setValue(int)));
6546 
6547  connect(scale_spin,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),this,SLOT(do_scale(int)));
6548  connect(scale_slider,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),scale_spin,SLOT(setValue(int)));
6549  connect(scale_spin,SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),scale_slider,SLOT(setValue(int)));
6550  }
6551 
6552  if( (object == scale_spin0 || object == scale_slider0 || object == scale_spin || object == scale_slider) && event->type() == QEvent::MouseButtonPress )
6553  {
6554  if( img1 != NULL )
6555  {
6556  imageLabel->set_hasText(false);
6557  imageLabel->setBackgroundRole(QPalette::Dark);
6558  imageLabel_settings->set_hasText(false);
6559  imageLabel_settings->setBackgroundRole(QPalette::Dark);
6560  }
6561  positionX = img_width/2;
6562  positionY = img_height/2;
6563  }
6564 
6565 
6566  // deplacement uniquement en fonction de imageLabel_settings et pas settings_window
6567  if( object == imageLabel_settings && event->type() == QEvent::MouseMove )
6568  {
6569  QMouseEvent* mouseEvent = static_cast<QMouseEvent*>(event);
6570  mouseMoveEvent2(mouseEvent);
6571  }
6572 
6573  // clic pris en compte que sur la zone de imageLabel_settings
6574  if( object == imageLabel_settings && event->type() == QEvent::MouseButtonPress )
6575  {
6576  QMouseEvent* mouseEvent = static_cast<QMouseEvent*>(event);
6577  mousePressEvent2(mouseEvent);
6578  }
6579 
6580  // molette prise en compte que sur la zone de imageLabel_settings
6581  if( object == imageLabel_settings && event->type() == QEvent::Wheel && img1 != NULL )
6582  {
6583  imageLabel_settings->set_hasText(false);
6584  imageLabel_settings->setBackgroundRole(QPalette::Dark);
6585  disconnect(scrollArea_settings->verticalScrollBar(),SIGNAL(rangeChanged(int,int)),this,SLOT(adjustVerticalScroll_settings(int,int)));
6586  disconnect(scrollArea_settings->horizontalScrollBar(),SIGNAL(rangeChanged(int,int)),this,SLOT(adjustHorizontalScroll_settings(int,int)));
6587  scale_spin->setValue(int(100.0f*imageLabel_settings->get_zoomFactor()));
6588  connect(scrollArea_settings->verticalScrollBar(),SIGNAL(rangeChanged(int,int)),this,SLOT(adjustVerticalScroll_settings(int,int)));
6589  connect(scrollArea_settings->horizontalScrollBar(),SIGNAL(rangeChanged(int,int)),this,SLOT(adjustHorizontalScroll_settings(int,int)));
6590  QWheelEvent* mouseEvent = static_cast<QWheelEvent*>(event);
6591  wheelEvent(mouseEvent);
6592  }
6593 
6594  if( object == scale_spinA && event->type() == QEvent::MouseButtonPress )
6595  {
6596  if( !image1.isNull() )
6597  {
6598  imageLabelA->set_hasText(false);
6599  imageLabelA->setBackgroundRole(QPalette::Dark);
6600  }
6601  positionXa = imgA_width/2;
6602  positionYa = imgA_height/2;
6603  }
6604 
6605  if( object == scale_spinB && event->type() == QEvent::MouseButtonPress )
6606  {
6607  if( !image2.isNull() )
6608  {
6609  imageLabelB->set_hasText(false);
6610  imageLabelB->setBackgroundRole(QPalette::Dark);
6611  }
6612  positionXb = imgB_width/2;
6613  positionYb = imgB_height/2;
6614  }
6615 
6616  // deplacement uniquement en fonction de imageLabelA
6617  if( object == imageLabelA && event->type() == QEvent::MouseMove )
6618  {
6619  QMouseEvent* mouseEvent = static_cast<QMouseEvent*>(event);
6620  mouseMoveEventA(mouseEvent);
6621  }
6622  // clic pris en compte que sur la zone de imageLabelA
6623  if( object == imageLabelA && event->type() == QEvent::MouseButtonPress )
6624  {
6625  QMouseEvent* mouseEvent = static_cast<QMouseEvent*>(event);
6626  mousePressEventA(mouseEvent);
6627  }
6628 
6629  if( object == imageLabelA && event->type() == QEvent::Wheel && !image1.isNull() )
6630  {
6631  imageLabelA->set_hasText(false);
6632  imageLabelA->setBackgroundRole(QPalette::Dark);
6633  disconnect(scrollAreaA->verticalScrollBar(),SIGNAL(rangeChanged(int,int)),this,SLOT(adjustVerticalScrollA (int,int)));
6634  disconnect(scrollAreaA->horizontalScrollBar(),SIGNAL(rangeChanged(int,int)),this,SLOT(adjustHorizontalScrollA(int,int)));
6635  scale_spinA->setValue(int(100.0f*imageLabelA->get_zoomFactor()));
6636  connect(scrollAreaA->verticalScrollBar(),SIGNAL(rangeChanged(int,int)),this,SLOT(adjustVerticalScrollA (int,int)));
6637  connect(scrollAreaA->horizontalScrollBar(),SIGNAL(rangeChanged(int,int)),this,SLOT(adjustHorizontalScrollA(int,int)));
6638  }
6639 
6640  if( object == imageLabelB && event->type() == QEvent::Wheel && !image2.isNull() )
6641  {
6642  imageLabelB->set_hasText(false);
6643  imageLabelB->setBackgroundRole(QPalette::Dark);
6644  disconnect(scrollAreaB->verticalScrollBar(),SIGNAL(rangeChanged(int,int)),this,SLOT(adjustVerticalScrollB (int,int)));
6645  disconnect(scrollAreaB->horizontalScrollBar(),SIGNAL(rangeChanged(int,int)),this,SLOT(adjustHorizontalScrollB(int,int)));
6646  scale_spinB->setValue(int(100.0f*imageLabelB->get_zoomFactor()));
6647  connect(scrollAreaB->verticalScrollBar(),SIGNAL(rangeChanged(int,int)),this,SLOT(adjustVerticalScrollB (int,int)));
6648  connect(scrollAreaB->horizontalScrollBar(),SIGNAL(rangeChanged(int,int)),this,SLOT(adjustHorizontalScrollB(int,int)));
6649  }
6650 
6651  // deplacement uniquement en fonction de imageLabelB
6652  if( object == imageLabelB && event->type() == QEvent::MouseMove )
6653  {
6654  QMouseEvent* mouseEvent = static_cast<QMouseEvent*>(event);
6655  mouseMoveEventB(mouseEvent);
6656  }
6657  // clic pris en compte que sur la zone de imageLabelB
6658  if( object == imageLabelB && event->type() == QEvent::MouseButtonPress )
6659  {
6660  QMouseEvent* mouseEvent = static_cast<QMouseEvent*>(event);
6661  mousePressEventB(mouseEvent);
6662  }
6663 
6664 
6665  if( object == imageLabel && event->type() == QEvent::DragEnter )
6666  {
6667  QDragEnterEvent* drag = static_cast<QDragEnterEvent*>(event);
6668  dragEnterEvent(drag);
6669  }
6670  if( object == imageLabel && event->type() == QEvent::DragMove )
6671  {
6672  QDragMoveEvent* drag = static_cast<QDragMoveEvent*>(event);
6673  dragMoveEvent(drag);
6674  }
6675  if( object == imageLabel && event->type() == QEvent::Drop )
6676  {
6677  QDropEvent* drag = static_cast<QDropEvent*>(event);
6678  dropEvent(drag);
6679  }
6680  if( object == imageLabel && event->type() == QEvent::DragLeave )
6681  {
6682  QDragLeaveEvent* drag = static_cast<QDragLeaveEvent*>(event);
6683  dragLeaveEvent(drag);
6684  }
6685 
6686  if( object == imageLabel_settings && event->type() == QEvent::DragEnter )
6687  {
6688  QDragEnterEvent* drag = static_cast<QDragEnterEvent*>(event);
6689  dragEnterEventPhi(drag);
6690  }
6691  if( object == imageLabel_settings && event->type() == QEvent::DragMove )
6692  {
6693  QDragMoveEvent* drag = static_cast<QDragMoveEvent*>(event);
6694  dragMoveEventPhi(drag);
6695  }
6696  if( object == imageLabel_settings && event->type() == QEvent::Drop )
6697  {
6698  QDropEvent* drag = static_cast<QDropEvent*>(event);
6699  dropEventPhi(drag);
6700  }
6701  if( object == imageLabel_settings && event->type() == QEvent::DragLeave )
6702  {
6703  QDragLeaveEvent* drag = static_cast<QDragLeaveEvent*>(event);
6704  dragLeaveEventPhi(drag);
6705  }
6706 
6707  if( object == imageLabelA && event->type() == QEvent::DragEnter )
6708  {
6709  QDragEnterEvent* drag = static_cast<QDragEnterEvent*>(event);
6710  dragEnterEventA(drag);
6711  }
6712  if( object == imageLabelA && event->type() == QEvent::DragMove )
6713  {
6714  QDragMoveEvent* drag = static_cast<QDragMoveEvent*>(event);
6715  dragMoveEventA(drag);
6716  }
6717  if( object == imageLabelA && event->type() == QEvent::Drop )
6718  {
6719  QDropEvent* drag = static_cast<QDropEvent*>(event);
6720  dropEventA(drag);
6721  }
6722  if( object == imageLabelA && event->type() == QEvent::DragLeave )
6723  {
6724  QDragLeaveEvent* drag = static_cast<QDragLeaveEvent*>(event);
6725  dragLeaveEventA(drag);
6726  }
6727 
6728  if( object == imageLabelB && event->type() == QEvent::DragEnter )
6729  {
6730  QDragEnterEvent* drag = static_cast<QDragEnterEvent*>(event);
6731  dragEnterEventB(drag);
6732  }
6733  if( object == imageLabelB && event->type() == QEvent::DragMove )
6734  {
6735  QDragMoveEvent* drag = static_cast<QDragMoveEvent*>(event);
6736  dragMoveEventB(drag);
6737  }
6738  if( object == imageLabelB && event->type() == QEvent::Drop )
6739  {
6740  QDropEvent* drag = static_cast<QDropEvent*>(event);
6741  dropEventB(drag);
6742  }
6743  if( object == imageLabelB && event->type() == QEvent::DragLeave )
6744  {
6745  QDragLeaveEvent* drag = static_cast<QDragLeaveEvent*>(event);
6746  dragLeaveEventB(drag);
6747  }
6748 
6749  if( object == imageLabel && event->type() == QEvent::MouseMove && positionX >= 0 && positionX < img_width && positionY >= 0 && positionY < img_height )
6750  {
6751  setCursor(Qt::CrossCursor);
6752  }
6753  else
6754  {
6755  setCursor(Qt::ArrowCursor);
6756  }
6757  return false;
6758 }
6759 
6760 // Evénement de déplacement de la souris dans le widget image de la fenêtre de paramètres
6761 void ImageViewer::mouseMoveEvent2(QMouseEvent *event2)
6762 {
6763  // si l'image est chargée et si on est dans l'onglet initialisation
6764  if( img1 != NULL )
6765  {
6766  // position de la souris dans l'image
6767  positionX = int(double(img_width)*double( ( (event2->pos()).x() -imageLabel_settings->get_xoffset() ) /double(imageLabel_settings->getPixWidth())));
6768  positionY = int(double(img_height)*double( ( (event2->pos()).y() -imageLabel_settings->get_yoffset() ) /double(imageLabel_settings->getPixHeight())));
6769 
6770  if( onglets->currentIndex() == 1 )
6771  {
6772  // on en deduit les valeurs relatives des sliders en %
6773 
6774  double a = (double(positionX)-double(img_width/2))/double(img_width);
6775  double b = (double(positionY)-double(img_height/2))/double(img_height);
6776 
6777  abscissa_spin->setValue(int(a*100.0));
6778  ordinate_spin->setValue(int(b*100.0));
6779  }
6780  }
6781 
6782 }
6783 
6784 
6785 
6786 // Evénement clic souris dans le widget image de la fenêtre de paramètres
6787 void ImageViewer::mousePressEvent2(QMouseEvent *event2)
6788 {
6789  // si on est dans l'onglet d'initilisation
6790  if( (img1 != NULL) && onglets->currentIndex() == 1 )
6791  {
6792  // clic gauche, on ajoute une forme
6793  if( event2->button() == Qt::LeftButton )
6794  {
6795  add_visu();
6796  }
6797  // clic droit, on soustraie
6798  if( event2->button() == Qt::RightButton )
6799  {
6800  subtract_visu();
6801  }
6802  // clic du milieu, on change un rectangle en ellipse ou vice versa
6803  if( event2->button() == Qt::MidButton )
6804  {
6805  if( !rectangle_radio->isChecked() )
6806  {
6807  rectangle_radio->setChecked(true);
6808  }
6809  else
6810  {
6811  ellipse_radio->setChecked(true);
6812  }
6813  shape_visu();
6814  }
6815  }
6816 
6817  // pour cacher ou non au clic gauche le contour actif initial quand on est dans l'onglet Preprocessing
6818  if( (img1 != NULL) && onglets->currentIndex() == 2 )
6819  {
6820  if( event2->button() == Qt::RightButton )
6821  {
6822  if( hasContoursHidden )
6823  {
6824  hasContoursHidden = false;
6825  }
6826  else
6827  {
6828  hasContoursHidden = true;
6829  }
6830  phi_visu(false);
6831  }
6832  if( event2->button() == Qt::LeftButton )
6833  {
6834  hasContoursHidden = true;
6835  if( hasShowImg1 )
6836  {
6837  hasShowImg1 = false;
6838  img1_visu();
6839  }
6840  else
6841  {
6842  hasShowImg1 = true;
6843  phi_visu(false);
6844  }
6845  }
6846  }
6847 
6848  }
6849 
6850 // Fonction pour afficher l'image de départ par clic gauche dans l'onglet preprocessing
6851 void ImageViewer::img1_visu()
6852 {
6853  if( img1 != NULL )
6854  {
6855  imageLabel_settings->set_qimage(img);
6856  }
6857 }
6858 
6859 // Evénement de la molette de souris utilisé dans l'onglet Initialization pour agrandir ou rétrecir la forme
6860 void ImageViewer::wheelEvent(QWheelEvent *event)
6861 {
6862  // si une image est déja chargée et si on est dans l'onglet d'initialisation
6863  if( (img1 != NULL) && onglets->currentIndex() == 1 )
6864  {
6865  // nombre de degré et de pas de la molette
6866  int numDegrees = event->delta() / 8;
6867  int numSteps = numDegrees / 15;
6868 
6869  // récupération des valeurs des sliders concernant la taille de la forme
6870  int width_ratio = width_shape_spin->value();
6871  int height_ratio = height_shape_spin->value();
6872 
6873  // correpondance par rapport à la taille réelle de la forme
6874  double width = double(img_width)*double(width_ratio)/100.0;
6875  double height = double(img_height)*double(height_ratio)/100.0;
6876 
6877  // augmentation ou diminution de 15% à chaque pas de molette
6878  width += 0.15*double(numSteps)*width;
6879  height += 0.15*double(numSteps)*height;
6880 
6881  width_ratio = int( 100.0*width/double(img_width) );
6882  height_ratio = int( 100.0*height/double(img_height) );
6883 
6884  if( (width_ratio > 3) && (height_ratio > 3) && (width_ratio < 150) && (height_ratio < 150) )
6885  {
6886  width_shape_spin->setValue(width_ratio);
6887  height_shape_spin->setValue(height_ratio);
6888  }
6889 
6890  event->accept();
6891  }
6892 }
6893 
6894 
6896 // //
6897 // Fonctions liées a l'évaluation //
6898 // //
6900 
6901 
6902 // Affiche la fenêtre d'évaluation quand on clique sur Evaluation
6903 void ImageViewer::evaluation()
6904 {
6905  // si la fenêtre d'évaluation n'est pas visible déjà
6906  if( !evaluation_window->isVisible() )
6907  {
6908  // on l'affiche
6909  evaluation_window->show();
6910 
6911  }
6912 }
6913 
6914 
6915 void ImageViewer::openFileNameA()
6916 {
6917  fileNameA = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this,
6918  tr("Open File A"),
6919  last_directory_used,
6920  tr("Image Files (%1)").arg(nameFilters.join(" ")));
6921  open_imageA();
6922 }
6923 
6924 // Ouverture de l'image 1 appelée par le boutton 1 de la fenêtre d'évaluation
6925 void ImageViewer::open_imageA()
6926 {
6927  if( !fileNameA.isEmpty() )
6928  {
6929  image1 = QImage(fileNameA);
6930  if( image1.isNull() )
6931  {
6932  QMessageBox::information(this, tr("Opening error - Ofeli"),
6933  tr("Cannot load %1.").arg(fileNameA));
6934  return;
6935  }
6936 
6937  imageLabelA->set_qimage0(image1);
6938  QApplication::processEvents();
6939 
6940  imgA_height = image1.height();
6941  imgA_width = image1.width();
6942  imgA_size = imgA_width*imgA_height;
6943 
6944  if( listA != NULL )
6945  {
6946  delete[] listA;
6947  listA = NULL;
6948  }
6949  if( listA == NULL )
6950  {
6951  listA = new int[imgA_size];
6952  }
6953 
6954  create_listA();
6955 
6956  positionXa = imgA_width/2;
6957  positionYa = imgA_height/2;
6958 
6959  QFileInfo fi1(fileNameA);
6960  QString name1 = fi1.fileName();
6961 
6962  QString string_lists_text;
6963  string_lists_text=QString::number(imgA_width)+"×"+QString::number(imgA_height);
6964  label_name1->setText(name1 +" - "+string_lists_text);
6965  }
6966 }
6967 
6968 void ImageViewer::create_listA()
6969 {
6970  if( listA != NULL )
6971  {
6972  unsigned char redA, greenA, blueA;
6973 
6974  if( Acolor_combobox->currentIndex() == 8 )
6975  {
6976  redA = redAselected;
6977  greenA = greenAselected;
6978  blueA = blueAselected;
6979  }
6980  else
6981  {
6982  get_color(Acolor_combobox->currentIndex(),redA,greenA,blueA);
6983  }
6984 
6985  // on remplit les listes
6986  int x, y;
6987  QRgb pix;
6988  int index = 0;
6989 
6990  for( int offset = 0; offset < imgA_size; offset++ )
6991  {
6992  y = offset/imgA_width;
6993  x = offset-y*imgA_width;
6994 
6995  pix = image1.pixel(x,y);
6996 
6997  if( (unsigned char)(qRed(pix)) == redA && (unsigned char)(qGreen(pix)) == greenA && (unsigned char)(qBlue(pix) == blueA) )
6998  {
6999  listA[index] = offset;
7000  index++;
7001  }
7002  }
7003  listA_length = index;
7004 
7005  if( listA_length != 0 )
7006  {
7007  text_listA_length->setText("<font color=green>"+tr("List A length = ")+QString::number(listA_length));
7008  }
7009  else
7010  {
7011  text_listA_length->setText("<font color=red>"+tr("List A length = ")+QString::number(listA_length));
7012  }
7013 
7014  if( listA_length != 0 && listB_length != 0 && listB != NULL )
7015  {
7016  onglets_eval->setTabEnabled(1,true);
7017  }
7018  else
7019  {
7020  onglets_eval->setTabEnabled(1,false);
7021  }
7022  }
7023 
7024  return;
7025 }
7026 
7027 void ImageViewer::create_listB()
7028 {
7029  if( listB != NULL )
7030  {
7031  unsigned char redB, greenB, blueB;
7032 
7033  if( Bcolor_combobox->currentIndex() == 8 )
7034  {
7035  redB = redBselected;
7036  greenB = greenBselected;
7037  blueB = blueBselected;
7038  }
7039  else
7040  {
7041  get_color(Bcolor_combobox->currentIndex(),redB,greenB,blueB);
7042  }
7043 
7044  // on remplit les listes
7045  int x, y;
7046  QRgb pix;
7047  int index = 0;
7048 
7049  for( int offset = 0; offset < imgB_size; offset++ )
7050  {
7051  y = offset/imgB_width;
7052  x = offset-y*imgB_width;
7053 
7054  pix = image2.pixel(x,y);
7055 
7056  if( (unsigned char)(qRed(pix)) == redB && (unsigned char)(qGreen(pix)) == greenB && (unsigned char)(qBlue(pix) == blueB) )
7057  {
7058  listB[index] = offset;
7059  index++;
7060  }
7061  }
7062  listB_length = index;
7063 
7064  if( listB_length != 0 )
7065  {
7066  text_listB_length->setText("<font color=green>"+tr("List B length = ")+QString::number(listB_length));
7067  }
7068  else
7069  {
7070  text_listB_length->setText("<font color=red>"+tr("List B length = ")+QString::number(listB_length));
7071  }
7072 
7073  if( listA_length != 0 && listB_length != 0 && listA != NULL )
7074  {
7075  onglets_eval->setTabEnabled(1,true);
7076  }
7077  else
7078  {
7079  onglets_eval->setTabEnabled(1,false);
7080  }
7081  }
7082 
7083  return;
7084 }
7085 
7086 void ImageViewer::create_listA(int index)
7087 {
7088  create_listA();
7089 }
7090 
7091 void ImageViewer::create_listB(int index)
7092 {
7093  create_listB();
7094 }
7095 
7096 void ImageViewer::openFileNameB()
7097 {
7098  fileNameB = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this,
7099  tr("Open File B"),
7100  last_directory_used,
7101  tr("Image Files (%1)").arg(nameFilters.join(" ")));
7102  open_imageB();
7103 }
7104 
7105 // Ouverture de l'image 2 appelée par le boutton 2 de la fenêtre d'évaluation
7106 void ImageViewer::open_imageB()
7107 {
7108  if( !fileNameB.isEmpty() )
7109  {
7110  image2 = QImage(fileNameB);
7111  if( image2.isNull() )
7112  {
7113  QMessageBox::information(this, tr("Opening error - Ofeli"),
7114  tr("Cannot load %1.").arg(fileNameB));
7115  return;
7116  }
7117 
7118  imageLabelB->set_qimage0(image2);
7119  QApplication::processEvents();
7120 
7121  imgB_height = image2.height();
7122  imgB_width = image2.width();
7123  imgB_size = imgB_width*imgB_height;
7124 
7125  if( listB != NULL )
7126  {
7127  delete[] listB;
7128  listB = NULL;
7129  }
7130 
7131  if( listB == NULL )
7132  {
7133  listB = new int[imgB_size];
7134  }
7135 
7136  create_listB();
7137 
7138  positionXb = imgB_width/2;
7139  positionYb = imgB_height/2;
7140 
7141  QFileInfo fi2(fileNameB);
7142  QString name2 = fi2.fileName();
7143 
7144  QString string_lists_text;
7145  string_lists_text=QString::number(imgB_width)+"×"+QString::number(imgB_height);
7146  label_name2->setText(name2 +" - "+string_lists_text);
7147  }
7148 }
7149 
7150 // Fonction appelée par le boutton select, sélection et affichage d'une couleure particulière
7151 void ImageViewer::colorA()
7152 {
7153  // Selection d'une QColor à partir d'une boîte de dialogue couleur
7154  QColor Acolor = QColorDialog::getColor(Qt::white, this, tr("Select list A color"));
7155  if( Acolor.isValid() )
7156  {
7157  redAselected = (unsigned char)(Acolor.red());
7158  greenAselected = (unsigned char)(Acolor.green());
7159  blueAselected = (unsigned char)(Acolor.blue());
7160 
7161  QPixmap pm(12,12);
7162  pm.fill(Acolor);
7163  Acolor_combobox->setItemIcon(8,pm);
7164 
7165  Acolor_combobox->setCurrentIndex(8);
7166 
7167  create_listA();
7168  }
7169 }
7170 
7171 // Fonction appelée par le boutton select, sélection et affichage d'une couleur particulière
7172 void ImageViewer::colorB()
7173 {
7174  // Selection d'une QColor à partir d'une boîte de dialogue couleur
7175  QColor Bcolor = QColorDialog::getColor(Qt::white, this, tr("Select list B color"));
7176  if( Bcolor.isValid() )
7177  {
7178  redBselected = (unsigned char)(Bcolor.red());
7179  greenBselected = (unsigned char)(Bcolor.green());
7180  blueBselected = (unsigned char)(Bcolor.blue());
7181 
7182  QPixmap pm(12,12);
7183  pm.fill(Bcolor);
7184  Bcolor_combobox->setItemIcon(8,pm);
7185 
7186  Bcolor_combobox->setCurrentIndex(8);
7187 
7188  create_listB();
7189  }
7190 }
7191 
7192 // Pour avoir la position sur l'image A pour obtenir la couleur
7193 void ImageViewer::mouseMoveEventA(QMouseEvent *event)
7194 {
7195  // si l'image est chargée
7196  if( !image1.isNull() )
7197  {
7198  // position de la souris dans l'image
7199  positionXa = int(double(imgA_width)*double( ( (event->pos()).x() -imageLabelA->get_xoffset() ) /double(imageLabelA->getPixWidth())));
7200  positionYa = int(double(imgA_height)*double( ( (event->pos()).y() -imageLabelA->get_yoffset() ) /double(imageLabelA->getPixHeight())));
7201  }
7202 }
7203 
7204 // Pour avoir la position sur l'image B pour obtenir la couleur
7205 void ImageViewer::mouseMoveEventB(QMouseEvent *event)
7206 {
7207  // si l'image est chargée
7208  if( !image2.isNull() )
7209  {
7210  // position de la souris dans l'image
7211  positionXb = int(double(imgB_width)*double( ( (event->pos()).x() -imageLabelB->get_xoffset() ) /double(imageLabelB->getPixWidth())));
7212  positionYb = int(double(imgB_height)*double( ( (event->pos()).y() -imageLabelB->get_yoffset() ) /double(imageLabelB->getPixHeight())));
7213 
7214  }
7215 }
7216 
7217 // Pour sélectionner la couleur de la liste A en cliquant sur l'image A
7218 void ImageViewer::mousePressEventA(QMouseEvent *event)
7219 {
7220  if( !image1.isNull() )
7221  {
7222  QRgb pix = image1.pixel(positionXa,positionYa);
7223 
7224  redAselected = (unsigned char)(qRed(pix));
7225  greenAselected = (unsigned char)(qGreen(pix));
7226  blueAselected = (unsigned char)(qBlue(pix));
7227 
7228  QPixmap pm(12,12);
7229  pm.fill(QColor(redAselected, greenAselected, blueAselected));
7230  Acolor_combobox->setItemIcon(8,pm);
7231 
7232  Acolor_combobox->setCurrentIndex(8);
7233 
7234  create_listA();
7235  }
7236 
7237 }
7238 
7239 // Pour sélectionner la couleur de la liste B en cliquant sur l'image B
7240 void ImageViewer::mousePressEventB(QMouseEvent *event)
7241 {
7242  if( !image2.isNull() )
7243  {
7244  QRgb pix = image2.pixel(positionXb,positionYb);
7245 
7246  redBselected = (unsigned char)(qRed(pix));
7247  greenBselected = (unsigned char)(qGreen(pix));
7248  blueBselected = (unsigned char)(qBlue(pix));
7249 
7250  QPixmap pm(12,12);
7251  pm.fill(QColor(redBselected, greenBselected, blueBselected));
7252  Bcolor_combobox->setItemIcon(8,pm);
7253 
7254  Bcolor_combobox->setCurrentIndex(8);
7255 
7256  create_listB();
7257  }
7258 }
7259 
7260 // Fonction exécutée quand on appuye sur l'onglet result de la fenêtre d'évaluation
7261 // calcule et affiche les distances d'Hausdorff et Hausdorff modifiée
7262 void ImageViewer::compute(int index)
7263 {
7264  if( index == 1 )
7265  {
7266  // création d'un objet a partir des listes
7267  ofeli::HausdorffDistance hausdorffDistance1(listA, listA_length, imgA_width, imgA_height, listB, listB_length, imgB_width, imgB_height);
7268 
7269  // utilisation des accesseurs
7270  double hausdorff_dist1 = hausdorffDistance1.get_hausdorff_dist();
7271  double modified_hausdorff_dist1 = hausdorffDistance1.get_modified_hausdorff_dist();
7272  double hausdorff_ratio1 = hausdorffDistance1.get_hausdorff_ratio();
7273  double modified_hausdorff_ratio1 = hausdorffDistance1.get_modified_hausdorff_ratio();
7274  double centroids_dist1 = hausdorffDistance1.get_centroids_dist();
7275  double centroids_ratio1 = hausdorffDistance1.get_centroids_ratio();
7276 
7277  // affichage
7278  label_hausdorff->setText(tr("Hausdorff distance = ")+QString::number(hausdorff_dist1)+(tr(" pixels")));
7279  label_hausdorff_ratio->setText(tr("Hausdorff ratio = ")+QString::number(100.0*hausdorff_ratio1)+(" %"));
7280  label_modified_hausdorff->setText(tr("modified Hausdorff distance = ")+QString::number(modified_hausdorff_dist1)+(tr(" pixels")));
7281  label_modified_hausdorff_ratio->setText(tr("modified Hausdorff ratio = ")+QString::number(100.0*modified_hausdorff_ratio1)+(" %"));
7282  label_centroids_dist->setText(tr("distance between centroids = ")+QString::number(centroids_dist1)+(tr(" pixels")));
7283  label_centroids_ratio->setText(tr("ratio between centroids = ")+QString::number(100.0*centroids_ratio1)+(" %"));
7284  }
7285 }
7286 
7287 // Fonction appelée pour le changement d'échelle dans la fenêtre viewer
7288 void ImageViewer::do_scale0(int value)
7289 {
7290  if( img1 != NULL )
7291  {
7292  double scale_factor = value/100.0;
7293  imageLabel->setZoomFactor(scale_factor);
7294  }
7295 }
7296

7298 {
7299  if( !image1.isNull() )
7300  {
7301  double scale_factor = value/100.0;
7302  imageLabelA->setZoomFactor(scale_factor);
7303  }
7304 }
7305

7307 {
7308  if( !image2.isNull() )
7309  {
7310  double scale_factor = value/100.0;
7311  imageLabelB->setZoomFactor(scale_factor);
7312  }
7313 
7314 }
7315 
7316 void ImageViewer::dragEnterEvent(QDragEnterEvent *event)
7317 {
7318  if( !settings_window->isVisible() )
7319  {
7320  QString text(tr("<drop image>"));
7321  imageLabel->set_text(text);
7322  imageLabel->setBackgroundRole(QPalette::Highlight);
7323  imageLabel->set_hasText(true);
7324 
7325  event->acceptProposedAction();
7326  emit changed(event->mimeData());
7327  }
7328 }
7329 
7330 void ImageViewer::dragMoveEvent(QDragMoveEvent *event)
7331 {
7332  if( !settings_window->isVisible() )
7333  {
7334  event->acceptProposedAction();
7335  }
7336 }
7337 
7338 void ImageViewer::dropEvent(QDropEvent *event)
7339 {
7340  if( !settings_window->isVisible() )
7341  {
7342  const QMimeData* mimeData = event->mimeData();
7343 
7344  if( mimeData->hasUrls() )
7345  {
7346  QList<QUrl> urlList = mimeData->urls();
7347  fileName = urlList.first().toLocalFile();
7348  }
7349  imageLabel->setBackgroundRole(QPalette::Dark);
7350  open();
7351  event->acceptProposedAction();
7352  }
7353 }
7354 
7355 void ImageViewer::dragLeaveEvent(QDragLeaveEvent *event)
7356 {
7357  if( !settings_window->isVisible() )
7358  {
7359  QString text(tr("<drag image>"));
7360  imageLabel->set_text(text);
7361  imageLabel->setBackgroundRole(QPalette::Dark);
7362  imageLabel->set_hasText(true);
7363  emit changed();
7364  event->accept();
7365  }
7366 }
7367 
7368 
7369 
7370 void ImageViewer::dragEnterEventPhi(QDragEnterEvent *event)
7371 {
7372  if( onglets->currentIndex() != 1 )
7373  {
7374  onglets->setCurrentIndex(1);
7375  }
7376  QString text(tr("<drop ϕ(t=0)>"));
7377  imageLabel_settings->set_text(text);
7378  imageLabel_settings->setBackgroundRole(QPalette::Highlight);
7379  imageLabel_settings->set_hasText(true);
7380 
7381  event->acceptProposedAction();
7382  emit changed(event->mimeData());
7383 }
7384

7386 {
7387  event->acceptProposedAction();
7388 }
7389 
7390 void ImageViewer::dropEventPhi(QDropEvent *event)
7391 {
7392  const QMimeData* mimeData = event->mimeData();
7393 
7394  if( mimeData->hasUrls() )
7395  {
7396  QList<QUrl> urlList = mimeData->urls();
7397  fileName_phi = urlList.first().toLocalFile();
7398  }
7399  imageLabel_settings->setBackgroundRole(QPalette::Dark);
7400  open_phi();
7401  event->acceptProposedAction();
7402 }
7403 
7404 void ImageViewer::dragLeaveEventPhi(QDragLeaveEvent *event)
7405 {
7406  QString text(tr("<drag ϕ(t=0)>"));
7407  imageLabel_settings->set_text(text);

7410 
7411  emit changed();

7413 }

7495 
7496 void ImageViewer::closeEvent(QCloseEvent *event)
7497 {
7498  QSettings settings("Bessy", "Ofeli");
7499 
7500  settings.setValue("mainWindow/size", size());
7501  settings.setValue("mainWindow/position", pos());
7502 
7503  settings.setValue("settingsWindow/size", settings_window->size());
7504  settings.setValue("settingsWindow/position", settings_window->pos());
7505 
7506  settings.setValue("evaluationWindow/size", evaluation_window->size());
7507  settings.setValue("evalutationWindow/position", evaluation_window->pos());
7508 
7509  settings.setValue("aboutWindow/position", about_window->pos());
7510 
7511  settings.setValue("licenseWindow/size", license_window->size());
7512  settings.setValue("licenseWindow/position", license_window->pos());
7513 
7514 
7515  settings.setValue("name/last_directory_used", last_directory_used);
7516  settings.setValue("Settings/Initialization/img_phi", img_phi);
7517  settings.setValue("Settings/Display/zoom_factor", scale_spin0->value());
7518 
7519  settings.setValue("Evaluation/spinA", scale_spinA->value());
7520  settings.setValue("Evaluation/spinB", scale_spinB->value());
7521 
7522  settings.setValue("Evaluation/comboA", Acolor_combobox->currentIndex());
7523  settings.setValue("Evaluation/comboB", Bcolor_combobox->currentIndex());
7524 
7525  settings.setValue("Evaluation/Ra", int(redAselected));
7526  settings.setValue("Evaluation/Ga", int(greenAselected));
7527  settings.setValue("Evaluation/Ba", int(blueAselected));
7528  settings.setValue("Evaluation/Rb", int(redBselected));
7529  settings.setValue("Evaluation/Gb", int(greenBselected));
7530  settings.setValue("Evaluation/Bb", int(blueBselected));
7531 
7532 
7533  settings.setValue("language", listWidget->currentRow());
7534 
7535 
7536  event->accept();
7537 }
7538 
7539 void ImageViewer::openFilenamePhi()
7540 {
7541  fileName_phi = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this,
7542  tr("Open File"),
7543  last_directory_used,
7544  tr("Image Files (%1)").arg(nameFilters.join(" ")));
7545 
7546  open_phi();
7547 }
7548 
7549 void ImageViewer::open_phi()
7550 {
7551  if( img1 != NULL )
7552  {
7553  if( !fileName_phi.isEmpty() )
7554  {
7555  QFileInfo fi(fileName_phi);
7556  last_directory_used = fi.absolutePath();
7557 
7558  QImage img_phi1 = QImage(fileName_phi);
7559 
7560  if( img_phi1.isNull() )
7561  {
7562  QMessageBox::information(this, tr("Opening error - Ofeli"),
7563  tr("Cannot load %1.").arg(fileName_phi));
7564  return;
7565  }
7566 
7567  img_phi1 = img_phi1.scaled(img_width, img_height, Qt::IgnoreAspectRatio, Qt::FastTransformation);
7568 
7569  int histogram[256];
7570  for( int I = 0; I < 256; I++ )
7571  {
7572  histogram[I] = 0;
7573  }
7574 
7575  if( img_phi1.format() == 3 )
7576  {
7577 
7578  int x, y; // position
7579 
7580  for( int offset = 0; offset < img_size; offset++ )
7581  {
7582  // offset = x+y*img_width <==>
7583  y = offset/img_width;
7584  x = offset-y*img_width;
7585 
7586  histogram[ *( img_phi1.scanLine(y)+x ) ]++;
7587  }
7588 
7589  const unsigned char threshold = otsu_method(histogram,img_size);
7590 
7591  for( int offset = 0; offset < img_size; offset++ )
7592  {
7593  // offset = x+y*img_width <==>
7594  y = offset/img_width;
7595  x = offset-y*img_width;
7596 
7597  if( *( img_phi1.scanLine(y)+x ) <= threshold )
7598  {
7599  phi_init1[offset] = 1;
7600  phi_init2[offset] = 1;
7601  }
7602  else
7603  {
7604  phi_init1[offset] = -1;
7605  phi_init2[offset] = -1;
7606  }
7607  }
7608  }
7609  else
7610  {
7611  QRgb pix;
7612 
7613  int x, y; // position
7614 
7615  for( int offset = 0; offset < img_size; offset++ )
7616  {
7617  // offset = x+y*img_width <==>
7618  y = offset/img_width;
7619  x = offset-y*img_width;
7620 
7621  pix = img_phi1.pixel(x,y);
7622 
7623  histogram[ (unsigned char) ( 0.2989*(double)(qRed(pix)) + 0.5870*(double)(qGreen(pix)) + 0.1140*(double)(qBlue(pix)) ) ]++;
7624  }
7625 
7626  const unsigned char threshold = otsu_method(histogram,img_size);
7627 
7628  for( int offset = 0; offset < img_size; offset++ )
7629  {
7630  // offset = x+y*img_width <==>
7631  y = offset/img_width;
7632  x = offset-y*img_width;
7633 
7634  pix = img_phi1.pixel(x,y);
7635 
7636  if( (unsigned char) ( 0.2989*(double)(qRed(pix)) + 0.5870*(double)(qGreen(pix)) + 0.1140*(double)(qBlue(pix)) ) <= threshold )
7637  {
7638  phi_init1[offset] = 1;
7639  phi_init2[offset] = 1;
7640  }
7641  else
7642  {
7643  phi_init1[offset] = -1;
7644  phi_init2[offset] = -1;
7645  }
7646  }
7647  }
7648 
7649  clean_boundaries(phi_init1,phi_init1_clean);
7650  clean_boundaries(phi_init2,phi_init2_clean);
7651  }
7652 
7653  tab_visu(onglets->currentIndex());
7654  }
7655 }
7656 
7657 void ImageViewer::save_phi()
7658 {
7659  if( phi_init2_clean != NULL )
7660  {
7661  QImage img_phi_save = QImage(img_width,img_height, QImage::Format_Indexed8);
7662  QVector<QRgb> table(256);
7663  for( int I = 0; I < 256; I++ )
7664  {
7665  table[I] = qRgb(I,I,I);
7666  }
7667  img_phi_save.setColorTable(table);
7668 
7669  int x, y; // position
7670 
7671  for( int offset = 0; offset < img_size; offset++ )
7672  {
7673  // offset = x+y*img_width <==>
7674  y = offset/img_width;
7675  x = offset-y*img_width;
7676 
7677  if( phi_init2_clean[offset] > 0 )
7678  {
7679  *( img_phi_save.scanLine(y)+x ) = 0;
7680  }
7681  else
7682  {
7683  *( img_phi_save.scanLine(y)+x ) = 255;
7684  }
7685  }
7686 
7687  QString fileName_save = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName(this,
7688  tr("Save ϕ(t=0)"),
7689  last_directory_used + QString(tr("/initial_phi")),
7690  "BMP (*.bmp);;JPG (*.jpg);;PNG (*.png);;PPM (*.ppm);;TIFF (*.tiff);;XBM (*.xbm);;XPM (*.xpm)");
7691  // sauvegarde
7692  img_phi_save.save(fileName_save);
7693  }
7694 }
7695 
7696 void ImageViewer::phiInit2imgPhi()
7697 {
7698  if( phi_init1_clean != NULL )
7699  {
7700  img_phi = QImage(img_width,img_height, QImage::Format_Indexed8);
7701  QVector<QRgb> table(256);
7702  for( int I = 0; I < 256; I++ )
7703  {
7704  table[I] = qRgb(I,I,I);
7705  }
7706  img_phi.setColorTable(table);
7707 
7708  int x, y; // position
7709 
7710  for( int offset = 0; offset < img_size; offset++ )
7711  {
7712  // offset = x+y*img_width <==>
7713  y = offset/img_width;
7714  x = offset-y*img_width;
7715 
7716  if( phi_init1_clean[offset] > 0 )
7717  {
7718  *( img_phi.scanLine(y)+x ) = 0;
7719  }
7720  else
7721  {
7722  *( img_phi.scanLine(y)+x ) = 255;
7723  }
7724  }
7725  }
7726 }
7727 
7728 void ImageViewer::imgPhi2phiInit()
7729 {
7730  if( phi_init1 != NULL && phi_init2 != NULL && !img_phi.isNull() )
7731  {
7732  if( img_phi.format() == 3 )
7733  {
7734  int x, y; // position
7735 
7736  for( int offset = 0; offset < img_size; offset++ )
7737  {
7738  // offset = x+y*img_width <==>
7739  y = offset/img_width;
7740  x = offset-y*img_width;
7741 
7742  if( *( img_phi.scanLine(y)+x ) < 128 )
7743  {
7744  phi_init1[offset] = 1;
7745  phi_init2[offset] = 1;
7746  }
7747  else
7748  {
7749  phi_init1[offset] = -1;
7750  phi_init2[offset] = -1;
7751  }
7752  }
7753  }
7754  else
7755  {
7756  QRgb pix;
7757 
7758  int x, y; // position
7759 
7760  for( int offset = 0; offset < img_size; offset++ )
7761  {
7762  // offset = x+y*img_width <==>
7763  y = offset/img_width;
7764  x = offset-y*img_width;
7765 
7766  pix = img_phi.pixel(x,y);
7767 
7768  if( (0.2989*(double)(qRed(pix)) + 0.5870*(double)(qGreen(pix)) + 0.1140*(double)(qBlue(pix)) ) < 128.0 )
7769  {
7770  phi_init1[offset] = 1;
7771  phi_init2[offset] = 1;
7772  }
7773  else
7774  {
7775  phi_init1[offset] = -1;
7776  phi_init2[offset] = -1;
7777  }
7778  }
7779  }
7780 
7781  clean_boundaries(phi_init1,phi_init1_clean);
7782  clean_boundaries(phi_init2,phi_init2_clean);
7783  }
7784 }
7785 
7786 void ImageViewer::adjustVerticalScroll(int min, int max)
7787 {
7788  if( img_height != 0 )
7789  {
7790  scrollArea->verticalScrollBar()->setValue( (max-min)*positionY/img_height );
7791  }
7792 }
7793 
7794 void ImageViewer::adjustHorizontalScroll(int min, int max)
7795 {
7796  if( img_width != 0 )
7797  {
7798  scrollArea->horizontalScrollBar()->setValue( (max-min)*positionX/img_width );
7799  }
7800 }
7801

7855 void ImageViewer::doc()
7856 {
7857  bool result = QDesktopServices::openUrl( QUrl("http://ofeli.googlecode.com/svn/doc/index.html", QUrl::TolerantMode) );
7858 }
7859 
7860 void ImageViewer::setCurrentFile(const QString &fileName1)
7861 {
7862  curFile = fileName1;
7863  //setWindowFilePath(curFile);
7864 
7865  QSettings settings("Bessy", "Ofeli");
7866  QStringList files = settings.value("name/recentFileList").toStringList();
7867  files.removeAll(fileName1);
7868  files.prepend(fileName1);
7869  while( files.size() > MaxRecentFiles )
7870  {
7871  files.removeLast();
7872  }
7873 
7874  settings.setValue("name/recentFileList", files);
7875 
7876  foreach( QWidget *widget, QApplication::topLevelWidgets() )
7877  {
7878  ImageViewer *imageViewer = qobject_cast<ImageViewer *>(widget);
7879  if( imageViewer )
7880  {
7881  imageViewer->updateRecentFileActions();
7882  }
7883  }
7884 }
7885 
7886 void ImageViewer::updateRecentFileActions()
7887 {
7888  QSettings settings("Bessy", "Ofeli");
7889  QStringList files = settings.value("name/recentFileList").toStringList();
7890 
7891  int numRecentFiles = qMin(files.size(), (int)MaxRecentFiles);
7892 
7893  for( int i = 0; i < numRecentFiles; ++i )
7894  {
7895  QString text = tr("&%1 %2").arg(i + 1).arg( strippedName(files[i]) );
7896  recentFileActs[i]->setText(text);
7897  recentFileActs[i]->setData(files[i]);
7898  recentFileActs[i]->setVisible(true);
7899  recentFileActs[i]->setStatusTip(files[i]);
7900  }
7901 
7902  for( int j = numRecentFiles; j < MaxRecentFiles; ++j )
7903  {
7904  recentFileActs[j]->setVisible(false);
7905  }
7906 
7907  separatorAct->setVisible(numRecentFiles > 0);
7908 
7909  if( files.isEmpty() )
7910  {
7911  deleteAct->setVisible(false);
7912  }
7913  else
7914  {
7915  deleteAct->setVisible(true);
7916  }
7917 }
7918 
7919 QString ImageViewer::strippedName(const QString &fullFileName)
7920 {
7921  return QFileInfo(fullFileName).fileName();
7922 }
7923 
7924 void ImageViewer::openRecentFile()
7925 {
7926  QAction* action = qobject_cast<QAction*>( sender() );
7927  if( action )
7928  {
7929  fileName = action->data().toString();
7930  }
7931 
7932  open();
7933 }
7934 
7935 void ImageViewer::deleteList()
7936 {
7937  QStringList files;
7938  files.clear();
7939 
7940  QSettings settings("Bessy", "Ofeli");
7941  settings.setValue("name/recentFileList", files);
7942 
7943  updateRecentFileActions();
7944 }
7945 
7946 unsigned char ImageViewer::otsu_method(const int histogram[], int img_size)
7947 {
7948  int sum = 0;
7949  for( int I = 0; I < 256; I++ )
7950  {
7951  sum += I*histogram[I];
7952  }
7953 
7954  int weight1, weight2, sum1, threshold;
7955  double mean1, mean2, var_t, var_max;
7956 
7957  threshold = 127; // value returned in the case of an totally homogeneous image
7958 
7959  weight1 = 0;
7960  sum1 = 0;
7961  var_max = -1.0;
7962 
7963  // 256 values ==> 255 thresholds t evaluated
7964  // class1 <= t and class2 > t
7965  for( int t = 0; t < 255; t++ )
7966  {
7967  weight1 += histogram[t];
7968  if( weight1 == 0 )
7969  {
7970  continue;
7971  }
7972 
7973  weight2 = img_size-weight1;
7974  if( weight2 == 0 )
7975  {
7976  break;
7977  }
7978 
7979  sum1 += t*histogram[t];
7980 
7981  mean1 = sum1/weight1;
7982  mean2 = (sum-sum1)/weight2; // sum2 = sum-sum1
7983 
7984  var_t = double(weight1)*double(weight2)*(mean1-mean2)*(mean1-mean2);
7985 
7986  if( var_t > var_max )
7987  {
7988  var_max = var_t;
7989  threshold = t;
7990  }
7991  }
7992 
7993  return (unsigned char)(threshold);
7994 }
7995 
7996 }
Generated on Mon Jan 14 2013 14:18:07 for Ofeli by   1.8.3
